We have security onsite for the rare occurrence that agreement is broken.  We apologize for any and all inconvenience. We invite you to return and enjoy our property. The FIFTH calendar shows all the events, bands, and if they will be closed for a private party so you may plan accordingly. Please contact the front desk manager and we will be happy to assist you with your needs. We have much to offer and would be honored if you gave us another chance to provide you with great service.

Summary: We love staying here! The location is great, literally right across from the main entrance. It‚Äôs also near McDonald‚Äôs, Panera, a taco spot, boba shop and a few other food places within walking distance for a variety of meal options outside the park. There‚Äôs a bar and restaurant on the premises which offers weekly perks and discounts for guests. The rates are very competitive, sometimes there are even offers for annual pass holders or deals on parking. The pool is perfect for kids of all ages, there are some cool play structures and a gradual walk in entrance perfect for babies and toddlers (and parents who don‚Äôt want to get all the way in). They also offer snack bags every morning for guests which is super helpful and a great perk!  Not to mention their service is excellent!
Manager Response: Dear Amaxwell422,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate your time to review your stay with us. Thank you for the shout out to April - she is excellent and an asset to our team! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our property and amenities.  We are happy to know that you will be back again to see us next time...Thanks again!

Summary: The location is the only thing holing this place down. Coming back to your room at 10 PM and seeing a roach the size of their little hand soaps unacceptable and all they can offer is to comp my already (ap) discounted parking?  All I know is if one room had them they all do. And to think we're staying in their remolded front rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Vanemonte,   We apologize that you found a pest in your room. Please know that this is not common. Our hotel, along with several others in the Disneyland Resort area, has a company that provides routine preventative pest control; however, every now and then one manages to somehow evade the system. We do not currently, nor have we previously, had an issue with pests of any kind. Our hotel, along with many others in the Disneyland Resort area, has a company that provides routine preventative pest control. Our housekeeping supervisors also conduct routine inspections of rooms to ensure that we are pest-free.   Again, we apologize that your experience fell short of expectations. So much of the guest feedback that we receive reflects a wonderful Disneyland experience and results in repeat guests who will only stay at our property anytime they visit the Anaheim resort area!

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance of both Disney and a nbr of restaurants. The room was spacious , the bed comfortable and the a/c kept the room at a good temperature. We were a bit apprehensive about being on the ground floor near the entrance with car/people traffic but we didn't hear a thing.  The only negative for us was the advertised room top bar which for 2 nights had a $15 per person cover charge and the 3rd night was booked out for a private function. we later found out that the rooftop bar was run by an independent 3rd party not linked to the hotel so we felt a bit misled on that.
Manager Response: Dear Mark H,   Thank you for your feedback! We are happy that you got to experience much of what our property has to offer. We look forward to being a part of your Disneyland Resort memories in the future. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great Room, Great Staff, Great Location
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Grand Legacy at the Park on our recent vacation . What a great hotel! Our room was very spacious and clean. The staff was friendly and accommodating. My husband asked for an extra blanket and it was brought up to us within minutes. It is conveniently located to a variety of restaurants, both sit down and fast food. Best of all, the Grand Legacy is across the street from Disneyland. No Uber, no hotel shuttle van, no rental car needed to get to Disneyland. Just a short walk across the street.  Great for families with little ones who might need to go back to the hotel to take a nap or play in their great pool. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear ChiliandChips,  Thank you for your review and welcome to the Grand Legacy family! We are so excited that you gave us a try and that you will be back! Our wonderful staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay after all that play time at the Happiest Place on Earth. Vacation time is to be enjoyed to the fullest and we are honored to be a part of yours. Thanks again!

Summary: Location was excellent, snack bags were a great plus , room was fine.  Only real complaint was that the air conditioning was SUPER loud and didn‚Äôt work very well.  It wasn‚Äôt awful because the weather was nice, but not sure if we will stay there again when we return in the spring for that reason.  Other than that, good stay!
Manager Response: Dear DGT1234,  Thank you for your feedback! We are happy that you got to experience much of what our property has to offer. I understand that your room was experiencing a few maintenance issues, and I have forwarded these concerns on to the chief engineer, to be addressed as necessary. We hope that you were able to communicate these concerns during your stay, as we have a very talented maintenance staff on property that can remedy such inconveniences as they occur! Thanks again!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. They had laundry facilities but not all of the machines were working. That would probably be my only complaint. We were driving a large suburban, and parking was a little limited. We were glad we could easily walk to everything. Once we parked the vehicle we didn‚Äôt move it for several days.
Manager Response: Dear Cantontraveler5,  Thank you for your review. We are always striving to provide the best experience for our guests. We appreciate your time in letting us know about your stay. Thanks again and we look forward to all your future visits!

Summary: The hotel is a 10 min walk from Disneyland parks.  You get a snack pack in the morning, which is very convenient.  And, there's a pool if you want to take a break during the day.  The room also has a fridge if you want to buy your own food during your stay.  The staff of the hotel if very helpful and accommodating - especially when parking gets tight in the evenings, the valet's are very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Bolkin,   Thank you for your feedback! We are happy that you got to experience much of what our property has to offer. We look forward to being a part of your Disneyland Resort memories in the future.   Thanks again!

Summary: Yes folks, this is a cockroach. When I called originally, they were supposed to send someone immediately, and they didn‚Äôt. Called a second time and spoke to a supervisor, they were sold out and could not accommodate us for another room. I then asked for a manager and they then, ‚Äúfound a cancellation‚Äù. Disappointment is an understatement. The maintenance gentleman was very nice but made a comment that even he, didn‚Äôt feel very  comfortable grabbing this large cockroach  therefore my husband assisted him. Per maintenance ‚Äúwe cannot let you stay in this room cause they aren‚Äôt good for children‚Äù.
Manager Response: Dear Miriah A,  We apologize that you found a pest in your room. Please know that this is not common. Our hotel, along with several others in the Disneyland Resort area, has a company that provides routine preventative pest control; however, every now and then one manages to somehow evade the system. We do not currently, nor have we previously, had an issue with pests of any kind. Our hotel, along with many others in the Disneyland Resort area, has a company that provides routine preventative pest control. Our housekeeping supervisors also conduct routine inspections of rooms to ensure that we are pest-free. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience during your stay and hope to see you during your next visit

Summary: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to the gates of Disneyland. It‚Äôs a really quick walk which was perfect. We stayed in the front tower which was newly renovated. The rooms were nice and clean. The pool was great. We have a 5 year old and there is a zero entry part of the pool. There is also a hot tub which is a bonus. You can pick up a snack bag at the pool in the morning which consists of a water, granola and apple. My biggest complaint is that the walls are not soundproof. I could hear every conversation coming from the two rooms on either side of me. The rooftop bar is also loud but they warm you about that. Overall I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Melissabatavia,   Thank you for your feedback! We are happy that you got to experience much of what our property has to offer. We are sorry to hear that noisy neighbors. Unfortunately not all travelers are considerate of their hotel neighbors, but please know for next time that our staff will do everything possible to ensure a comfortable and relaxing experience. If noise from other guests occurs, we are always happy to look into another room location in which to move you to ensure a peaceful experience! We look forward to being a part of your Disneyland Resort memories in the future. Thanks again!

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed here on 3 or 4 Disney trips since they opened a few years ago. Our last stay will likely be our LAST stay. I booked our room months in advance telling the girl on the phone that I have AAA, AP rates, Government so please look for the lowest rate. She told us the web special was cheaper (it was not by the way) she just wanted to get us off the phone. She assured me I would get the $10 parking if I show my pass at check in.   Not only did we not get the lower rate at check in but we were promised a lower price for the room and they would not change it at the front desk because they already charged the deposit. Ok fine.   We were in a premium room and I will say, it looks nothing like the pictures they post online. Our bathroom was run down and the carpet was gross. I
Manager Response: Dear JRA87,  I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We are committed and determined on improving our hotel and your feedback assists us in achieving that goal. Every day, our goal is to please every guest that comes to stay, and we regret that we were unable to do so. Please reach out to our Front Desk Management team and one of them will be happy to discuss your experience and how we can assist your further. Thank you for your feedback and again we apologize for your inconvenience.

Summary: The Grand Legacy is within a couple of blocks to Disneyland,  The walk is quick and easy to the Park.  The room was clean andthe beds were comfortable.  The pool area is very nice and there are fun water features.  The hot tub was nice with plenty of room.
Manager Response: Dear Crnpdx,  You just made our day! We are so happy that you had a great time with us and at the Disneyland Resort! We work hard to be part of the magic of a Disney vacation... Thank you for your review and can't wait to see you next time!

Summary: Chose this hotel for the location and was very happy with it. Our room wasn‚Äôt ready upon arrival at 1:00pm so they held our luggage and we went shopping at downtown Disney. We returned at 3:00 to get ready for the day/evening. Only negative about our room was how little outlets there was for phone charging and the sink was plugged. We also had some very loud people above us, everyday they were up and stomping between 4-5am... but oh well. Would definitely come here again.
Manager Response: Dear CJNairn,   Thank you for your review and welcome to the Grand Legacy family! We are so excited that you gave us a try and that you will be back! Our wonderful staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay after all that play time at the Happiest Place on Earth. Vacation time is to be enjoyed to the fullest and we are honored to be a part of yours. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: If you're going to Disney....stay at the Grand Legacy At the Park
Summary: This is the second time I went to Disney Land with my wife and two daughters.  The location is the most important aspect for this hotel. Nothing beats being just an 8 minute walk from your hotel room to the entrance of Disney Land. The hotel is more of a retro motel with a 2nd floor walk up,....and the swimming pool is in the middle of the parking lot.  But....after spending all day in the park.....you get to sleep in a cool and clean room.....and that's all you really need.   We were at the hotel for 4 nights/3 days.....and used the pool twice in the afternoon to refresh and go back to the park for the evening. Also great is that it is next door to Denny's and Tony Roma's.  Not the cheapest but good food and portions. Here are a few tips I would recommend for Disney Land if you
Manager Response: Dear 67Tmoney,  Thank you for your review and welcome to the Grand Legacy family!  Our wonderful staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay after all that play time at the Happiest Place on Earth. We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our property and amenities! Thank you for your review and we look forward to hosting you for your next Disneyland adventure!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Excellent location, great rates, great service
Summary: We have stayed here a countless number of times, never disappoints. Excellent location, clean rooms, great service & great rates. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone who wants to be close to the parks but not pay the price for a Disney hotel. I frequently recommend this hotel to my fiends & family and have never heard a bad review after their visit.
Manager Response: Dear CEHoekenga,  Thank you for your review and thank you for being part of the Grand Legacy family! Our wonderful staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay after all that play time at the Happiest Place on Earth. Vacation time is to be enjoyed to the fullest and we are honored to be a part of yours. We are happy to know that you will be back again to see us next time...Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great Location...but Needs Some Sprucing Up
Summary: I booked this hotel for a 3 night stay with two of my gal pals for a last minute Disneyland weekend. It was great for what we needed, which was just a clean place to crash at the end of the night and less than a 5 minute walk to the park. We stayed in a Premier room with two queen beds because we wanted the double sinks and didn't want to be kept awake from the noise of the rooftop restaurant on the newer, front section of the hotel.  The decor is dated, beds were clean but the mattresses were getting on in age. There was something on the door handle of the bathroom and the microwave hadn't been cleaned but otherwise it was clean and no bugs!! (we've seen bugs at some of the neighboring hotels) The pool looked fun for kids, but is a 'parking lot pool' so as an adult in her mid
Manager Response: Dear Honesthotelreview,   Thank you for your review and we are so honored that you gave us a try this trip. Our location is central and close to the Disneyland Resort. Please know that we do have safety deposit boxes available at the Front Desk for our guests. We are happy to store your valuables and ID's for your party. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and all of our amenities.  We will use your review to help us provide a better experience for our future guests. Thank you and I sure hope that you would give us another opportunity to better serve you.

Summary Heading: Average Room, NO breakfast restaurant (disappointed), Great Location for Disneyland
Summary: Room ok, just average, a bit pricey due to location,with Disneyland right across the street. They did bring rolling bed for our neice to stay one night with us, that was nice. Literally just across the street from Disneyland. There is an IHOP just a few doors done for breakfast..They only have dinner and cocktails starting around 5pm. Rooftop cafe a nice feature.
Manager Response: Dear Pam F  Thank you for your review!  We are happy you enjoyed your room and our location. We are happy that you had a comfortable stay.The roof-top restaurant is in the front of the property so the majority of the rooms are in a different area.  Hope that you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort. Thanks again!

Summary: Front desk staff and managers can not figure out how to do their job efficiently! Had a group check into multiple rooms. Had asked staff at check-in to charge different credit card upon check in. They couldn‚Äôt even do that correctly! I had one credit card get charged for 2 different rooms entire stay. Which I spent 30 minutes working to get fixed at check out. 1 week later I had 1 credit card not refunded and charged 1 nights stay from each room. And I‚Äôm still trying to get a refund from this and being told by staff & manager this  will not happen unless I travel back there and present my card in person. However to charge my card 3 days prior they didn‚Äôt have my physical card.   Room not ready upon checkin, and I tried checking in at 2pm, and was told I‚Äôd have to wait until 3,
Manager Response: Dear Beauxx_yeuxx  We apologize for the issues you had during your stay. We strive for every guest to enjoy themselves and to feel comfortable while staying with us. I am sorry we fell short of that for your visit. We apologize that the room was not up to our routinely superior standard.Our housekeeping department is usually commended for their thorough service, with special attention to detail. I have shared your comments with the housekeeping manager to ensure that this is promptly addressed. A member of our Front Office management team has reached out to you regarding your stay; however, there has been no return call. If you would like to discuss further, please reach out to the hotel.   Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We stayed at Grand Legacy in September while visiting Disneyland. We had an awesome stay because of the updated rooms, close proximity to the parks, and incredible staff. We could walk to Disneyland in 5 minutes and the front reception staff answered all of our questions right away. The rooms are very clean and modern.
Manager Response: Dear Mark J,   Thank you for your review! We are happy you enjoyed your room and our location. We look forward to having your family stay with us again for your next Disney adventure! Thanks again!

Summary: The room was large and clean but was a little dated. However this was completely outweighed by the proximity to the parks. The rooftop bar was also a nice surprise and the morning breakfast bag was a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear Adele H,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience! As guest comfort is a priority, please know that we have been in the process of renovating our rooms, and we are nearly done! We are happy you enjoyed our amenities and the FIFTH. We look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: I was a bit hesitant staying here because of some of the reviews but I am pleasantly surprised. We stayed in the premier king room at the back of the property. Everything was amazing, from the front desk to rooms. Everyone at the front desk was helpful and I wish I remembered their names. Our room was large and clean, the bed was firm (which we loved) and had a good sized fridge and microwave. The only down side was the lack of breakfast but the snack bags are a great touch for a day at the park. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Trinity_canada,  You just made our day! We are so happy that you had a great time with us and at the Disneyland Resort! Our wonderful staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay after all that play time at the Happiest Place on Earth Thank you for your review and can't wait to see you next time!

Summary: I had high expectations due to the web site photos, other reviews, and the ‚Äòpremier‚Äô room we booked and paid for at a premier price.  When we got there it was a bit of disappointment. It started with the lobby that seemed plain and uninviting, although the staff were good.  Our room was at the back of the property in the old building, not the newer ‚Äòtower‚Äô building at the front.  It was quite a disappointment when we opened the door to our room as the room was dark, stale, and dated.  As our stay went on we became more comfortable with the room, at least in some ways.  The good: - The bed and pillows were very good which is important - The bathroom seemed more up to date than the rest of the room - We could not hear any sound from adjacent rooms - The AC worked very well - The
Manager Response: Dear WestWind12,  Thank you for giving us a try! We love having new guests stay with us. We hope to see you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort. We want all guests to feel comfortable and enjoy their time with us. Thank you for choosing our property and we hope that you had a wonderful time at the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Salem‚Äôs and Jonathan went out of their way to make our birthday stay a wonderful event. They were so nice and helpful. The room was very nice and comfortable. It was nice to have the snack bags in the morning although I do miss the mini breakfast they used to have. Pool and hot tub was great.
Manager Response: Dear BethAnn44,  We are honored that you chose our property for such an important event! Thank you for your kind praise of our staff!We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our property and amenities!  We appreciate you sharing your experience and we look forward to the next time you come to visit us. Thanks and see you soon!

Summary: I've been staying at this location since it was the Ramada Maingate (since 2010).  I recommend many family and friends to The Grand Legacy. For my August 2019 stay I experienced issues with my room for the first time, however the front desk resolved swiftly, (mind you called the front desk at 1am!!!)  Raymond was understanding and assured me they would resolve in the morning, he did NOT disappoint.  He left me in the hands of Brenda who was over the top amazing, surpassed my expectations and then some, thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Aztamiw,   Thank you for your review - and a HUGE thank you for your loyalty! We are like a family here and we are honored that you have been a part of our story for so many years! And thanks for the shout-outs for Raymond and Brenda - they are awesome and love our guests.  We'll see you for your next Disney trip... Thank you again!

Summary: I have stayed at pretty much every hotel on South Harbor and this has got to be my top 3! The hotel is so clean and well kept! The staff was so incredibly nice and welcoming, they even gave my son a pair of mouse ears upon arrival! The location in proximity to Disneyland is of course amazing as well since it‚Äôs so close. I hear people complain that they can hear a lot of the music from the outdoor restaurant that‚Äôs on the roof but I never heard anything at all.  We will without a doubt be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Natalienoahcruz,  Thank you so much for your kind words. We work very hard to provide a home away from home to all of our guests. We are glad that you and family loved our services, our dedicated staff will be pleased to see of your high praise. Thank you for being a loyal guest and we hope to see you again soon.  Thank you,

Summary: My husband and I for years celebrated our Anniversary at the Disneyland Resort.  With the extra cost of our Children in College now, we could not afford to stay at the resort this year.  We decided to stay at the Grand Legacy at the Park.  This was the best decision we made.The room was nice, the hotel staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. It was a short  walk (less than 5 mins) to the Disneyland main gate. And the room rate was excellent.  We will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Hello Trudy P,  Thank you for your review and excellent ratings. We are happy that your stay was great. We work very hard at providing great customer service and a clean and comfortable place to stay.  We hope to see you soon.  Thank you,

Summary: This hotel was situated between the convention center and the parks.  A short walk between both.  Service was excellent.  The room was nice enough for a couple night stay.  There is a nice on site pool and hot tub.  You could see the fireworks from the hotel.  added bonus
Manager Response: Dear BJB7775,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay. Please know we are here and ready for your next trip to the Disneyland Resort or next D23 expo... Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Probably the worst hotel I have ever been too.
Summary: Probably the worst hotel I have ever been too.  ¬∑ Location is about the only good thing   ¬∑ Beds and pillows were very uncomfortable. AC unit hangs in middle of wall and sounds like 18 wheeler. Bathroom and room smells musty and had mold around the shower. Killed 3 spiders. Carpet gross. Stepped on a screw that was left on the floor by staff. Probably the worst hotel I have ever stayed at. They said they didn't have a crib until I complained enough, they brought one at midnight. Instead of spending your money at this hotel, stay at any other neighboring hotel and you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Jrawlings9,  We want to sincerely apologize for your negative experience at our hotel. However, we'd like to learn more about your situation and what exactly happened. We want to make things right. So, please give me a call at (714)772-0440 ext 191. You can also email us at maira@grandlegacyhotel.com and we will get back to you promptly. We look forward to hearing from you and earning you back your business.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a week. We got a beautiful renovated room. The front desk employees were amazing, Jonathan helped us with everything we needed. The room was clean, even though it was on the first floor it was really quiet. Really close to the park entrance, that was a huge plus.  The pool was clean and nice. We usually go to Disneyland once a year, and we have stayed in other hotels, this will be our hotel from now on! :)
Manager Response: Dear Maryash1234,  We appreciate your review! Thank you for the shout-outs to our awesome staff! We all hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort and cannot wait for your next visit with us.   Thanks again!

Summary: This motel is the most friendly place with at most a ten minute walk to the Disney Parks. The staff and management go out of their way to make you feel at home and if you let them know that your children/grandchildren have a special occasion such as Birthday/Graduation they will celebrate that event with you. We have been staying here for the past 15 years as Disney hotels became too costly. We signed up to receive emails with special offers to make our reservations.
Manager Response: Dear Bearfoster,   A big thank you for sharing your experience with our property! We love being your other home! We genuinely look forward to seeing our frequent guests. It allows us to share in the fun of your vacation excitement. Thanks for making us a part of your Disney story!

Summary: This is for all the helpful-people from this fine establishment. Too April, thank you for always helping with a great room, we get great views of the fire works because of your awesomeness. Too Dora Martha marisol and Brenda thank you for all the great smiles, help and awesome vibes! and most of all Jonathan and Salena the gift was Amazing! I‚Äôm truly great-full for your kindness! Keep up the great work everyone! This guy from San Jose loves staying in your fabulous establishment. It‚Äôs my Birthday today, and you made it special. So Thank you 3000..........
Manager Response: Hi Ray,  Thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are glad that you and family loved our services, our dedicated staff will be pleased to learn of your high praise.Our staff work very diligently and it will provide them with great encouragement to keep doing what they are doing.Thank you, once again, for your kind words !

Summary: Our stay at Grand Legacy at the Park was great, locations was perfect only 5 minutes walk to disneyland. After starting our day early at Disneyland,we could walk back to our room and have a rest and continue our time in Disney Park. Very close to restaurants and public transport. We didn't get breakfast, but we got a snack pack containing water, museli bar, fruit and crackers to take with us to the park. Staff was great. Would highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Afrancois1963,  Thank you for staying with us and your feedback on your experience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: Overall our stay at Grand Legacy was fantastic. Easy (early) check in process, rooms we requested (we asked to be connecting rooms on the 1st or 2nd floor of the new tower) for our 4 families staying at the hotel. Rooms were clean, with plenty of space for us to spread out and not feel on top of one another. The beds are definitely full size beds, not queens, but after a long day at Disney we really didn't care; we crashed! The elevator did break Friday night, and thankfully my parents had gone back with the kids and stroller earlier in the evening so we weren't stuck schlepping a double stroller upstairs. I will say that on Sunday of our stay we really needed the room serviced, but when I came back with my 2 year old for us to nap around 2, the room still hadn't been done. I
Manager Response: Dear Sarahks2194IY  I‚Äôm glad to hear we were able to accommodate your request. Our location is central and close to the Disneyland Resort which is very helpful, especially when traveling with kids. We apologize that the room was not up to our routinely superior standard of cleanliness. Our housekeeping department is usually commended for their thorough service, with special attention to detail. I have shared your comments with the housekeeping manager to ensure that this is promptly addressed. Your comments are extremely valuable, and we thank you for taking the time to share about your experience. We can‚Äôt wait for your next stay with us!

Summary: Motel level good size room value for money. Old rooms need a little bit of renovation.  Breakfast not provided in the hotel.  Rooms at ground floor are accessible.  Great access to Disney park just across he road and 1 min walk to Denny's
Manager Response: Dear Diana S,  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your stay. Please know that our Room Renovation Project is nearly complete, and we would be happy to ensure you get a renovated room during your next stay. We hope that you were able to enjoy our Snack Bags on your way to the Parks. We look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights and can not fault. Location to the parks were only a 5 minute walk with plenty of food options around to eat before or after doing the parks. We arrived earlier than check in time after driving from LA and this was no issues. We were able to check in straight away with valet parking and head start to the park. The rooms are small and a little dated but, we only really need to room to shower and sleep as we were out all day. Rooms were clean and serviced daily. The roof top bar was great, and the staff were amazing and very professional and happy to have a chat. We had no issues with noise and overall, highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a hotel close to the park. Wilkl defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Sup76,  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience! As guest comfort is a priority, please know that we have been in the process of renovating our rooms, and we are nearly done! Thank you for giving our hotel and restaurant staff recognition for their hard work. We all appreciate your kind words! We are delighted you had a great time, and we can‚Äôt wait for your next stay with us! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great first time staying here, will try to again
Summary: They were running a great room price at the end of June, with free parking promotion. Requested a high floor, back of property away from the 5th nightclub. Received just what I asked for. Earlier in the morning, I had pre-checked in, to get my parking pass, and walked to Disneyland. So close, nice to leave your car behind. Room was clean, nice, everything working.  Actually used guest laundry for the first time ever. Worked out great. Hopefully they run some more specials, its really nice to just walk to the park entrance.
Manager Response: Hello Sept1967,  Thank you for the kind words. I'm delighted to hear that you had such a great experience during your stay with us!  Glad you took advantage of our free parking promotion I‚Äôm glad we meet your accommodations and request.  We are so happy you enjoyed our amenities and location! We look forward to seeing you soon in the future.

Summary: The staff here are very helpful and thankfully with their help we were able to get our vacation plans back on track! Seems that our reservations through AMA travel and WestJet vacations never got properly booked and we ended up needing a last minute place to sleep on the evening of our arrival. The staff found us another hotel off of the strip and then had us a room the very next day for the rest of our nights. Great little family outdoor pool ( bring sunscreen) was perfect for a day to relax. The hotel is right across the street from the park for quick access. No breakfast just a little snack bag and the other guest coming and going are quite noisy would be my only mark against this hotel. Thanks again to the great staff!!
Manager Response: Dear Kelly,  While we are disappointed that your reservation was improperly booked, we are happy that we were able to assist you in having a wonderful time in the Anaheim Resort. Our Front Office staff strives for all of our guests to have an excellent experience. We thank you for staying with us and being a part of the story. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact me should you have any questions or concerns. Thank you again!

Summary: We stayed here as a family of 5 in a family superior room (forgot the exact name). We got there early and after a long flight were eager just to drop our bags and rest. They were very accommodating and offered a room which was available. I was warned it was near the lift. We didn‚Äôt hear the lift at all in the 3 days we stayed. We did however hear the laundry which was next door and which the front desk failed to tell us about! I wouldn‚Äôt have minded had they just told us about it.   The room itself was clean and tidy. It seems this hotel, whilst not upmarket, was the better of the options if you‚Äôre staying outside Disneyland. It definitely is a place for families and basing yourself as close to Disneyland as possible.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Room smelled strongly of marijuana, no response from management
Summary: Stayed here with a group of friends for a trip to Disney and booked a deluxe room with a cot. We were given a room that was very spacious but absolutely REEKED of marijuana (like, so strong that it was intolerable). Someone had clearly been smoking in there and had even failed to clean up afterwards, because in addition to the smell there was actually some weed scattered on the bedspread. We told the manager who gave us a different and much smaller room, and said he would refund the cost difference of the rooms and would not charge us the daily parking fee for our trouble. The room we were in was too small to fit the cot without rearranging the furniture, our key cards would not work and maintenance had to let us in, and it was generally not in the best shape, but would have
Manager Response: Dear Emily V,  First, let me apologize for any and all inconvenience your party experienced. Guest comfort is of the utmost importance to us and we are sorry if we fell short during your stay. We are a non-smoking hotel, however, not all guests are courteous and follow those rules. I did speak to the Front Office manager and told her to be expecting a call from you regarding your stay. Please contact us and ask for Maira. She is waiting to hear from you and will assist you further. She will be in the office this weekend. Thank you for your feedback and once again, we apologize for your inconvenience.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Grand Legacy and were impressed at the overall value offered. Our room was in the newer tower and it was spacious, clean and we appreciated having a refrigerator and microwave in the room. Staff was accommodating, polite and helpful. The location is ideal if visiting Disneyland and the hotel even gave us snack bags with water, granola bar, apple and crackers to take to the park. We ate at The Park one evening and enjoyed the band. The place was very busy and staff was hopping to keep up. They did a great job checking in and had our meals delivered in a timely manner despite being busy. The food was excellent and not over-priced. We watched the fireworks from the balcony. The Park turned down the lights and played the music that accompanied the fireworks
Manager Response: Dear Schaelene R,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you got to experience our property and the FIFTH. Viewing the fireworks from our rooftop is indeed spectacular! We look forward to your next visit with us. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Functional hotel in the right place for Disney
Summary: This is exactly what you need if you want to visit Disney without paying the premium for a Disney hotel. It's located pretty much directly across the road from the entrance to Disneyland and California Adventure Park. It couldn't have been easier to walk there.   The rooms are just what you need when you're spending all day at the parks: comfortable and clean. I'd read that parking was a problem but the valet staff were really helpful and we never had a problem. Yes, you pay for parking, but remember you are walking to Disney and not paying Disney parking fees.  The rooftop bar (The Fifth) was noisy one night but we were so tired it didn't seem to matter. The next night we couldn't hear it at all. It's worth going up there to watch the Disney fireworks at 9.30pm as they play the
Manager Response: Dear BellsDubai,  Thank you for staying with us and your feedback on your experience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit with us.  Thanks again!

Summary: As always our stay here is the best and makes our trip unforgettable.  This is our favorite hotel to stay when we go to Disney.  The staff always is friendly and greets you with a smile as soon as you walk in.  Thank you to Martha for her assistance and excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Disneylfambam,  Thank you for your review... We are so happy to have you as our frequent guests! We love being a part of your Disneyland memories! Martha, along with the entire staff, looks forward to your next visit with us.  Thanks again!

Summary: We are AP at Disneyland, and we try to visit every month if not every month, and this month was a little different. My dad passed away and I needed to bring my mom on the trip. I spoke to the manager Byron, and he was so polite and quick to accommodate this! Not once did he hesitate or ask for more info. I had the honor of meeting him and the other manager I belive is Myra, both were very profesional and courteous. I will be coming back once again soon and making the 6 hour drive and this will be always my hotel of choice!! Thank you Byron for an awesome experience and my mom is forever thankful.
Manager Response: Dear jtrevino82,  We are sorry to hear of your loss. Our sympathies to you and your family. Family is important to all of us here at Grand Legacy at the Park and we are honored to have been able to be there for yours during this time. Thank you for acknowledging Byron and Myra. They were glad to be able to assist and make things as easy as possible for you all.  Thank you and our thoughts are with you...

Summary: Firstly, the location alone is amazing- right across the way from Disney! Some great restaurants around and check out the rooftop bar for some great views of the fireworks! The staff were really friendly and helpful and the little breakfast grab bag is perfect. The place was really clean and the beds were comfortable. The pool area is nice and I'm sure that on a hot day the pool is great to cool down in, otherwise a quick dip of your toes is enough with a good book to relax in the sun.
Manager Response: Dear mia1994,  Thank you for your feedback! We are happy that you got to experience much of what our property has to offer. We look forward to being a part of your Disneyland Resort memories in the future. Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here on two separate occasions, 6 day and 4 day stay. The location for the $ is very convenient (would highly recommend signing up for their email promotions). It is roughly a 5 min or less walk to the park. Staff is always nice and accommodate you as much as they can.
Manager Response: Dear Juan R,  Thanks for being a returning guest with us! We are delighted to have you as a Grand Legacy at the Park regular. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to  seeing you next time!

Summary: I usually stay at the Fairfield down the street, but they were booked up so I decided to check this hotel out. The staff is friendly, and they valeted my car for free when the parking lot was full which was cool. The price is great for the area, and a super short walk to the park which is a huge focus for me when I visit Disney.   The rooms are super spacious with HUGE bathrooms and a separate vanity from shower area which is great for groups or families. The rooms are super clean and have a mini fridge, microwave, and plenty of drawer space.   BEWARE: if you are on the fourth floor you are under the rooftop bar. You will feel like you are in a frat house and will be able to hear whatever band or music going on word for word until 1 am. Seriously. We will request a lower floor
Manager Response: Dear carlil757,  Thank you for giving us a try! We love having new guests stay with us. We hope to see you during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort. If possible noise if an issue, please give our Premier rooms a try. They are also spacious rooms with a 2 sink separate vanity. They are in a different section on property and away from our restaurant. We want all guests to feel comfortable and enjoy their time with us. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to  seeing you next time!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel with an AMAZING staff!!
Summary: Grand Legacy has been my family and friends go to place to stay when we are in Anaheim.  We are there so much that we are on a first name basis with most of the staff! When we decided to take our daughter and her friends to celebrate her 15th Birthday, there was no hesitation as to where we were going to stay. We stayed in the three bedroom suite which was extremely spacious and had a great view of the fireworks. Upon arrival,  much to her surprise and our appreciation, our suite was decorated for her birthday!  It was so thoughtful and just made the start of our vacation even more memorable.  It's these kind gestures that make Grand Legacy so welcoming and make guests, like myself and my family, feel like this is a home away from home.Thank you so much Brenda, Daisy, Jonathan,
Manager Response: Dear gigi493,  We are honored that you chose our property for such an important event! We loved seeing all of them in their special t-shirts and enjoying that time all together celebrating her birthday. We felt a part of it, and for that, we thank YOU! We appreciate you sharing your experience and we look forward to the next time you come to visit us. Thanks and see you soon!

Summary: We took a last minute trip to Disney and got a great rate w/free parking! We got the basic double room. The room was tight, but for the 2 of us it was fine. Tv had an ok selection. No Disney JR, but I needed a Disney break at night anyway.  If you‚Äôre a family of more than 2 you might want to get a premium queen room otherwise this was totally fine.  Valet was very friendly too.  I love Jimboys Tacos! So glad they‚Äôre here.
Manager Response: Dear MeganLAM,  We are happy you were able of one of our specials! Spontaneous trips to the Disneyland Resort are so fun! They bring out the kid in all of us. We are delighted you chose the Grand Legacy at the Park and we thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Grand Legacy at the ParkAnaheim, CA
Summary: Great place to stay with easy access to Disneylands main entrance. Family friendly accommodations and very helpful staff. The hotel is always clean and the pool is centrally located.   This was our 4th year in a row staying at this hotel. Looking forward to our trip next year!
Manager Response: Dear Sunny A,  We are so happy to have you as a member of the Grand Legacy Family! Thank you for your continued support and we are excited for your next visit with us.  Thank you for your review and see you next year!

Summary Heading: Right across the street from Disneyland!
Summary: This hotel is absolutely gorgeous... nice bathroom, beds are SO comfortable.  It has a rooftop bar and right across the street from Disneyland! We were able to walk to the Disneyland park and then back to the hotel for lunch. The hotel was very nice!
Manager Response: Dear tpelleti,  We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our property and amenities!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to hosting you for your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary Heading: Good Place for the Right Price
Summary: Most places close to Disneyland I am afraid to stay at because of the reputation for being cheap. Most have undergone rebranding and renovations over the years, and I was surprised when my wife said we had been here before. It‚Äôs not a Marriott or Sheraton, but it‚Äôs so close that I feel like spending more time in the park because we won‚Äôt have a long walk afterwards.  As for the room, I was concerned because the door looked like it wasn‚Äôt closed all the way when we first arrived. Maybe because they added fresh sound/water proofing, because the door was locked and easy to close. The room was spacious for our double stroller, all our junk, and ourselves. We always like smart TVs to log into our favorite streaming service. The programming was decent for what it was. The outlets on
Manager Response: Dear woodyb118,  Thank you for your review. We are always striving to provide the best experience for our guests. We appreciate your time in letting us know about your stay. Thanks again and we look forward to all your future visits!

Summary Heading: Thank you, Jonathan! Excellent customer service!
Summary: My husband and I stayed one night, with plans to go to Disneyland. Upon arrival, Jonathan greeted me at the front desk, and I received excellent customer service. His demeanor was calm and welcoming, and when I mentioned I accidentally booked queen beds instead of a king, he quickly checked if a king room was available, and he switched us. I didn't know we could receive discounted parking with our Disneyland passes, and he informed me and gave me a discount, which was wonderful because I hadn't budgeted for parking originally. When we got to the room, it was wonderful as well. Having the first contact at the front desk be so positive (after a long drive in traffic!) really set the mood for the rest of the stay. We will be returning!!
Manager Response: Dear Venture213920,  What a nice review! Thank you! And we agree, Jonathan is wonderful... We are so happy to be a part of your Disneyland vacation memories. We look forward to being a part of your next Disneyland adventure. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Ideal, location, price, room and amenities!
Summary: I am a picky hotel customer. I don‚Äôt stay in doors facing the parking lot establishments. But, for location, this hotel meets all criteria. And when I entered the room, it really had the feel and appearance of the likes of a holiday inn or even Hilton! Can‚Äôt beat it! Price is extraordinarily cheap, and beds are comfortable. I felt like I got a comped stay it was so affordable! Great option!
Manager Response: Dear Nightbrd1,  We are delighted that you chose us to be a part of your Disneyland adventure! Thank you for your review and we look forward to having your as our guests again soon!

Summary: All staff encountered was super friendly and accommodating. Quick walk / directly across the street from Disneyland main gate. Hotel was clean. Nice touch to have a snack bag to take to park with you. A good variety of places to eat nearby. I stayed with my daughter and we both felt safe, even walking back late at night.  One comment for improvement, the interior doors in my room were in serious need of touch up painting, and there was a loose tile or two on the bathroom floor. And a couple vending machines we tried were empty. Nothing that would stop me from coming back.
Manager Response: Dear Bjonthegoagain:  Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and will be back. We take pride in being a part of the history of the Anaheim Resort. Please know we are continually making improvements to our property and appreciate your feedback. We look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks again.

Summary Heading: Almost opposite the entrance to Disneyland
Summary: Found this hotel to be in the best position for Disneyland.  Great staff, very helpful in all areas, rooms clean, lots of parking spaces.  Restaurants almost next door.  Walking distance to Cheescake Factory and to town.  Each morning you can collect from the pool area and little bag of treats which consists of water, museli bar and a few other little treats to help you on your venture to Disneyland.  We were lucky to have a ground floor unit.  There is also a large self serve laundry.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Grampam2013,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to know that your stay was great and hope to see you again when you come back to the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you,

Summary: Good hotel,  clean location is awesome.  Close to Disneyland entrance. Walking distance. Didnt have to move the car. Kids liked the pool. Wish breakfast was included.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello 06010,  Thank you for your feedback, it was our pleasure to be of service and we look forward to future visits.  Thank you,

Summary: The Grand Legacy At The Park is conveniently located across from Disneyland; in fact, a very short walk across Harbor Blvd. The staff is very friendly and accommodating; meeting our needs when requested to do so. Parking is adequate for such a popular hotel; yet, valet parking is also readily available. Along with a very reliable wifi connection, our room amenities kept us quite comfortable and connected. Certainly, my family and I will stay at the Grand Legacy At The Park again!
Manager Response: Hello Tim D,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that your stay was great. We are not perfect but we work very hard at providing great customer service and a clean and comfortable place to stay. We hope to see you soon.  Thank you,

Summary: For the location this hotel is a good value.  There was loud music playing from the bar when we came back to the room from Disneyland at night but it wasn't loud enough to keep us awake (although we were at the back of the property).  The bathroom had some issues (the tile floor was loose, the pocket door didn't open easily) but the room was clean. It's an easy walk to the parks.  If you are looking for a decent economy room close to the parks, this is a good choice.
Manager Response: Hello Sara S,  Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to know that you had a good stay with us overall. I do apologize for the inconvenience with the bathroom. We thank you for staying with us, and hope that we will have the privilege of accommodating you again in the future.  Thank you,

Summary: I stayed at this hotel twice since the renovations were completed in the main building. Once in a large family suite with my family. Was horrible when we got back in the evenings there were people outside smoking and drunk from the bar upstairs. Then in our room the noise level was a ten out of ten.  No sleep until well after midnight because after the bar closed there is staff and cleanup with no noise proofing.  I complained to the manager and he was quite rude to me.  I assumed he was having a bad day and forgot about it. Fast forward a few months booked the same hotel and the main building for safety as it was a grad trip for just myself and one of my kids.  I requested the second floor and to be away from the bar are. However  when we got to check in we were put on the
Manager Response: Hello S G,  Thank you for your comments with Tripadvisor. I am very sorry to hear that you had a very unfortunate experience. I can assure you that the department managers have been notified. Our staff works very hard to keep up with our facilities and your experience has been taken into consideration. Our goal every day is to please every guest that comes to stay, and we regret that we were not able to do so for you. We are committed to improving not only ourselves, but the guest experience overall. We desire to have the opportunity to accommodate you in the future so that you may see these changes first hand.  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Horrible do not stay here, loud music blasting from bar
Summary: Do not stay here!  Our first night they had to move us at midnight due to loud and rude neighbors with adjoining door.  Then, we had to listen to the party/event at the roof top bar.  When I called the manager to complain he said there was nothing he could do but call them and ask them to turn it down.  The Fifth is part of the Grand Legacy hotel therefor their responsibility.  I wasn‚Äôt the only guest who called to complain.  Families with young children trying to rest after long days at Disneyland should not be kept up til midnight due to all the noise.
Manager Response: We are so sorry for the inconvenience you experienced! We want all our guests to have a great time while visit us and the Disneyland Resort. Please know we do offer the majority of our rooms away from the front building which houses the FIFTH. We also have many rooms that are not connecting. Guest comfort is a prime focus for us and we will work with you to find the best options for your party. Please reach out to our Front Desk Management team and one of them will be happy to discuss your experience and how we can assist your further. Thank you for your feedback and again we apologize for your inconvenience.

Summary: Room ok not what we booked we booked a suite and didn't get it. Don't try and use the bar on the roof as it's closed all week for a private event! Pool jacuzzi broken. Not happy at all. When we complained all we got was it says so on website!
Manager Response: Dear K6631CPdavidh,  We are sorry to hear of your experience. We want all of our guests to have a wonderful time at our property and we apologize if we fell short during your stay. The FIFTH is occasionally closed for private events especially during busy convention times. However, we are sorry you didn't get to have the FIFTH experience. Please reach out to our Front Desk management team at 714-772-0440 and they would be happy to discuss your visit further and how to make your next one exceptional.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: 4 Night Stay to Explore Disneyland and California Disney
Summary: Stayed 4 nights in May 2019 to see both Disneyland and California Disney with my partner and 5yr old soon. We arrived late from Washington DC, and this was no issue. Motel is right across from Disneyland. Room was spacious and well-presented. Beds were comfortable and shower was great - just needed a little bit more pressure. Rooms were warm with tea and coffee making facilities. Our rooms were towards rear of the complex so were more quiet then the front rooms. No more then 15 minute walk to both Disneyland and California Disney. We were even able to see the Disneyland fireworks from our balcony. Convenience stores and plenty of places to eat nearby if you don't want to eat at Disneyland. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear PeterAFoster,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to hosting you and your family the next time you visit the Disneyland Resort. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Perfect Location!! Great Staff! Will be back for sure!
Summary: A perfect location for your trip to Disney! A close walk to the front gate and close to restaurants. The room was a good size and they have a beautiful pool! And can't forget the rooftop restaurant they have! Live music and good drinks. Parking can get a little difficult depending how crowded the hotel is. Overall you won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear LisaPerez408,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate your time to share your experience. We love being a part of your Disneyland vacation memories. Thanks again!

Summary: I‚Äôve been back to The Grand Legacy at the Park every month. In April  my daughter had to call 911 on me. I went septic cause of the chemo. Theresa Bassett was right there helping my daughter out. Theresa and Daisy were so caring. They both called to check on me. The people make the Hotel. Theresa Bassett , Daisy, everyone at the front desk, Reggie, Housekeeping make that Hotel the best. Plus it‚Äôs close to Disneyland lol.  Thank you! I‚Äôll be back! I can‚Äôt wait to see Theresa and Daisy!
Manager Response: Dear kdtincup,  We hope that you are feeling better! Our staff does care about our guests and happy they were there to assist your daughter during that difficult time. We all look forward to your next visit - there's nothing like Disneyland to make you smile and enjoy your day. Thank you for your review and see you again soon...

Summary: My family of 4 (parents + 2 10 year olds) stayed there for 6 nights almost 2 weeks ago for the first time. Third time in Disneyland and we wanted to try the Grand Legacy. The location is fantastic both for walking to the parks as well as the other way which houses a CVS & Walgreens as well as multiple restaurants.  We had a room on the second floor of the new building (where the rooftop bar is) and yes we could hear the music. Our first night was Friday so the bar was open the longest I believe but we were so tired from travelling, it wasn't an issue. The second night (first night after a full day in the parks) the same thing, yes we could hear the music but were just too tired to care :) It was a beautiful large room, comfy beds & pillows, bigger fridge than normal which came
Manager Response: Dear ChefTop,  Thank you for your review and we are so honored that you gave us a try this trip. Our location is central and close to the Disneyland Resort which is very helpful, especially when traveling with kids. Please know that we do have safety deposit boxes available at the Front Desk for our guests. We are happy to store your valuables and ID's for your party. Our entire staff looks forward to your next visit with us and becoming your Disney home away from home. Thank you again!

Summary: We often need to book a room here at the last minute and staff are always happy to assist. Rooms are clean and large, coffee machine is great, toiletries are handy and the hotel is across from Disneyland. No need for a shuttle ride to Disneyland and Alamo is right around the corner to return your rental so no need to pay for hotel parking. However, if you do need to park, security is present and welcoming. We love the rooftop bar and yes, we could hear it a little, but nothing to worry about. Front desk staff and phone reservation staff have always been courteous and are happy to help me out with any date/room type alterations. The grab and go bags are a great idea. The granola bar comes in handy when waiting in long Disney lines. We look forward to our next stay in August and
Manager Response: Dear Enza_everywhere,  We are so happy to have you as our frequent guest! We love being part of your Disneyland vacation. Thank you for your feedback and your loyalty. We can't wait to see you in August!

Summary Heading: Close Walking Proximity+Clean Room+AP rate offers = Score!
Summary: I decided to book a last minute trip to Disneyland for my family of four and since it was a last minute trip, our normal go to South Harbor Blvd hotels were either booked solid or at a peak rate. I decided to book the Grand Legacy at the Park based on previous reviews and they also offered an AP room rate(Sweet!).  Check in during the midday was relatively smooth, the staff was professional and friendly and we were able to get checked in to our room immediately. Our room size and set up is comparable to the Marriott Fairfield Inn, but instead of a desk along the wall, there was round table closer to the door.  The overall appearance and cleanliness of the room and bathroom met expectations.  Nothing nasty or terrible to report(a Plus).  A cool amenity the rooms have that you
Manager Response: Dear AMangoKingz,  We are so happy you enjoyed our amenities and location! Our goal to provide a friendly and comfortable stay for all of our guests. Thank you for staying with us and for your feedback. We hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort! See you next time!

Summary Heading: Great location but dated accommodation needing a refurbishment
Summary: We stayed in a twin double bedded room on the ground floor with our 10 year old son as we were spending 4 days at Disneyland. I chose the hotel for the location across the road from the park entrance & the price was quite reasonable for the area. Room was smaller than I expected & was just comfy for the 3 of us. The double beds were not that comfy & too small for us to enjoy a good nights rest but that was what we‚Äôd booked. The housekeeping was inconsistent but when I rang reception they were more than happy to accommodate our requests. I used the laundry which was $2 each for the washer & dryer (very convenient). Each morning you can get a breakfast bag which included a bottle of water, apple, cheese & crackers & muesli bar. There are plenty of diners you can get American style
Manager Response: Dear JeannineW,  Thank you for your review. We are happy you got to experience a full range of our amenities. Should you visit us again, please know that we have many room types that can accommodate a wide number of guests. We want all guests to feel comfortable and ready for the vacation of a lifetime. We look forward to your return visit.Thanks again!

Summary: After a last minute decision I surprised my daughter with a trip to Disneyland for her birthday.  I contacted a travel agent and they reserved a room for my daughter and I at the Grand Legacy at the Park.  The hotel is just a 5 minute walk from Disneyland and there are several restaurant within 2 minutes.  We arrived at 9:30 am and much to our delight we were able to check into our room and purchased our park tickets and this allowed us to unpack, change and head straight for the park.  When we arrived at the Grande Legacy we were met with smiling cordial staff who were very friendly and inviting.  The room was very clean and had a microwave and small fridge and there was plenty of room to move around in.  They also provide a bagged snack every day to date with us to the park,
Manager Response: Dear juliarenee2017,  We LOVE birthdays around here! Disneyland and birthdays are a perfect combination!  We are honored that you spent such an important occasion with us. Thank you for sharing your experience. We look forward to your next trip to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Excellent Hotel to stay at. Rooms are great and the staff is even better. Everyone is so friendly and accommodating. I even managed to goof up my reservation and they worked very quickly to help me fix it...thank you Byron for your help, as well as for your staff‚Äôs help.
Manager Response: Dear HyattsRiots,  Thank you for your review! Byron and our entire staff are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit to the Happiest Place on Earth. Thanks again!

Summary: The Grand legacy was average, booked a last minute stay through Alaska and picked this hotel based on reviews. Was slightly disappointed wanted to stay here based on how clean the previous reviews were. While the room was clean it wasn‚Äôt my standard of being extremely clean. The hotels and sheets were cheap but again for the price and distance to the park a five minute wait this was fine. The hotel provides a grab and go bag which was great. A few negatives our hand towels were never replenished for the stay nor was toilet paper. Maid service did not clean our room until 5 pm one day. Would I stay here again yes for the right rate if you want something fancy and quite do not stay here. This hotel worked for what we needed for a last minute trip but I don‚Äôt think I would stay
Manager Response: Dear Shannon H,  Thank you for the feedback on your room. Please know that is not our norm. We have a stellar Housekeeping department and your comments have been forwarded to our Executive Housekeeper. Guest comfort is a top priority! We are also in the middle of renovating our rooms so you will have an upgraded experience for your next Disney adventure. We are happy that you chose us for your impromptu trip! We welcome you back at any time!

Summary Heading: Will return again - to the newer renovated rooms
Summary: We are currently having our final night (6th) at the Grand Legacy, our stay from Apr 26-May 2.  We booked the standard deluxe room which was right across from an entrance to the pool which was really nice.  Their splash pad and swimming pool really adds value to your stay if you have small kids that love to swim, as do the snack bags they provide every morning with a water bottle and snacks for everyone in your room.  I would recommend this place to a friend with one caveat... The water pressure in the shower sucks.  I asked some others in the pool area this afternoon if their water pressure was horrible too and they said that they were in the front newly renovated building and their showers had good pressure, so if I were to book again I would try and get a room in that
Manager Response: Dear alicia156,  Thank you for your review and your feedback. Feedback is important and used to improve the guest experience. We appreciate your time to share with us.  Please know that we are in the middle of room renovations and making improvements. We are happy that overall you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to your next visit with us and hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort! Thanks again!

Summary: Just wanted to say that I had an excellent time that the service was perfect the room was excellent and I will definitely be back soon. If you just need to get away for a night and have a good time this is the place. I especially want to say thank you to Teresa for setting up my reservation and making a memorable night for myself and all my friends.
Manager Response: Dear Tim B,  Thank you so much for your review! We are delighted to have you as our guest and be your Disney home away from home! Thanks for the shout-out to Teresa. She and the front desk staff are excellent!  See you soon!

Summary: Great location, couldn't get much closer to Disneyland.  Staff friendly and helpful.  A bit rundown and motel like but functional for what we needed.  Air conditioner was very noisy in room and perhaps needs a bit of TLC.  The Fifth was always booked out but great to see fireworks from.
Manager Response: Dear MissJane41,  Thank you for your review! We are delighted that you enjoyed our property. We take pride in being part of the Resort history. We are currently in the middle of renovating rooms to continue to be a guest favorite and THE place to stay when visiting the Happiest Place on Earth. We all look forward to your next visit with us.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: 5 STARS for an upgraded Motor Inn
Summary: We were so glad to find Grand Legacy for our Anniversary stay.  It was suggested by family/friends.  We are DVC members and always have trouble getting rooms because they are sold out at the Grand California, they simply do not have enough DVC rooms in Cali so we NOW HAVE A NEW GO TO DISNEY HOTEL and cannot wait to go back. Its an older Motor Inn that has been remodeled, budget friendly.  We were originally in back of hotel which was fine for the price but they moved us because AC broke.  They sent maintenance to fix it but we did end up with a new room in Front tower facing Harbor Blvd and this was Best View 4th Floor.  They warned us it can be noisy from Roof top Bar just above but we figured we would try it and glad we did. The noise was muted to some degree and just did not
Manager Response: Dear Debbie L,  Thank you for your review and welcome to the Grand Legacy family! We are so excited that you gave us a try and that you will be back! Our wonderful staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay after all that play time at the Happiest Place on Earth. Vacation time is to be enjoyed to the fullest and we are honored to be a part of yours. Thanks again!

Summary: We have been coming here to stay at least once a month for the past year. The care we receive by the hotel staff is the best. They know us by name and always ask how we are. We have tried some of the other hotels near by and hands down would recommend this hotel over all of them.
Manager Response: Dear CGx4,  A big thank you for sharing your experience with our property! We love being your Disney home-away-from-home! We genuinely look forward to seeing our frequent guests. It allows us to share in the fun of your vacation excitement. Thanks for making us a part of your Disney story!

Summary: Can't say enough about this awesome hotel and it's friendly staff. Theresa took such good care of us and made sure we had everything we needed, plus some sweet extra surprises!! Martha was terrific during check in as well!! We enjoyed our stay tremendously, The Fifth was sooo much fun!!
Manager Response: Dear WendyReiterByars,  We appreciate your review! Thank you for the shout-outs to our awesome staff! We all hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort and cannot wait for your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Grand Legacy hotel and it was a wonderful experience.   Location to Disneyland was great.  The room was very clean, staff was very friendly and helpful.   Snack bags were a nice treat in the morning. Consisted of a bottle of water ( which costs a minimum of $4 in the park), granola bar, cheese and crackers as well as a piece of fruit.   I would highly recommend this as a place to stay when visiting Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear janiceburby,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay. Please know we are here and ready for your next trip to the Disneyland Resort... Thanks again!

Summary Heading: My Go To Hotel For the Past  Seven Years!
Summary: I have stayed here 2-3 times a year since 2012 and keep coming back!  It really is all about the Location, which is a short 5-7 min walk to the security lines of Disneyland.   Yes they charge for parking, as does every hotel in the area. And no they do not have a breakfast buffet, but do provide a snack pack which should get you going in the mornings.  I am not a breakfast eater, so this is not an issue for me.  They provide several room types and rates that should fit most people, from basic motel style rooms, to the brand new Tower rooms, which have become my preference.  I gave a 5 star rating, but I am going to ding them on one Major issue and that is the noise level from the roof top bar.  This was my first time to be on the 4th floor, which is under the rooftop bar and the
Manager Response: Dear TxNurse,  Thank you for your review and for being a long-time loyal guest! We SO appreciate our repeat guests!  We do apologize for the noise you experienced. As you stated, we have many different room types and are happy to assist you in finding the best for your party. Thank you for your patience! We hope you had a great time at the Parks.  Thank you again!

Summary: Hotel was very clean and staff was amazing.Disneyland across street , very easy entrance . Was able to watch fire works right from our room.very family friendly pool with water pad activity‚Äôs for the younger children .
Manager Response: Dear 639sandyl,  We appreciate your review! We are delighted that your family enjoyed our property and location. Kids do love our pool and it's a nice place to take a break from the crowds at the Parks. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Quince buy out at The Fifth!
Summary: I would like to acknowledge some customer service excellence from Theresa, Jessica and Christian. I recently reserved the entire roof st The Fifth and I can‚Äôt begin to tell you what a sigh of relief from the customer experience, dedication and teamwork from these three individuals. Theresa went out of her way to ensure our accommodations where beyond perfect! Jessica at the Fifth during our event was attentive to our needs and met every request even those I didn‚Äôt expect to be inherited but every step of the way she was cool, relaxed and collected. Now Christian omg!!!! Wow, someone please find his mom and dad and just simply commend them for what an amazing individual he is! He was ahead of the game and a step ahead each time! Never missed a beat! With Christian I know for
Manager Response: Dear Millie R,  Thank you for your review! We all are so happy that your event went well and that a good time was had by all! Thank you for the shout-outs to our awesome team members. They all work hard to make our guests feel at home and that they have an exceptional experience. Thank you again for your feedback and for choosing the FIFTH to host your very special event!

Summary: We arrived early morning after driving all night we were hoping for an early check in, however you were fully booked. That is fine so we decided we would drive to Hollywood where we had planned to spend our day so we asked for the key to the scooter we ordered. The person managing the front desk told us that wasn't our scooter when it clearly had my name on the tag as I had to point out to him, then we were told he could not find the key and we wouldn't be able to get the key until check-in. We paid for the scooter for our day today which is why we had it delivered the night before. So I explained we needed the key for the day he said he couldn't find it and we would have to wait until 9AM for the manager to come in, we had plans to be in Hollywood by 7AM so that ruined our
Manager Response: Dear melissa o,  We are sorry to read of your experience. Please know that this is not our norm. Without more information, we are unable to know with whom you interacted. We do have some newer staff members and we will ensure they know all the procedures with regard to early morning arrivals and scooter rental drop-offs. While we do have limits as far as the physically handling of scooters (the agreement is between the guest and scooter company), we will review scooter protocol with the front desk staff. We apologize for your inconvenience. Thank you for your feedback. We hope you had a wonderful time at the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Fan of Grand Legacy at the Park
Summary: We always stay here when visiting  Disneyland. It's a 5 min walk to the entrance. It beats paying  the current price of $25 to stay at the Disney parking lot. It will cost you $17 per day to park your car at the hotel's lot. The rooms are clean, and comfortable.   FYI,  if you want a quiet slumber,  ask to not be placed under the rooftop disco, which starts around 10 PM.      We had a hard time sleeping with the loud constant beating of the disco music. I've booked a stay in June 2019 and have requested  a quieter room in the older part of the hotel.  Otherwise,  the fairly newly remodeled rooftop area  would be ok for the younger crowd.  All in all, it's  a great hotel. I don't  stay anywhere  else.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie N,  Thank you for your review. We are excited that you will be staying with us again soon. You are correct in that we have plenty of remodeled rooms in different areas of the property that are not subject to any issues relating to The FIFTH. We have something for everyone! Thanks again and see you soon!

Summary Heading: Short walk to Disney, great staff and accommodations
Summary: We are so glad we stayed at the Grand Legacy @ the Park. It was an easy short walk with our kids. Great snack bag at the pool house, perfect for Disneyland! Easy access for parking if you have a car. Pool super nice and not too big for keeping an eye on the kids!
Manager Response: Dear coreeterjeson:  Thank you for your review of our property! We are so happy to have you as our guests. We look forward to your next visit to the Disneyland Resort - we will be here to welcome you back!  Thanks again

Summary Heading: Great Location, Complementary Breakfast Snack and Great Staff!
Summary: Solid hotel for your stay in Disneyland. Right across the street and down one block from the main gate so fantastic if with children as we were. Staff was courteous and always willing to quickly assist. Rooms are starting to get a little dated, but still, very clean and roomy with all the general amenities required. Enjoyed our stay, had a great view of the fireworks from our room and the pool was great and had a nice family atmosphere. Would stay here again with the family.
Manager Response: Dear Brad M,  Thanks for your review! We are delighted you enjoyed your stay at our property! Please know we are in the process of renovating rooms - we haven't gotten to them all yet but are diligent in our quest. In the meantime, our excellent housekeeping department keeps them clean, well-stocked, and ready for the eager Disneyland visitor! Hope you had a great time and we can't wait for your next stay with us... Thanks again!

Summary: I depend on reviews when booking hotels but rarely post. This place earned a post. Next time I'll go somewhere else. Pros: location is excellent for Disneyland. It's literally across the street. On the same block there are several breakfast options you can walk to before hitting the park (McDonald's, IHOP, Denny's, Panera).
