Snack bag every morning was nice (apple, water bottle, crackers, granola bar). Room was clean but my compliments stop there. Cons: WORST mattresses ever. Just horrible.  Even the kids complained. Felt like cement. Employees were ok. Front desk was nice. Valet guys were cocky. Whipped cars around the lot. We witnessed this several times. My husband had to even jump out of the way once.  Parking spots are narrow. If you can't find one on your own valet will
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer B,  While we appreciate your feedback, we are sorry you did not have a perfect stay with us. Your feedback will be shared with the appropriate management. We hope you enjoyed your time at the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Check-in was easy, we came early and was able to park the car and go to Disneyland till our room was available later.  When we came back everything was ready for us to go to our room.  The staff was helpful and nice.  I booked directly at the hotel to get the best price, which I appreciated.  Walking distance was easy to Disneyland. We checked out at 4:30 am with no problems and were on the road in minutes going home.
Manager Response: Dear Jewels J,  Thanks for your review! We are delighted that you had a great stay with us. Our staff is the best and do all they can to ensure an easy check in and check out experience. We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: Good location. Clean, decent room.  We love the separate bathroom from the vanity area and daily snack bag. They do charge you $17 daily for parking. *Try to request a room in the front building, closest to the street. I wish I had asked. Your feet and children will thank you later if you are visiting the parks.
Manager Response: Dear emilymacemilymac,  Thank you for your review! We are happy you enjoyed our property and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Thanks!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel for the last 35 years. I would not stay any where else.  The hotel is always clean and kept up.  The manager and her staff are always friendly and helpful. This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear mweatherill7574,  Thank you for your review - and a HUGE thank you for your loyalty! We are like a family here and we are honored that you have been a part of our story for 35 years! We'll see you for your next Disney trip... Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Great place, great service, crummy on associated "fees". Won't stay there again.
Summary: Very decent price for the room. But...they added $20 per night "occupancy" tax, and $17 a night for parking. Then the staff member had the nerve to ask $1 contribution for autism, which I fully support and contribute. Why don't they take that dollar off the parking fee? Fair exchange isn't it? No, not even for $17 a night. Great location and room, but the ancillary costs...no way. Oh yes, great choice for breakfast! Sack containing 16 oz. water, small granola bar and an apple. Forget about it...
Manager Response: Dear strangeteacher,  We are happy that you enjoyed our property and staff but sorry you were disappointed in the fees. Please know that in the city of Anaheim there is a combined total of 17% in occupancy / tourism tax. All local hotels charge this. We do list all fees in our confirmation letter along with listing our parking information on all sites. Parking is a major issue in the Anaheim Resort and it requires management and maintaining. Unlike other hotels, we do not have a resort fee, or charge for items like rollaways or cribs. In addition, we do offer our guests complimentary wi-fi. We do our best to hold fees to a minimum. We do hope to see you again for your next Disneyland adventure... Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Just Confirming What I Said LAST year!!!!!
Summary: We returned this year and stayed at GRAND LEGACY as we were completely pleased with the facilities, the fabulous staff, and the motel's proximity to the park. This year our group had joining rooms back in the second level around the pool and although a bit more of a walk it was nothing. There is an elevator to the three levels at the back so mobility challenged access is not a problem. As we are fly-in guests we do not need a parking spot but it is supervised paid valet parking and does get very crowded so I can see how that might be a problem for those guests with cars. The pool MUST be heated (although I do NOT know that as a fact) as there were lots of kids in it during some very COOL afternoons this MARCH BREAK. And I can't add much more to my review from February 2018. This
Manager Response: Dear DougWighton,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to have you as our repeat guest. Please know we continual strive to improve the guest experience and appreciate your feedback. We hope that you and your family had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort! Thanks again!

Summary: Decent hotel that's super close to Disneyland.  Literally across the street from the park entrances.  The hotel itself is average.  A bit old despite the new renovations.  AC/heater wall units can be very loud.  Breakfast is free but only offers the basics like muffins, hard boiled eggs (which go fast), cereal, and coffee.    Biggest complaint is the parking.  There just isn't enough parking spaces.  If you come back to the hotel in the evening, it's difficult to find parking.  Hence, despite the great location, I avoid staying here due to the parking.  It used to be our go-to place when we visit Disneyland and we've stayed here a lot.  However, we now prefer other hotels nearby where parking isn't a problem.
Manager Response: Dear Z2G35,  We are happy that you like our location! We are part of Anaheim history and have grown along with the Parks throughout the years. Currently, we are in the second half of our renovation and happy to have fresh new rooms for our guests! From your comments, it appears that you stayed with us a while ago. To give you an update - We replaced our breakfast and now offer Snack Bags from 7 AM to 9 AM each morning.  They contain fruit, granola bar, crackers, and bottled water. Our guests appreciate the grab and go convenience.They are handy to take to the Parks!  Also, we have a brand new Parking/Valet company to handle all parking concerns. We have made some adjustments and there are now more spaces available on property. If you have any troubles finding a spot, valet is available and continues to be at no additional charge to self parking. We would be delighted to have you stay with us again! We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for your review.

Summary: Glad we booked this hotel. The rooms were clean and beds were comfortable. The location couldn‚Äôt have been better! It was across from the parks! And the snack bags they offer was perfect to grab as we headed to the parks in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Fawn P,  Thank you for your review! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to being your Disneyland home-away-from-home! Thanks again!

Summary: just far enough to keep it quiet, just close enough to not break a sweat carrying back a sleeping child. i had an issue with my booking and called the next day to verify, prices shot up but they still honored what i saw. great customer service and very clean!
Manager Response: Dear Bryana M,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoy our location and that we were able to handle your reservation to your satisfaction. Hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort!  Thanks again!

Summary: Great location & Great Customer Service Clean rooms. Love when i check in & The front desk already knows me by my name. Everything you need is all in walking distance. By far my favorite hotel. Love this Hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear JO90250,  We love reviews like this - as we love our repeat guests! Our seasoned Front Desk staff enjoys our "regulars" and we all look forward to their arrivals throughout the year(s). We are so happy to be your Disney home away from home. Thank you for your review!

Summary: This is my second time staying at this hotel, but first since it's been rebranded from Ramada to Grand Legacy.   Pros: Location. I love staying across the street from Disneyland and walking to the park.  Grab & Go snack bag. The cheese & crackers, granola bar, apple and water bottle were nice to snack on while walking to the park.  Front desk staff was great.   Cons: Sliding bathroom door. I jammed my finger one morning trying to open the stupid door. Carpet was worn and dirty. I doubt we had a renovated room because it felt old. At least the bed was comfortable and the water was hot.   I'd stay here again if the price was right, but it's often more expensive than a couple other options that are actually closer to the crosswalk. I preferred it as the Ramada.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon H,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback so we may continually improve. We want to be the place where you can relax and rejuvenate for all that Disney fun. Thanks again...

Summary Heading: We stayed on March 11-14, 2019 and will be staying there again.
Summary: Our room was a nice size and everyone was very helpful. I just wish there was additional parking by our room. Each night we had to search for a parking space within walking distance to our room. I had a scooter delivered from One Stop Mobility and they were very helpful with my scooter.
Manager Response: Dear washingtoncountyutah,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you will be returning for your next Disneyland adventure! Parking is an issue in the Anaheim Resort. Please know that we offer valet parking at no additional cost for our guest. You can leave the parking to us! Thanks again and see you soon...

Summary: We travel to Disneyland several times a year and have stayed at multiple hotels in the Disney area. We first came to the Grand Legacy because of the location and have stayed there ever since. The location is perfectly located across the street walking distance to the park, there is a great rooftop bar for adults, there is great restaurants attached to the hotel and there is valet parking which is convenient. Our stay every time is pleasant, the staff is very friendly, rooms are spacious and very clean, beds are comfortable and to top it all off the manager Theresa is an absolute rockstar. She is the perfect example of what a hotel manager should be, she always has an upbeat attitude, makes guests feel at home and makes sure we enjoy our stay every time. Overall VERY happy with
Manager Response: Dear petersandoval45,  Thank you for the review! We appreciate kinds words!  Theresa, along with the whole staff, works hard to make the Grand Legacy your Disney home away from home. We are honored to have you as a part of the Grand Legacy Family! Thanks again!

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at most of the neighbor hotels at Disneyland, and this was by far the worst one I‚Äôve seen. We had to be moved to a different room two times during our stay due to several different issues. The first room had a front door that was sagging off the hinge, and as my wife and I were looking at it, a giant spider popped through from outside. It also provided absolutely no noise or heat insulation. Every sound from the parking lot and adjacent rooms came through crystal clear.  After we complained, they moved us to a room with a broken desk lamp and a bed that was in really bad shape. The frame screeched when we sat on it and the springs inside the mattress were noticeably bent or broken. Also, there were dusty cobwebs in the corners of the ceilings, caked dust and dirt
Manager Response: Dear fleedar,  While we appreciate your feedback, we apologize for your experience. We are a property with a rich history in the  Anaheim Resort area and we take pride in being a positive part of our guest's Disneyland memories. With that long history, comes the inevitable need for refurbishment. Please know we are in the year-long process of renovating rooms. As I do not have your stay information, it appears you stayed in rooms awaiting their turn for renovation. I apologize that you had multiple issues and that you were left with a bad impression. Your description is not our norm and will be addressed with our management team. Please call our Front Desk Manager, Theresa, and she will be able to deal directly with your issues and concerns. Again, we thank you for sharing your experience so we may see areas needing focus.

Summary: There was an error on my booking (my annual pass holder was marked for a better deal and partial parking fee), they were quick to fix it and appreciated me being a frequent guest there, overall, they have such great customer service and that means a great deal to me!
Manager Response: Dear DaisyTG,  Thank you for your review! So happy that we got the mix-up all cleared up for you and that you were able to start the fun. We do appreciate our frequent guests - thanks for making the Grand Legacy at the Park your Disney home away from home!

Summary Heading: No respectful hotel would have a loud party going on while their guest tried to sleep.
Summary: We came here to enjoy Disneyland for 5 days.  2 of those nights they had parties with loud music blaring above us until 11pm.  We didnt get much sleep. Extremely disappointed.   I do not recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Wander288589,  We are sorry that you had any difficulties at our hotel. We want our guests to have a wonderful time and we apologize for any issue you experienced. We do our best to lessen any noise issues. Please know that we have many room options that are in more quiet areas. We are happy to assist our guests in finding the best option for their stay. Please call the hotel directly if can assist you further. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Everything was perfect except the coffee creamer it was not good I will deff. Stay here again and recommend it to others. It's very close to Disney and a awesome value. I booked threw a travel agent Jennifer dormer whimsical destinations
Manager Response: Dear Departure218573,  Thanks for your review and sorry about the coffee creamer! We are happy the rest of your stay was perfect and that you had a great time! Thanks again!

Summary: I booked this hotel for a work event in the area. After contacting the hotel due to an issue with my online booking, I was directed to the hotel manager, Theresa. I was refreshed to find that Theresa was immediately very friendly and helpful! She was incredibly patient in resolving the issue and made sure that I felt accommodated. Because of her exceptional customer service, I will definitely be coming back to the Grand Legacy hotel!
Manager Response: Dear AdventurePursuit2019,  Thank you for your review and for the shout out for Theresa. She is awesome! We are all happy you felt welcome and we are excited for your next visit with us. Hopefully next time will be more Disneyland fun and less work! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disney, rooms were great, except for the hard mattress.
Summary: We had a room on the 3rd floor.  Vibration and sound from The Fifth was a little loud, but we were so tired it didn't keep us awake.  The mattress' were extremely hard, but had a nice variety of pillows.  The snack pack was the same every day, but it was nice to have the bottled water and snacks every day.  We had 2 adjoining rooms (which they called a suite), and it would have been nice if there was a table in one of them, instead of the desks.  Bathrooms were clean, and the staff seemed friendly. It was a great location, and only a 5 minute walk or so to Disney.  Overall it was a very good experience and I'd stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Karla W,  Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us during your Disneyland adventure! We would love to have you stay with us for your next adventure and would be happy to find a room location that works for your party. Thank you again!

Summary: The only positive about this hotel is the close distance to Disneyland. My family (2 adults/2 kids) stayed here for the first time during one of our Disney trips. We have stayed at many of the hotels that are walking distance to Disney so thought we would try this place. Never again!  We had a deluxe room. The mattress and pillows were horrible!  Pillows were either hard or too soft. Mattress felt like a box spring. The bedding was so thin so we had to turn up the heat. Then the rooftop restaurant/bar is actually a nightclub with music til 2 am. We could hear the music and then had to hear the loud drunk people walking around. We actually checked out early as we couldn‚Äôt handle a second night. Staff didn‚Äôt care and were not helpful at all.  Cleanliness was less than average. We
Manager Response: Dear 559aureliah,  We are sorry to hear of your experience on our property. We want all of our guests to enjoy their stay with us. Please know we are in the process of remodeling rooms a section at a time. Mattresses are being replaced in that process. And yes, we have a restaurant on property that has music. However, it is not open until 2 AM and music stops before that time. We also have security on property so hotel guests are not disturbed by Fifth patrons. We do care for our guests. We work diligently to provide a great experience for all the families that stay with us each day and I sincerely apologize that you had a less than great experience. Please contact our Front Desk Manager if you would like to discuss further your stay. She would be happy to assist. Thank you.

Summary Heading: 5th floor bar Music is loud like earthquake and room is shaking.
Summary: We stayed at the luxury room on 4th floor, which is recently updated and everything is clean. The problem is the room is located right below their 5th floor bar which they have a music party every night until midnight. The music and the bass is so loud and my entire room is shaking like earthquake. It just keep boom boom boom boom until midnight and it is impossible to sleep. Friday and Saturday night are even worse because they have a full house at the bar so you can even hear people walking around upstairs.  Location is perfect and it is 5 mins walking to Disneyland. If you don't sleep before midnight, this is the room for you.
Manager Response: Dear babieblackcat,  We apologize for the noise you experienced. We do all we can to lessen the noise, but some rooms in the front building can be affected. Please know that we do have many other room options that are in different locations that do not have this issue. We are happy to assist our guests in finding the best room type and location for our guests. Thank you for your feedback and please don't hesitate to call our Front Desk Manager, Theresa, if you would like to discuss your stay further. Thank you.

Summary: The staff was Great. They were great with fulfilling our request through out our stay. Location to Disneyland is within walking distance. Rooms where very clean could use some updating. Plenty of self parking. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear ericar439,  We are delighted to know you will be returning to stay with us! We are continuing to improve our property and remodeling our rooms so returning guests feel even more comfortable.Thanks again for your review!

Summary Heading: Always out #1 choice when going to Disneyland!
Summary: The onsite food options are so good and reasonable. Jimboys tacos is AMAZING!! Short walk to the park main entrance. Comfortable rooms, and a nice break from the fun at Disney. The hot tub is a great place to relax after a long day on your feet. The morning snack bags are a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear michelesd,  Thanks for your review and for being a repeat guest with us! We are delighted that you enjoy our location and amenities! Isn't the hot tub great for soaking your tired feet after miles of walking at Disneyland? Perfect way to end the day!  Thanks again and we can't wait to see you on your next trip to the Happiest Place of Earth!

Summary: Great location if you want to be able to walk to Disneyland. Room was nice, on the small side, but decent. We did have a problem with not being able to close the sliding bathroom door all the way, which their maintenance people were not able to resolve, which made things a bit awkward for the four days we were there. Front desk staff were friendly, parking was a bit of an issue, room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Dr_SS_AZ,  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you had issues with your bathroom door. Some issues cannot be fixed in an occupied room. While moving rooms is not ideal, we are happy to try and find a better situation for you. We fell short during your stay and apologize for your inconvenience. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you had a magical time at the Parks.

Summary: Location is excellent in relation to Disney Parks, local restaurants, and convenience stores. Room was very clean and comfortable. I appreciated the multiple types of pillows and the comfortable beds. Easy to control the heat/air temperature and lighting. Good water pressure in shower and water was always hot. Surprisingly quiet for being so close to the street and restaurant. Check in was a breeze,friendly and helpful staff. Did not make time to use the pool, but it looked to be in great condition. To go snack bags offered each morning. We will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Jen0372,  We appreciate your detailed review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and will be a repeat guest. We know the importance of being comfortable so you can refresh for the long days at the Parks. Playing is serious business! : )  Thanks again and see you next time!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay so much here! It was my daughters birthday and I just mentioned it. Then they delivered to our room a gift with a hand written note, chocolate, mouse ears and toys in a princess bag! It made her feel like such a princess honestly even more than she did at disneyland! The room was perfect! I think we had a luxury room or something. I was worried about reviews I read about noise because of the rooftop bar but I had no problems at all. We were on the 2nd floor. Every staff member we encountered was so nice from the valet guys that let me park there for a couple minutes to unload to the front desk people that held our luggage the day we checked out. Thank you so much everyone! I will be recommending to everyone
Manager Response: Dear Noboundaries3690,  Thank you for your review. We are so happy we knew about your daughter's birthday! Celebrations are a favorite for our staff. We love being a part of the festivities when we are informed of our guests special events. Our front building rooms can experience noise, but only occasionally. We are happy that you enjoyed your room and that your stay was fit for a princess!  Thanks again!

Summary: The only nice thing about this hotel was the location. There was dust, blood and dirt on most things in the room. When checking in it was very un welcoming. We went to our room to see an old motel 6 style room. Then went to the front desk to ask about the rooms on the websites, to then find out they have non available. It was disgusting! Do not stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Keyvon P,  We are sorry to hear about your experience. Please know that this is not our norm. We have reached out to get more feedback from you and to see how we may assist you further. Please contact the hotel and ask to speak with our Front Desk Manager, Theresa. She will be happy to discuss your stay with you. We want our guests to feel welcome and enjoy their stay with us. We are sorry if that was not your experience. We all hope you enjoyed your time at the Parks. Thank you...

Summary Heading: Great hotel, good value and close to Disney.
Summary: Great hotel, good value and very close to Disney.  Very clean and walking distance was minimal.  Quiet too!  (Except the fireworks, of course) Parking was reasonable and staff were friendly and efficient.  We will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Phil P,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you will be a regular with us. We hope to see you soon! Thanks again...

Summary: This is a great place to stay for the price! It is located very close and within a short walk to Disney. There are lots of eating choices close by. We really like the snack pack given in place of breakfast. It's perfect to take to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear AZGramms,  Thank you for your feedback - we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you on your next Disneyland adventure. Thanks again!

Summary: I finally got a weekend with my two daughters....just us. We are Disneyland fans, so I immediately thought of the Grand Legacy. LOVE this place! Rooms are nice, the staff is always helpful and smiling, and it's across the street from the entrance into the parks. The grounds are always clean and the cleaning staff is top notch! There's a rooftop lounge with great drinks and food too, which is really convenient. I always recommend this hotel to my friends, and no one is ever disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear sprty29,  Mother and daughters trip are so great! Thanks for staying with us during your special trip! We appreciate your business and for referring us to your friends. The more the merrier!  Thank you again!

Summary: Great location for the price of the hotel.  Rooms could use a little bit of TLC, but they were clean.  The sink had trouble draining and we reported it when we checked out.  We were in the second room in on the driveway.  It was very noisy with people walking by and cars, but we were happy to be so close to the main street and walk to Disneyland.  Were disappointed the Fifth was closed most of the time we were there due to inclement weather as it was one of the main reasons we booked.  Will definitely look to stay at the Grand Legacy during our next Disneyland vacation for the value and location.
Manager Response: Dear The_Pryors_2018,  Thank you for your review and for informing us of the sink issue. We handle those issue immediately and appreciate your feedback. We are in the process of remodeling rooms so they are getting that TLC. In your future stays - we can put you a bit farther back so you aren't so close the the driveway. And hopefully there is nicer weather for the FIFTH enjoyment! Thank you again and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stay every time we go to Disney! The rooms are a good price, clean and comfy. The staff is always nice and very helpful.  We have young children that still take naps, this hotel is a 5 minute walk so its very nice to be able to get to and from the park so quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Peggy G,  Thank you for your review! Isn't Disneyland even more magical with young children? So happy we get to be part of your Disneyland memories. Thank you for staying with us and we will see you next time!

Summary: Just stayed at the Grand Legacy for the second time this past November. We have stayed at DLH and a rental condo in the past. While DLH is fantastic and really gives you that "Disney" experience, you certainly pay for it! Grand Legacy has everything we needed and wanted from a hotel: close to the park, so we never had to get in our car, easy parking, clean rooms, a pool and easy access to the freeway. It is one of the closest hotels to the park entrance (less walk time than DLH), which makes it perfect when you want to go back and forth throughout the day.   From the top floor lounge/bar, you can see the fireworks. They have good drinks and a comfortable place to relax after a day at the park. Highly recommend this hotel for any sized group.
Manager Response: Dear havok1314,  We are so happy to have you as a repeat guest! It is our goal to enhance the Disneyland Resort experience. We are here for all your future Disneyland adventures! Thanks for your review!

Summary: What a great time we have had. From our arrival with valet/bell person being super helpful to our check in process with Theresa Bessett greeting us with a welome gift and smiles from staff.  I had called ahead due to arriving early and the manager of housekeeping made sure one of our two rooms was ready.  When we got to room I was amazed at how beautiful and clean everything was,  no odor or perfumes to mask any odor,  I loved that!!  I can hardly wait to see the fireworks from the restaurant on top floor tonight.  We were made to feel special by all employees, even the housekeeping crew in the hallways later.  It is nice to see a smiling staff,  someone is doing something right here.  I‚Äôm sure having a positive manager (Theresa Bessett) helps to spread the happiness and
Manager Response: Dear sunshinegirl1058,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to accommodate all the requests that we will are able. Thanks for calling ahead to let us know. Theresa is great with making things happen and we appreciate your shout-out for her. We look forward to your next stay with us...Thanks again!

Summary: The walk to the entrance of the park is minimum, so when you go back to the hotel at the end of the day you barely feel the walk. The price rate is not that high even with the amazing location. The beds are so comfortable, even more after a long day at the parks and the bathroom is really big. In general the room is really clean and pretty. Next time I go to the parks I‚Äôm totally staying there again!!!
Manager Response: Dear elisacs29,  We are so happy you have found your property! We happily welcome you to the Grand Legacy Family! Thank you for your review and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Nice room and pool area...breakfast is lacking...an apple, granola bar, cheese ands crackers and an apple
Summary: We enjoyed our stay as the room rate of $142.22 (plus $17 for parking), so $159.22 per night is pretty reasonable for being so close to Disneyland.  Our room was very nice with a large bathroom and sinks outside of the bathroom and it had a refrigerator,  microwave and table and chairs in the room, which we prefer to a desk, so you can eat in your room.   There is a restaurant on the roof but we never ate there so I can't comment on it.  The menu was pretty limited. We ate at Jimboys Tacos next door one night and they were the best tacos I have ever had.   The pool and hot tub area was very nice and there is a large very shallow area in the pool that would be great for small children.    The walk to the Disney entrance is about 4 blocks and there are several restaurants around
Manager Response: Dear Vicki K,  Thank you for your detailed review of our property and the surrounding area. We all hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Resort and we look forward to your next visit with us! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Perfect Location at a descent rate
Summary: Location is perfect, Less than a 10 minute walk to the security check area of Disneyland. The pool is perfect for any weather and is perfect for any age. The room itself is equipped with a microwave and a mini fridge, very spacious. Furnishing is simple yet very clean. It does provide shampoo, conditioner, body lotion, and make up removal. Overall it was a great stay and I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear happy262015,  Thank you for your review! We are happy that you enjoyed our location and amenities. We look forward to your next visit with us!  Thanks again...

Summary Heading: Upscale motel for large families, as close to Disneyland as the Disneyland Hotel.
Summary: My family of 7 (2yo-11yo kids) has a hard time finding places to stay. We usually stay at the Disneyland Hotel for proximity to the park since we return for naptime. However, a suite to accommodate us would not be available for 2 days. So we waited it out at the Grand Legacy. This hotel has the same proximity to the park as the Disneyland Hotel (but away from downtown Disney). The walk was easy, and there is a convenience store, a bagel and bobatee place, a pizza place, and a taco place that are right next to it. The hotel also provides a "breakfast bag" for each guest. This is picked up at the pool area and consists of an apple, granola bar, and water. This was nice as it kept the kids happy until it was time to walk to the park. Accomodations were a clean, well kept, motel
Manager Response: Dear Arthur G,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that we got to be a part of your Disneyland Resort adventure. We would love to have you visit us again! We all hope you had a magical time at the Parks...

Summary: The location is great for walking to the Disney resort- only a little over 5 minute walk to the security check. Also it was very convenient for driving- just off Disney Way. We had the older rooms in the back of the property but it was clean and the beds were comfortable. The AC/heater unit worked and the black out curtains did the trick. The room had shampoo, conditioner, body lotion and even makeup remover! There was refrigerator, coffee maker and thankfully a microwave oven. Furnishings were bare- just a small round table and chair, dresser with TV and bedside stand. No in room safe. It was a bit noisy when the other guests were loud though.  There was no breakfast but they did give out a snack bag between 7am to 9am near the pool. The bag contained a bottle of water, granola
Manager Response: Dear WinaG,  Thank you for your detailed review! We appreciate your feedback and happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next stay when you embark on your next Disneyland Resort adventure! Thank you again!

Summary: The location, room, and service was amazing. This is my second time staying at the Grand Legacy. I will stay there again. The room was clean and comfy. The snack bag in the morning is definitely worth  getting up and getting it! The housekeeping did a great job.
Manager Response: Dear JBmeebe,  Thank you for your review! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and are a return guest. You are part of the Grand Legacy Family! We hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort and look forward to your next stay with us. Thanks again!

Summary: I booked this motel due to its close proximity to Disneyland/Calif. Adventure and because it was one of the least expensive options in the neighborhood. For a budget price, our room was large, clean, and the bed and pillows were very comfortable (better than I expect from a budget range hotel). So, my experience was that this hotel provided exceptional value for the money.
Manager Response: Dear Jim D,  Thank you for giving us a try and happy we exceeded your expectations. We hope you visit us again during your next Disneyland Resort adventure!  Thank you for your review!

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY IN THE TOWER UNDER THE BAR!!!
Summary: The room was spacious, clean and felt new and fresh. Location was about as good as you can get to Disney. But, and a BIG but.... do NOT allow them to put you in a room under the bar. It was the loudest hotel experience, with noise created BY the hotel, of my life. The music started at 8pm and went until almost 11:30pm two nights in a row. You are literally laying in bed in the middle of a night club. But it didn't end there. They then started to strike the equipment (band equipment, lighting, etc) and they were throwing heavy equipment on the ground. Without exaggeration, the walls were shaking and it sounded like a 250 pound guy body slamming himself until almost 1am! Being there on business for this trip, it sucked. I had to be up at around 6am and was blurry-eyed for most of
Manager Response: Dear DisneyFam99,  It appears that you stayed with us during the musical convention that was recently in town. We do our best to minimize the noise, however, there can still be some issues.We apologize for your experience. Please know that we do have many other room options that are away from the restaurant and bar and comfortable for families. Please contact us for your March visit and we will ensure that your location is as quiet as possible. You may contact me directly at Kerry@grandlegacyhotel.com and I will personally handle your reservation. Thank you for the feedback and we will strive to make your next stay magical for you and your family.

Summary: 2 thumbs up. Highly recommended. Great hotel. We will definitely be back. Parking is easy. We loved the morning snack packs. Checking in and checking out was very simple. Hotel is new and very clean. Microwave and refrigerator is a plus!
Manager Response: Dear Liz C,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate your feedback. Please come back and visit during your next Disney adventure. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great deal at a great location
Summary: We (2+2) stayed at Grand Legacy for 4 nights while visiting Disney.  Great location, very friendly staff and great service.  They don't have breakfast but they do have "Snack packs" for guests and that worked out even better for us as we can take them along with us to Disney and have our breakfast on the way.  Rooms are on the smaller side but we mainly needed them to sleep and shower and for that they were just fine.
Manager Response: Dear fivechips,  We are so happy that you had a great time at our property! Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next visit with us...

Summary: They cancelled my Reservations without warning.  My Reservations were made many months ahead of my planned visit.  9 Days before arrival to Anaheim, they cancelled my Reservations. I called them when i received the cancellation notice. Byron, the manager, claimed an in-town Convention was their reason for cancelling. Upon contacting the Convention Services, I was told they had no such authority. He took no responsibility and refused any further assistance.
Manager Response: Dear erikl656,  We apologize for any inconvenience. Any reservation for the convention had to be booked directly with the housing bureau. As this reservation was booked outside that avenue, it had to be cancelled and needed to be rebooked through the proper channels. We are very limited to the assistance we can offer in this matter as we receive reservations through the housing bureau and not directly with the guest. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary Heading: Great deal at the discounted price
Summary: I had 2 criteria for our stay:  1) Walk-able to D-Land, and 2) Inexpensive.  Grand Legacy fit the bill.  It's less than 1/2 mile walk to the D-Land main entrance.  The hotel was offering a discounted rate of $88 per night.  Even with resort fee and parking tacked on, the total was reasonable.  We were not in an "A" room.  We were housed in an older building to the side of the complex.  But the rooms were clean, nicely decorated, with comfy beds and lots of hot water.  Totally worth the discounted rate we paid.  My only real compliant was a lack of electrical outlets.  There is one in the bathroom and one in the bed area.  Had to take turns charging phones, etc which was kind of a pain.  But not the end of the world.  And a word about the parking:  Obviously no one wants to pay
Manager Response: Dear Indalu1,  Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate you sharing your experience! Please know that as we are renovating rooms, we are dealing with the outlet situation. Also, just to clarify, our hotel does not have a resort fee. Only room with tax and parking with tax. If you have any questions about charges, please contact us and we are happy to explain. We are happy to have had you as our guests and look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim Resort. Thanks again!

Summary: Booked for the location to the park quick walk and the price was really good at the time. We had a large room with two beds and a couch. The room was great for our family and we had tons of space. Only downside is the bathroom is tiny. Noise wasn‚Äôt bad just people going to rooms but it‚Äôs the same in most places. I‚Äôd stay here again for the price you can‚Äôt beat being across the street for the entrance to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear cmickelsen,  Thank you for your review! We are happy you enjoyed your room and our location. We look forward to having your family stay with us again for your next Disney adventure!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great place for quick walk to Disney
Summary: Excellent location and clean sheets. Also had good view of fireworks. Easy check in and checkout. Although no hot breakfast, the hotel provides a sack full of a water bottle granola bar cheese and crackers and an apple.  We were on the second floor and had a good view of fireworks.  Was an easy walk to grab breakfast before touring the park at IHOP OR DENNEYS loved the mobile ordering. I‚Äôve stayed here twice for Disney trips and feel it‚Äôs a good value
Manager Response: Dear Jo B,  Thank you for staying with us again! We are so happy to have you as a repeat guest. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: The location of the hotel is great! Right across the street from the parks. The staff were super friendly upon arrival and during checkout. The room was really clean and tidy, perfect size for our friends trip. Love that it had a mini fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Dear DisneyGirl0414,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy to have been a part of your Disney trip. We are here and ready for your next Friends Trip!  Thanks again...

Summary Heading: Great location to Disney! Comfortable, clean room.
Summary: Great, friendly service from valet to front desk help!  Rooms are clean, quiet, and comfortable.  Disneyland is across the street.  We left the car in Valet and walked over.  There are nearby restaurants as well if you don't want to eat in Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear cindyflowers,  We are so happy to read that you enjoyed our property and location. We want to add to the magic of a Disneyland Resort vacation! We hope that you had a great time at the Parks and thank you for your review.

Summary: Super close to the park so perfect for visiting Disney. Nice clean rooms that were spacious and updated. Offered to let us check in early, which was nice. I would recommend it to friends and will definitely be back to visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel B,  Thank you for your recommendation! We take pride in providing great service to our guests. We are delighted to check guests in early whenever rooms are available - get the vacation started even sooner! We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thank you for your review.

Summary: Grand Legacy at the park is the best Hotel around Disneyland! I stay there every time I go to Disneyland. Which is a couple times a month. From the people at the front desk, the valets, house keeping and the awesome Theresa. I‚Äôve always had a great experience. I‚Äôm going back next week and can‚Äôt wait to see everyone.
Manager Response: Dear kdtincup,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We love getting to know our repeat guests as they become like family. Thank you for the shout out for Theresa - she IS awesome! We can't wait to see you next week...thanks again!

Summary: Family had an amazing time at grand legacy the pool was clean and kids had a blast.. nice to be able to walk to Disneyland in minutes would definitely return and recommend.. the snack bags are a good feature but continental breakfast would be better as we had to take time to find breakfast each morning
Manager Response: Dear LMC250,  We are so happy your whole family enjoyed your stay with us. We love being a part of your Disney memories! Thank you for your feedback and we appreciate your review.

Summary: Typical hotel room. Nothing you haven't seen before. Great looking pool. Beautiful lobby and friendly associates. Best amenity was the 5ifth rooftop bar. Great selection of high end bourbons plus tasty and well crafted tiki drinks.
Manager Response: Dear Michael A,  Thank you for your review...We are happy you enjoyed our amenities and the FIFTH. We look forward to your next visit with us.  Thanks again!

Summary: Never have I spent so much money to be miserable. Beds like bricks, luke warm water, rude staff, ridiculous parking, only plus was the distance to the park ! Nothing grand about it and definitely will never book there again. By the way .... ‚Äúwhat was that smell‚Äù?
Manager Response: Dear Heather H,  We are sorry to hear of your experience. While we are in process of renovating rooms, we still pride ourselves on providing excellent service. Please contact the Front Desk management team and we are happy to discuss your stay further. Please know this is not our norm and apologize for any inconvenience. Thank you for your review.

Summary: The Grand Legacy is our favorite hotel by Disneyland! Always clean rooms and friendly service! Not to mention great prices! We like to stay in the luxury rooms with a view of the fireworks. We also enjoy the morning snack bags for the park and for the ride home.
Manager Response: Dear M H,  We are delighted to see you had a wonderful stay! We love being part of your Disneyland adventure! Thank you for your review.

Summary: This is the fourth hotel we stayed at for our annual Disneyland trip. The rooms were comfortable enough, but the noise level was very high. As With most hotels on this road, they are older and go through renovations time to time, but you never really get a really quiet room regardless of where you stay, just varying degrees. This is always expected so not a big deal at all. The pool here is our favourite. The design and size were perfect for our taste. Not super large, plenty of deck lounges and towels. Temperature was just perfect. We would definitely stay here again as the staff were very friendly and we had no major issues. The location is perfect, a quick walk to the park and situated around dining options.  We do wish they offered a hot breakfast other than the take away
Manager Response: Dear Doddfamilyfun,  Thank you for your review! This is a special location and with it comes the noise and excitement of families and kids. We are renovating rooms but do our best to limit noise inconveniences. Thank you for understanding!  We all look forward to your next stay with us and thanks again for your review!

Summary Heading: Clean rooms, easy check-in & check-out and an incredible staff that truly cares. We love The Grand Legacy  At The Park!!
Summary: Clean rooms, easy check-in & check-out and an incredible staff that truly cares. A great place to stay if you are looking for a place close to the park! They have an awesome pool area, restaurants, a convenience store. Clean rooms with refrigerators, microwaves, luggage rack, everything we need for a great vacation. We love The Grand Legacy  At The Park!!
Manager Response: Dear mindybtravels,  ...And we love you!  Thank you for your review and for enjoying our property. Our wish is to add to the magic of the Disneyland Resort experience. We are happy you have a great time.  Thank you again!

Summary Heading: So Convenient to Disneyland that you can't pass it up.
Summary: Grand Legacy is a very short walk to the entrance of Disneyland and DCA.  Considering on a busy street we have very little noise.  Loved the snack bag with water, fruit, and snacks though wish they gave them out earlier than 7.  Room was clean and bed comfortable.  The funny thing for us is that we stayed at the Ramada Maingate 30 years ago and wouldn't have remembered if they didn't tell us it was formerly that.
Manager Response: Dear gotkona,  Thank you for your review and Welcome Back!  We are so happy to have you staying with us again. Like Disneyland, we keep growing! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and will be here for your next Disneyland Resort adventure.  Thanks again!

Summary: Overall the quality of the hotel was good and location was excellent. However we had an extremely noisy room location near the elevator so sleep was poor . Noise early and late. Also we were hoping to see the fireworks from the Fifth bar on the top floor but it was closed for a private event every night of our stay, which was very disappointing. The room itself was really nice and the walk to Disney was easy . Staff were very pleasant and helpful. Would stay again but ask for a different location.
Manager Response: Dear cora L,  Thank you for your review and for spending part of your holiday time with us! The holidays can be extra exciting, especially for the little kids. We apologize you were near an elevator and were disturbed in any way! As The FIFTH is a one of a kind venue for Anaheim, they do hold many special events during December. We hope you enjoyed your time at the Disneyland Resort and look forward to assisting you in making your next visit with us perfect. Thanks again!

Summary: Great location,  very clean ,the staff is very helpful and accommodating . When we come back this will be our destination to stay . Central location to where ever we may need to go to . All hours of the night. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Glenn H,  Thank you for your review! We are happy you enjoyed our property and look forward to your next visit with us... Thanks again! Until next time...

Summary: Room Parking everything was great. We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. They are close, clean and very nice. We recommend them to anyone going to Disneyland... We also enjoy at least 2 locations to eat at that are in the same building.
Manager Response: Dear rtbundy,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate your feedback. We love being your Disneyland home-away-from-home!  Happy holidays to you and your family... Thanks again!

Summary: This hotel was great. The staff was very nice and welcoming. The bedroom had 2 queen beds a fridge and a microwave. The bathroom was a good size and the water was so hot I loved it. You could see the disney fire works from your window. If you are going to disney this is definitely a hotel to consider. It's a walking 5 minute distance to the parks and has several restaurants from a walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Joannar093,  Thanks for the awesome review! We are happy your enjoyed our location and amenities.  We hope to see you again for your next Disneyland Resort adventure!  Thank you again. Happiest of holidays to you and yours...

Summary: Such an amazing hotel! Service is amazing as well as the rooms!  Short walk to Disneyland and great resturaunts around the area! It's our go to hotel when we are visiting the area.  I would definetly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Lopez103009,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and that we are your "go-to" hotel! We look forward to your next stay and wish you a very happy holiday season. Thanks again!

Summary: We've stayed at several area hotels and AirBnBs for our annual family Thanksgiving get together at Disneyland.  The Grand Legacy is now our first choice for a repeat stay for future years! The location is perfect as you can walk to Disneyland, avoiding the dreaded tram ride back to the Disneyland parking garage after a long day at the Park.  The rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  Everything we ate at the rooftop restaurant was delicious and the service was good and friendly.  The daily snack bags are a nice touch and came in handy at the Park.  We highly recommend The Grand Legacy...as a matter of fact, we've already booked our stay for 2019.  üòâ
Manager Response: Dear Victoria4USC,  Thank you for your review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed our property and all of our amenities! We are honored to be your Disney home-away-from-home. See you soon! Happiest of holidays to you and yours...

Summary: We stayed at the Grand Legacy in order to take our 2 grandkids to Disneyland. The room & the location were perfect. We had an great stay at the hotel & I will be going back again, the rooms were clean & comfortable & the prics was great.
Manager Response: Dear Dee T,  Thank you so much for your review!  We love having all the generations stay with us and experience the magic! Have a beautiful Christmas and we would love to see you in 2019. Thanks again!

Summary: The staff is most helpful, courteous and always willing to help with everythin. Rooms are average but nice.  Location is great to Disneyland and family friendly restaurants like Dennys, IHOP, Tony Roma's.
Manager Response: Dear Alice P,  Thank you for your review and for choosing us to spend your Disney adventure! We all hope you had a magical time at the Parks!  Happy Holidays to you and yours.

Summary: First off I would like to thank Jonathan and the team on making my daughters birthday a great experience. We walk into the room to see a princess bag stuffed with goodies ( How sweet).  We would for sure stay here again. There was plenty of parking too. Thank you again Jonathan and the Grand Legacy team for making our family trip awesome
Manager Response: Dear kendra823,  We are so happy you spent such an important occasion with us... We adore birthday celebrations! Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: This is a great property for a convenient walk to the park. The staff was good, the bar was fun, there is live entertainment (for adults) after a day at The Park.. The rooms are fine, nothing fancy. I would recommend Grand Legacy at the Park for families
Manager Response: Dear Motherbird17,  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! Thanks for the recommendation and for your review!  We look forward to your next visit with us...

Summary: Great location, friendly staff.  Convenient walk to the park.  The grab bags they hand out are perfect for a snack on the way to the park. We always stay at the Grand Legacy and will definitely return soon.
Manager Response: Dear JRizzle1244,  Thank you for your review! So happy that we are your choice when visiting the Disneyland Resort! We hope you had an awesome time at the Parks and enjoyed all the decorations.  Thanks again!

Summary: Nice hotel but could improve on the noisiness outside the rooms particularly on the ground floor. Also water took  several minutes to get warm enough. The staff was very pleasant and helpful   Lighting in room could be brighter.
Manager Response: Dear pdschulz82,  Thank you for your review! I will forward your comments to our management team so we can look into the water and lighting issue. We appreciate your feedback. Thank you and we hope you had a successful business trip!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and staff, definately stay here
Summary: I have stayed here twice and loved it both times.  Great location and the staff is amazing. I am in process of booking for Feb 2019 for my daughter's graduation.  I spoke with Brenda today in reservations and she went over and above.  I was trying to adjust my rates and she probably spent an hour on the phone with me.  She was patient and was creative in working things to help me get a better rate.  She stayed calm, polite and was super friendly and helpful, not many today will take the time and effort to help in that way.  I cant thank her enough.  In my original booking I spoke to Eufrocina and she also went over and above to take the time to help me and was super friendly.  Today I also spoke with the manager, Theresa, just to thank her for the great work of her staff and she
Manager Response: Dear Tammie M,  Thank you so much for your detailed review! We appreciate our guests and happy that you experienced that with Brenda, Eufrocina, and Theresa. Our goal is to provide a comfortable environment while you have a magical time at the Disneyland Resort. Again, thank you for your review and we look forward to your next visit with us!  (and Happy Graduation to your daughter!)

Summary: Check in was so easy! Nothing fancy but was clean & very convenient as we were going to Disneyland while staying there. Love that they have a laundromat on site since the kids got soaked at splash mountain. Also love that they hand out snack bags in the morning, perfect for our day spent at the park. Heads up, parking is a little tight if you return later in the evening, it was hard for us to find a space when we got back around 9pm. Other than that pleasant experience, would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Rachelle T,  Thank you for spending your Thanksgiving holiday with us! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please know that valet is included in the parking fee, so if you ever have an issue finding a spot you are welcome to use our valet service.  Thanks again for staying with us and for your review!

Summary: Overall I liked the location and friendliness of staff, had a an issue with being mis-quoted with a few things, but I  am old school and write names and quote totals down so at the end it was all resolved altho I still feel I was charged about $40 more but at that point I was over it..... Rooms were comfy and clean. Traveled with myself and my 5 yr old daughter, and my friend and her 1yr old son...would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Sammy1031,  Thank you for spending such a special trip with us! Mommy/daughter time is precious! I apologize for any misunderstandings! Please contact the hotel with any concerns or problems. I would be happy to assist you. We want to be your go-to hotel for all your special trips to the Disneyland Resort. Thank you again and have a beautiful holiday season!

Summary: So I have stayed here probably 7 times this year and I keep coming back because of 2 things! The amazing location and the great rates we get as a annual pass holder! This hotel feels like home because of the amazing staff and it dosesnt hurt that we can come back mid day from the park and have a snack, and regroup then walk back over to have more fun!
Manager Response: Dear Brooke C,  Thank you for your review! You have hit on our goal at Grand Legacy at the Park - to be your Disney home away from home! We are so happy to part of your Disneyland memories. Thank you again and we will see you soon...  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Spent 5 nights at the Grand Legacy and loved it. Rooms were clean and comfortable. The snack bag daily was perfect and the attached food outlets were handy. By far the best part is the location. A very short walk to the main gates of Disney, California and Downtown Disney. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear H1764JLgregs,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us for 5 nights! We are delighted to be your Disney home away from home! We look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: There was No parking availability and they charged for it, excellente ubication very close to disney, walking distance. smelling bathroom, big rooms with good and confortables beds. Nice cast members.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria A,  Thank you for your review. Please know that valet parking is included in the parking fee. If our lot is full, our valet attendants will be happy to take care of parking your car for you! We apologize for any issues with your room! I hope you immediately called our Front Desk so we could remedy any issue. Again, thank you for your review and we hope you had a wonderful visit at the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean, we had a great stay and it was awesome being so close to Disneyland, right across the street! Stayed with wife and my two kids so it was nice being so close especially walking in the park from 8am to 10pm! The best thing i could say is that they have the most honest staff i have ever dealt with. I left behind some very very valuable items that could gone missing. But the staff there were so honest that they turned it in to the front desk. Theresa, the assistant manager held on to the items and locked it up for me. She waited for my return and my valuables were returned. She was so kind, I don't know what other place would be this honest, I'm definitely staying here again, the staff was awesome! Thank you!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Trail67735724939,  Thank you for your review and sharing your experience. Theresa and our whole staff genuinely care about our guests and their well-being. We are happy your items were returned with no issue. Hope that you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort. Thanks again!

Summary: Our stay at the Grand Legacy was a great time. The location is close to the entrance of Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and clean. We will definitely be staying here again!  If your planning a trip to Disneyland stay at the Grand Legacy..
Manager Response: Dear Alison M,  Thank you so much for spending your Christmas trip with us! We are happy to be your home away from home when visiting the Disneyland Resort... Thank you for your review.  Merry Christmas!

Summary: I hadn't stayed here since it became Grand Legacy; previously stayed here all the time when it was the Ramada but with the new name and remodel the prices went up and have finally come back to reasonable again.  The main selling point is the location.  The room was nice and good size, the bed was comfy but I had a hard time getting the room to be the right temperature.  My one compliant was the sofa in our room was disgusting and in need of a good deep clean or replacing and we wouldn't even sit on it.  The walls are thin but didn't really bother us since we were hardly in our room.  Parking can be an issue there if you want to leave and go somewhere and come back or if you have a large vehicle.  They offer valet included in the price you are already paying to park there.  Would
Manager Response: Dear calivaligirl,  Thank you for your review and for coming back and visiting us again! We appreciate your feedback and happy to see that you will be back for your future Disneyland adventures. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great location! comfy rooms and great staff this is our go to hotel for Disneyland stays.
Summary: Can't beat the location rooms are nice and the beds are comfy too.  They provide snack bags with water fresh fruit and granola bars.  NIce pool and kids area to relax in. They have self parking and a Valet service available fee for parking but it's still less than the park charges.  The hotel has stores and food available, we tried the BOBA store it has a great varity to choose from  and the service was great too!  This is our go to Hotel for Disneyland stays and fire works can be viewed from most rooms or parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Pam B,  Thank you for your review! We love being your go-to hotel while visiting the Disneyland Resort! We are glad you like the newest store - BobaTopia is great addition.  We look forward to your next stay with us. Thanks again!

Summary: Recently spent 5 nights here with a family of 5. This hotel far exceeded our expectations. The thing that brought us to this here was the location, everything else will bring us back again and again. If you are looking for a family friendly hotel stay here. The rooms were spacious and clean! The mini refrigerator held snacks, leftovers, drinks and items for breakfast. (There is a Target just down the road on Harbor) There is also a microwave in the room. Customer service can't be beat. From booking the room all the way through checkout they were helpful and kind. The snack bags are a great idea! I will be honest, I was nervous after reading other reviews about the parking situation but we had no trouble finding a place to park, infact, there were a few open spots even through
Manager Response: Dear patrickcullen05,  Thank you for staying with us! We are happy to be your home away from home while visiting the Disneyland Resort! We look forward to your next stay with us. Thanks for your review!

Summary: Location is great. Room walls are thin so you can hear your neighbors. If you can work with that, this is a good spot to be at. Also have lots of eateries nearby. Hotel was clean and loved the mini fridge, microwave and coffee brewer.   Check in was very simple. Staff were nice. The hotel parking was full except for Valet which we were surprised about. We had to ask the valet man to open a reserved valet spot because there was absolutely no parking. Fortunately, he was understanding and let us park.   We stayed one night and did not need any services. Room was nicely stocked with all necessary supplies as well for us (4 ppl).   Will come back again.
Manager Response: Dear Mainhia V,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you stayed with us and look forward to your next visit! Hope you all had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort!  Thanks again!

Summary: Room was comfortable, close to Disneyland and downtown Disney, also close to dining, I usually stay here when in town for vacations! Only thing I would change is having a actual breakfast instead of a snack bag
Manager Response: Dear jeffk86442,  Thanks for your review! We are happy that our location works well for you and your family. We love being in the middle of all the action! Thank you again!

Summary: My family and I stayed here for three nights in November of 2018. The customer service was the best part of the stay and I am so happy that I chose to stay here.  Celine (I'm 90% sure that was her name) and Selina helped me check in at the front desk. They were honest with me and let me know that the room that I had booked was directly under the bar and that we would hear noise. If it was just my husband and I, that would have been no issue. However, traveling with my 1 year old and mother-in-law, that wasn't going to work. They helped me pick a more suitable room with a great location. It was one of their smaller rooms, the premier room, but it was absolutely perfect for our stay.  I plan on staying here again. Excellent location to the park, less than a block away and very
Manager Response: Dear lindsays297,  We are so happy to receive your review! Thank you for the shout-out for our dedicated agents, Celene and Salina!  Our Front Office staff want all of our guests to have the best experience. Our Premier rooms offer the space, comfort and distance away from the restaurant noise. They are perfect for families! We all hope you enjoyed your time at the Disneyland Resort... Thanks again!

Summary: We LOVED our room and the deep soaking tub. The proximity to Disneyland was perfect and wonderful for this six month pregnant momma. The walk to the room at the end of a long Disney day was so much better and easier then the Disneyland hotels in my opinion!  The room was clean and lovely.  We did have any issue with our card being charged extra money. They charged us for the room, the security deposit, and also a random extra $50? That was weird, but we went down and talked to them about it and the $50 was put right back into our account by the next day so I really can't complain. My only concern in staying here again would be the money issue. It kinda left me feeling a little uneasy, but they took care of it fast and friendly so I would definitely try staying here again in the
Manager Response: Dear 927mariahp,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our property! And congrats on the new baby...So precious!  Please know that 72 hours prior to arrival, we authorize credit cards $50 to verify the reservation is guaranteed. It is not a charge, though it will hold those funds. We do not authorize the full first night room and tax because we do not wish to hold a higher amount in funds. That authorization is released after check-out. If a guest does not show up for their reservation or cancels within our 72 hour cancellation policy, we then authorize and charge the first night room and tax as the penalty. I apologize if that was not explained to you when you made your reservation. I am happy that our Front Desk agents explained it to you.    Thank you for your review.  We look forward to your next visit with us and meeting the newest Disney fan!

Summary Heading: Great Experience and stay as usual
Summary: We love the location, service, and parking. The staff if friendly and the hotel room is clean as always. We love staying here when doing overnight visits to Disneyland. It helps that they allow us to park at the hotel until late in the afternoon during our visit to Disneyland and they also offer discounts for hotel rooms for Passport holders which is really nice!
Manager Response: Dear Karina R,  Thank you for your review and for being a loyal guest with us! We love being your Disney home away from home! We look forward to your next stay and thanks again for your review.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for us. When all other prices were so high, this one was low. The pool was awesome ...the kids loved it ...staff was cool and did not hesitate to assist us. The walk to Disney was short and the view was great. This is our new hotel when we visit.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir67142117912,  Thank you for the review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay and are honored to be your Disney home away from home! We look forward to your next stays with us... Thanks again!

Summary: 2 tiny garbages and then the cleaning staff didn't empty them when they came in to clean. Room size suggested for 5 and DEFINANTELY  Not!  Staff polite. Convenient to Disney. All in all cost efficient so this is where it's at sometimes. Wish I would have went with my first choice.Room was also near the elevator and the door did not seal on the bottom so it was loud in our room.
Manager Response: Dear Departure51645826194,  We are so sorry about the trash can issue! I will pass your comments to our Executive Housekeeper. As for our rooms, per fire code, there can be up to 4 people for our Classic rooms and up to 5 for our 2 queen bed rooms. It depends on each family / party if there should be one or two rooms reserved. We do offer complimentary rollaway beds (based on availability). If it is a family of five with 3 small kids, one room works. A party with five adults, it might not be as comfortable. Please call the hotel directly and we would be delighted to ensure you get a room that will work best for your party. We hope that you all had a wonderful time at the Disneyland Resort! Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Very close to the Disneyland gate - the room was fine and quiet.  There was plenty of room for two people to stay without being crowded.  We enjoyed a night at the rooftop bar.  They provided a snack bag with water and an apple no charge each morning..  We found having a fridge in the room helpful. My only complaint was no plugins for the scooter I rented but the scooter kept it's charge the whole time I used it.  Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Diane W,  Thank you for being our guest and for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and all of our amenities.  We look forward to your next visit with us - thanks again!

Summary: First time stay here based on recommendation from a friend.  Our 2-family party had 4 adults and 3 kids, so we booked the 2 bedroom suite on the 3rd floor.  I was expecting something a little run down due to the proximity to Disneyland, but to my surprise the hotel was very clean!  Suite was nice, fairly updated, and clean.  No stale odors.  The air-conditioning was incredible (I hate stuffy, warm rooms).  Nice water pressure in the shower.  Housekeeping did a fantastic job, as each day we came back the park, our room looked as it did when we originally checked in.  The staff in the lobby and around the property were very friendly and accommodating.  My only gripe was that the pillows were soft and "lumpy".  Too much to do to check out the rooftop lounge.  I think children are
Manager Response: Dear Meathawk,  Thank you for giving us a try! We are so happy to have had you as our guests! We appreciate your sharing your experience with us and can't wait for your next trip. Hope you had an awesome time at the Disneyland Resort! Thanks again!

Summary: Customer service was excellent. Affordable. Within 1 block of Disneyland Parks. Great amenities in room, we loved the fridge and microwave and they brought a folding bed for my toddler. Room was clean and comfortable. When we got to room they called up to room within 15 minutes to check and see if we needed anything. Valet, front desk and housekeeping staff all amazing. Will stay again in future.
Manager Response: Dear Britany O,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us! We are happy that you enjoyed our amenities and location. Hope that you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort!  Thanks again!

Summary: I'm never disappointed staying here. Rooms are always clean staff is friendly. The manager is so nice I wish I remembered her name.Great area places to eat in walking distance not to mention Disneyland is only a 5 min drive away if that.
Manager Response: Dear Roam44858497369,  We are always honored to see a repeat guest's review! Thank you for your continued support and look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: housekeeping service terrible they didn‚Äôt cleaned the room my entire stay only left towels thrown however. they need to get trained well. i don‚Äôt like having my kids like this in a hotel that i‚Äôm paying a good amount of money.
Manager Response: Dear Makeup is M,  I am sorry to read of your experience. Please know that this is not our norm and very much an exception. Our housekeeping department cleans each room each day (unless there is a Do Not Disturb sign on the door). Please always alert the front desk with any issues and we are happy to ensure your needs are met. I will pass your comments on to our Executive Housekeeper and I apologize for your experience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and I hope you enjoyed your time at the Parks.

Summary: This place is literally steps away from Disneyland.  Located across the street, beautiful pool area with plenty of surrounding amenities.  Very clean and comfortable rooms, low noise.  Parking is a little tough and the spots are narrow.
Manager Response: Dear Anne M,  Thank you for your review! We are happy that you enjoy our location and our amenities. Come back anytime! Thanks again...

Summary: This was our third stay at the Grand Legacy at the Park, and we will return again and again!  The location to Disneyland park is the primary draw, as we can stay here and walk in - and it's close enough that afternoon rest times are quick and easy.  Also close proximity to some great eating establishments, and a short walk to a great CVS Pharmacy for incidentals.    The rooms are clean and the people are friendly.  Pricing is reasonable - what more could you ask for?
Manager Response: Dear HRHJody,  Thank you for being our repeat guest! We are honored to be a part of your Disney adventures! We appreciate you sharing your experience with us and can't wait for your next stay. Thanks for your review!

Summary: Nice hotel. Great location. Room was good. Clean, comfortable. Staff friendly. Big property. Lots of parking, they have valet included in the parking fee. The grab snack bag was a good quick snack. Price was decent. I booked directly through the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear jmo02,  Thank you for your review... We appreciate having you as our guest and hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort! Thanks again!

Summary: Awesome location and great hotel. Service was friendly and accommodating. The rooms were clean and well maintained. Our only complaint would be the pillows are very soft. We will definitely book again the next time we visit Disney parks.
Manager Response: Dear beckyak21,  Thanks for staying with us and for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your visit with us. We all look forward to your next trip to the Disneyland Resort - thanks again!

Summary: We‚Äôve stayed at this location multiple times ...last time was in a deluxe room on the first floor and it was awesome...this time was a luxury room on the second floor and was awful. Cleaning staff and lady that did snacks was amazing ...room was the size of a shoe box and the stupid noise from the fifth and all of the drunk people hanging out down at the entrance was crap. Also the fact that the elevator barely worked during our whole trip and we had to carry a double stroller with our twins up and down flights of stairs and wake them up was ridiculous and made the stay awful!
Manager Response: Dear cklam_5,  While we are happy that the condition of the room and our staff was "amazing," we apologize for the elevator situation. There were unforeseen issues that needed immediate attention. We apologize it happened during your stay with us. We are a family hotel and I would suggest for your next visit to try our Premier rooms. The are large, have a 2-sink vanity just outside the bathroom, and have access to 2 separate elevators. In addition, they are at the opposite side of the FIFTH so noise is not a factor. We hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Resort. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: My family and I have stayed at this hotel twice now and every time it's been more magical! Theresa Bessett and her staff including a woman named Celene have made our stay even better than the previous time we stayed at this hotel. We will be coming back to Disneyland & California Adventure this Christmas and we will be staying at this hotel again because of Theresa and her amazing staff they have at this hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear tennispro18,  So excited to have you as a repeat guest!Theresa and Celene are outstanding and happy that they made your stay magical. We look forward to the beautiful holiday season and having you stay with us again. More cause to celebrate!  Thanks again and see you soon!

Summary: The bed and pillow were passable, not uncomfortable. The staff was amazing. Proximity to the parks fantastic. Pool was perfect. Everything very clean. Disney fireworks visible from room. Grab pack breakfast wasn‚Äôt great if you prefer to sit and eat but it was convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Clare O,   Thank you for your review and for staying with us! We are happy you enjoyed our amenities and saw the fireworks from the comfort of your room.  Hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks!  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Lots of pros, but front desk and valet suck
Summary: Stayed here in October 2018  Pros: Location - just a short walk to the park entrance Food - lots of restaurants nearby Housekeeping - excellent; they were very friendly and polite and constantly working to keep the grounds clean; hard working Laundry - convenient coin operated washers and dryers Vending machines - good to have options after the mini mart closes at night Room size - room was big enough to fit in a roll away bed View - we were able to watch the fireworks from our room! Snacks - from 7am-9am, there are goodie bags available!!!  Water, cheese and crackers, an apple, and a granola bar!!!!  Pool - looked nice and saw lots of other guests using it Mini mart - cheap snacks and drinks; lots of Disney merch  Cons: Front desk - unfriendly, not welcoming, but I saw her
Manager Response: Dear Elsie4HI,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate that so we may see areas for growth. Please know that your "cons" will be shared with the department management. We apologize for any less than positive guest service. We are happy that you enjoyed our property and our amenities. We strive to anticipate guest needs and provide options. We look forward to your next visit with us and hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks! Thanks again!
