Summary: Perfect place to stay for a Disneyland adventure - I used the valet and he took me right to my room and helped my upstairs, then when I was ready to leave, I called the front desk and they sent the valet back to my room to help me.  I room was clean and bed & pillows were nice.
Manager Response: Dear Susie S,  Thank you for your review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay and that valet was so helpful. Thank you for allow us to be part of your Disneyland memories!

Summary: We had a three room suite on the 3rd floor, one of the only 3 room suites in the place so the price per night was up there. Wednesday night getting ready for bed my wall was pounding with the bass beat of the band playing at "The Fifth" skybar roof top venue. With a 6 am wakeup to make it to the airport, this little extra sucked.
Manager Response: Dear Joanie T,  We are sorry the noise interrupted your sleep... While we do our best to lessen the issue, some nights the noise travels downward and we apologize that you were disturbed. Please know that we have connecting room options that are away from the restaurant that may work for your party for future visits. We hope you enjoyed your time at the Parks! Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Got no sleep! Very thin walls - great for the location only for Disneyland. Horrible if you want to sleep in.
Summary: I stayed here expecting the worst so I set my expectations very very low.  The room itself wasn't bad, the bathroom was very large and the bed was on the firmer side.  I enjoyed the snack bags since the bottled waters were helpful to take into Disneyland.  The worst thing about this place was the walls and windows are SUPER THIN and not sound proof at all! We stayed in room 224 which is unfortunately right near the elevator and the staircase, so every morning between 6:30 - 7:30 AM all we heard were all the excited squealing kids and loud parents with strollers/carts heading down the stairs to head to Disneyland.  Later on in the morning it would be the cart noise of the housekeeping staff being dragged outside.  We can hear entire conversations of people like they were right
Manager Response: Dear ttsou23,  Being across from Disneyland, 99% of our guests are also Disney guests. On our property, every morning is much like Christmas morning for the kids. They are super excited to get up and go to the Parks. For those that like to sleep in, mornings can have echos of "excited squealing kids." We do have some more quiet areas, but cannot guarantee the absence of all noises. When booking, please let us know your preference, and we always do our best to fulfill those requests. We are sorry for your difficulty sleeping! We hope that you had a good time in the Anaheim Resort and thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Price for the night was too high considering the quality of the room.
Summary: The price was too high for quality of room. I get that it was October weekend, and you pay for convenience of location but still....Small room, A/C unit above the sink, leaving little mirror space, had to kneel to be able to use mirror. Carpet was lumpy, could be easy to trip over. Big bulky furniture in small room, dim lighting. Loud refrigerator. Room needs renovating. Can also here the music from the Fifth playing until late at night. If I go here again it will be for a renovated room up front, which hopefully cannot here music.
Manager Response: Dear mrskp91,  Thank you for feedback - this has been a busy October indeed for the Anaheim Resort area! We are sorry this wasn't a wonderful experience for you. It seems you were in one of our rooms set for renovation. We do have newly remodeled rooms and if you wish to be away from the FIFTH music, I would suggest the Premier rooms are the best option for you and your party. Please contact one of our Guest Service Agents and they will be very happy to assist you in creating a wonderful experience for your Disney Adventure. Thank you and hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort!

Summary Heading: worse than motel and does NOT worth the money
Summary: The room is really tiny and bathroom is dirty.  the bed is right next to door, door is right next to parking lot,  if you open the door,  people can see your baby sleep in bed from street near by.  This is a horrible motel does NOT worth the money at all
Manager Response: Dear Enlight C  One of the nice things about our hotel is that rooms are toward the middle and back of our property and away from the hustle and bustle of Harbor Blvd. Our Classic rooms are compact and with 2 full size beds in them, one bed will be near the door. You will only see guests and or employees walking from the parking lot if you choose to leave your door open. We have many options for guests - different room types, upper floors - to offer for whatever their needs may be. Our guest service agents will be happy to assist you in finding a room best suited for your needs if you wish to give us another try.  We are sorry for your experience and hope you had a good time at the Parks. Thank you...

Summary: Terrible beds, no amenities, worn and dated furniture, loud air conditioner - the list goes on.  There are far better options in Anaheim.  The only positive thing I can say about this hotel is the staff were very friendly and professional.  This hotel is a blatant cash-grab because of its location to Disneyland.  There are plenty of better options in the area at a much more reasonable price, and run by owners who actually care about the quality of the product they provide.
Manager Response: Dear Peter W,  We are sorry to read that you had an unpleasant experience with our property. Some rooms may not be the right fit and we are happy to see if another room is more comfortable for you and your party. We apologize for the loud AC. I hope that you called the front desk so that our maintenance staff could fix it for you. Any issue a guest has with a room, we are happy to attend to it with either our maintenance or housekeeping departments. We are a limited service hotel, so we do not offer the full-service amenities such as mini-bar or room service.  However, all of our rooms come with the following amenities: Complimentary Wifi, Snack Bags each morning in our pool house, In-room refrigerators and microwaves along with coffee maker, hair dryer, iron and ironing board. We also offer cribs and rollaways at no extra charge. As this is high season, rates in the area reflect that. Rates fluctuate according to the season. However, no matter the season, our entire staff cares about the quality of our product and we apologize if you did not enjoy your stay.  Thank you‚Ä¶

Summary: The only reason to stay here is that it is walking distance from Disneyland. Our room was in baldly need of renovation. The air conditioning was loud and the room felt stuffy. The carpet looked dirty. Breakfast is not included but they give you a paper bag with a bottle of water, an apple, crackers with cheese spread and a small granola bar. I think it‚Äôs to pricey for the quality!
Manager Response: Dear EstefaniaBB,  Thank you for your feedback and we apologize for the issues you experienced. While all of our rooms should be clean and comfortable, it appears you were in one of our rooms set for renovation. We are in the middle of a property wide remodeling with some rooms still remaining. Should you visit us again during the next Halloween season rush - we can assure you that your room will be fresh and to your liking. Our Guest Service agents will be happy to assist you in booking a room best suited for your needs.  Thank you again and we hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, very close to Disneyland main entrance - ten minute flat walk.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  Rooms are very clean and comfortable. We had the best nights sleep of any hotel in our recent trips.  The rooms are serviced to a high standard. TIP - avoid rooms in the upper floors of the main building due to extreme noise from the night club.  Best rooms are in the outer buildings e.g. 200-233 & 249-270. Overall a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear CJA52,  We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with us and slept so well!  Thank you for sharing your feedback and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We picked this place because the towers were new and we try to always stay in new. The staff was great room was great even though we pay more to be in the towers. Housekeeping was great, BUT we were on the second floor and the MUSIC from the 5th floor was so loud our room vibrated and we could not sleep... For that reason we will not be returning to this hotel.. MUSIC HAS TO GO!!! you are a HOTEL or a NIGHT CLUB make up your mind...
Manager Response: Dear Margsanjuan,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. Please know that we do have newly-remodeled rooms that are away from any potential noise of the restaurant. We would be happy to assist you in choosing a room that will best serve your needs. We hope that you enjoyed your time at the Disneyland Resort. Thank you again...

Summary Heading: Disneyland plus Mickey's Not so Scary
Summary: It was a fun trip and the Grand Legacy met our expectations.  The room was just like the brochure, spacious enough, very clean and overall comfortable.  We had a corner room on the 3rd floor a nice view of the pool but really didn‚Äôt matter as we were out of the room most of the time at Disneyland.  The Hotel offers a great little morning snack so you are not starving before you get to the gates.  Great location, pretty easy check-in and out.  Room noise if very low with the exception of the outside walk way, if someone has a roller bag or a cleaning cart it is a BIT loud.   Overall can‚Äôt beat the price and the location.
Manager Response: Dear John D,   Thank you for sharing your feedback! Glad you had a good time during your visit - this is a wonderful time at the Parks. Hope to see you again during your next Disney Adventure! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Average motel, not worth the price tag!
Summary: We booked our room ahead of time and opt'd for a room with a jetted tub since we would be at Disneyland all day. The room was right at the front which is great for walking distance but not so great when drunk people come stumbling past your door at 2 and 3 am! I get that there is a bar but get these people under control. The first night our jetted tub didn't work, I called and they came the next day to fix it but didn't compensate me one bit for the first nights rate like I asked since we were unable to use the tub! Room appeared clean at first but once you started looking it was not. Bathroom was old and needs updating. The bed was just ok. Overall didn't enjoy the stay here and especially for the price, I would never stay here again despite how close to Disney ever again!
Manager Response: Dear chellecrawford87,  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the disturbance near your room. I have forwarded your comments to the FIFTH management. Please know we have rooms with (and of course without) the jetted tub in different locations on the property away from the noise of the restaurant. As this is a high season, the rates have reflected that. We do have newly-remodeled rooms, away from the restaurant, and at a lower price point at other times of the year. We would be happy to host you and your party again and we know it would be a much better experience for you. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you had a wonderful time at the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Great staff, room and overall stay. Great location, 5-8 min walk to front gate of the park. Stayed the past 9 years and always good time. Pool and hot tub clean. The 5th, on the roof is great place to watch the fire works. They even play the music from the park.
Manager Response: Dear wcatron9969,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks for being a loyal guest through the years! We appreciate your continued business!

Summary Heading: I got no sleep! And overpriced!
Summary: Loud, unhelpful staff, rude answering phones, the valets almost let some drunk lady get coerced into a drunk man's car. Probably for sex. Nasty, shady hotel. It would be different if anyone would care, or was helpful. But everyone was there seemingly just to get through their day. Poorly run throughout, all little kids running the front desk. Ive had better experiences at Motel 6 and Desert Inn. Sad that 700 dollars cant buy a few nights of good sleep here. I will be writing a letter for a partial refund, as I did not recieve the services I paid for. And I have to warn fellow travelers on yelp and here on tripadvisor that this is a rip off. Needs new managment and staff that arent just there for the paycheck.
Manager Response: Dear OnAir792843  We apologize for any issues you had with your room or with parking. I have shared your concerns with the department management.  Please know that we are a family run business for families to visit Disneyland. We do not allow any ‚Äúshady‚Äù dealings to happen on our property. We have a restaurant and bar on the rooftop of our front building and 95% of those guests park off-site. At the end of the night, one person from a group will go retrieve their vehicle from the GardenWalk and return to pick up the rest of their group.  If anything looks suspicious, we have our security, the FIFTH management, front desk, and valet that deals with any situation. If they are unable to handle, the police department would be called. The safety and security of all of our guests is our top priority.  A member of our Front Office management team has reached out to you regarding your stay, however, there has been no return call. If you would like to discuss further, please reach out to the hotel.  Thank you.

Summary Heading: Proximity to Disney is the only reason to stay here
Summary: Limited parking that you are charged for. Rooms dated. Rude employees at front desk. The only redeeming quality is the easy walk to Disneyland.  For the price charged...I expected better.  They do give a snack bag with water,fruit and snacks for the day.
Manager Response: Dear toocool01,  We are sorry to read that you had issues during your stay. This is a busy-season and much is going on in the area. Please know that we are in the process of remodeling rooms and working toward completion in the next months. We do apologize for any rudeness your experienced. That is not our standard and it has been covered with the Front Office management. Thank you for sharing your feedback. We do hope you will give us another try to show you that your experience is not our norm.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, nice stay, friendly staff.
Summary: Very nice stay, reasonably priced. Everyone was pleasant including the Valet guys. No issues. Very close to Disney's main entrance. Room was comfortable. The shower nozzle was weird but not a big issue for me.
Manager Response: Dear Kristee911,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us. Hope you and your family had a great time at the Parks! Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great home base for Disney trip
Summary: The staff and management are super helpful and friendly. Great rooms and great pool! Disney tickets available to purchase with no extra fees and morning snack bags to start your day. We have been staying at this location for years and the recent upgrades are top notch!
Manager Response: Dear KLCP,  Thank you for being a long-time guest with us! We LOVE being a part of your Disney memories! We hope you enjoyed the Parks and all the great holiday decorations. Can't wait for your next visit.  Thanks for your review!

Summary Heading: Good but definitely room for improvement with little effort.
Summary: Previous guest's hairs left in bathtub and the bathroom faucet leaks. Needs a seal or something. Other than that, awesome room! It was a good size, had a microwave, a fridge, table and chairs, two beds, AND a sleeper sofa. Too bad I was by myself!
Manager Response: Dear Nigel D,  Thank you for your feedback on your experience. I will inform our Executive Housekeeper of your findings. Please know that is the exception and not the rule for our property! Happy to read that you enjoyed your stay overall. Thanks for your review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Room was clean and simple. Pool was very dirty and most of the attractions on the splash pad do not work.  Mini fridge in the room did not work, when notified, the staff did nothing, not even a simple apology.
Manager Response: Dear Sbreview123,  We are sorry to see you did not have a great stay with us. I will inform our Maintenance staff about the pool equipment not working (if they haven't already fixed it). Recently, we have had very gusty winds and that has made it difficult to keep the pool free of debris. I would like to apologize on behalf of the hotel for the issues you experienced. I will share your comments with the front office management. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: A great value for Disney trips!
Summary: Very Close to Disneyland! The room was clean and comfortable. It was also close to other restuarants. The pool was great for family swimming with young children. Staff was very friendly. We would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Julie G,  We are so happy to have you and your family stay with us! Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you during your next Disney Adventure!

Summary: I and a friend spent four nights at grand legacy. Convenient location to Disneyland and eateries can‚Äôt be beat!  Clean room, but housekeeping couldn‚Äôt get towels quite right (didn‚Äôt refresh, and then forgot wash cloths and bath mat). Pillows were perfect as far as we were concerned - best hotel pillows I‚Äôve ever had! Big problem for us: the ‚Äúconnecting room‚Äù door which meant we could hear way too much of what happened in next room. Tiny baby crying throughout the night for two of our nights - ugh!  And all throughout our stay parents allowed their children to use the hallway/balcony as a race track, running around it as early as 6 am and as late as 11 pm. It sounded like a herd of elephants even when only one child was running. So, it‚Äôs a family-welcome facility...not so good
Manager Response: Dear Amy B,  Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us! Yes, we are a family hotel and have excited little kids around in their Mickey Ears. However, we do consider 10 PM to 7 AM to be quiet hours and if there is noise, please call the Front Desk and we are happy to investigate. We hope you had fun at the Parks! Thanks again for your review!

Summary: Hotel was clean and comfortable and accommodated our early check in request. Beds were comfortable with enough pillows. Spacious rooms as well. We had the premier room with 4 adults and didn‚Äôt feel cramped. Pool area was nice. Maid brought us extra towels late one afternoon and we didn‚Äôt even realized we were missing any. Friendly staff! This was our second time there and we will be back again!
Manager Response: Dear  itapatadpa,  Thank you for your review... So happy you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your third and fourth stays with us!

Summary: A Disneyland trip in the fall is something we've done a lot, but not since 2012, so it's about time. We're quite familiar with the various hotels and motels along Harbor Blvd., having stayed in many of them, but the thing that drew me to staying here was that it was considerably less expensive than most of its neighbors. This property had worn many hats in the past, most recently being a Ramada Inn - but I believe that it has been the Grand Legacy for 3 or 4 years now. I think that most of the hotels along the strip now charge for parking ($15) but for me that's just another way to pad the profits. The room was spacious, a king bed, large bathroom. The thing lacking was light. We needed to keep the curtains closed because it was a ground floor west exposure and the sun would
Manager Response: Dear CWLee,  Thank you for your review and feedback. Your thoughts on the lighting will be shared with all management. Please know that parking is a significant situation that requires continual management and planning. In hiring a company that specializes in this area, we are able to maximize the limited space available. This is the reason for a parking fee for those guests that park a vehicle. Thank you for choosing our property and we hope that you had a wonderful time at the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was right across the street from Disneyland, and VERY close to a lot of restaurants. The hotel at first sight is nice and upgraded   Cons:  there were not enough towels for all four of us. The rugs should have been vacuumed  Pro: our five rooms were all next to each other as requested The beds were comfortable for most
Manager Response: Dear tina t,  Sounds like a great time with family and friends! Thank you for staying with us for your special trip! Thank you for your review - we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We have stayed there over the years, and several times throughout the year, but parking prices have increased despite the difficulty in finding a parking spot, let alone finding one close to your room, since most spots are now tied off for valet and the night club they have there. The rooms are nice and the room amenities are great, however, the beds are hard and not very comfortable. They used to offer breakfast, then changed it to fruit, yogert, juice, cereal, now you can go and get a "snack bag".  The other hotels at Maingate are comparable in price, but it is now coming down to overall comfort, parking and amenities for us.
Manager Response: Dear danarae50,  Thank you for your review and for being a loyal guest with us. Please know that we recently made changes to our parking that will lead to more spots for hotel guests. The Fifth guests park off-site as hotel guests take priority. We are continually looking for ways to improve the onsite parking. We appreciate your loyalty and patience as we continue with improvements. Thank you!

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights. Room was clean and pleasant. Super close to Disney. Would stay here again. Maintenance staff was quick and responsive to our requests for help with a malfunctioning hair dryer. Only hiccup was we could hear music from their night club "The 5th" on Saturday night, but not terribly bothersome.
Manager Response: Dear Karen B,  Thank you for your review! We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thanks for the shout-out for our wonderful Maintenance department. They do a great job! We hope to see you for your next Disney Adventure!

Summary: We decided to stay at this hotel because they have a military discount and how close it is to the park. Enjoyed it very much. Room was clean and comfortable. We walked to the park, even went back to our room for a nap half way through the day and then went back to the park. The fifth was awesome also good drinks and food and amazing view of the park. Unfortunately we didn‚Äôt get to see fireworks but I can only imagine how beautiful they must look.
Manager Response: Dear monicat07,  We are so happy you enjoyed your "staycation!" And thank you for serving - we are honored to have you choose us. We hope you had a great time at the Parks! Thank you for your review!

Summary Heading: So close to Disneyland gate, but rough night of sleep.
Summary: Pros:  + Proximity. We timed it and my 5 year old was able to walk from the Disneyland turnstyle to our hotel stairs in 9 minutes. That made a huge difference in our experience. It‚Äôs worth it to stay close.  + Pool. Clean pool area with sloped entrance and shallow 1.5 ft deep side for little ones with some sprayground features. Hot tub was also pleasant.  + Quiet. We had a room upstairs in the center area that was away from the street and away from the rooftop lounge. We had no complaints about noise.  + Clean.   Cons: - Outdated rooms. Carpets seemed clean but dark and very old. Definitely a motel feel to the place.  - Bathroom. Small and no counter space at all. Bring an over-the-door caddy to put your things.  - Beds. Cheap in quality and support. We tossed and turned all
Manager Response: Dear Cassandra W,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoyed our location and our pool. Kids do love our pool! Please know that we have recently remodeled sections of rooms and more are scheduled. We strive for all guests to enjoy their stay while visiting the Disneyland Resort. We continue to work diligently toward that goal. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next stay when you may experience our improvements.

Summary Heading: A nice ending to a great trip.
Summary: We landed in LA after a short cruise from Vancouver BC. We decided to spend a couple of days at Disneyland before we went back home to Oregon. We had stayed at this property in the past several times. It used to be called Ramada Main Gate. It was a nice place then but it is truly a beautiful place now. They have remodeled the entire property. The outside area is clean and trim with beautiful palm trees surrounding the largest pool on Harbor boulevard.   When we got to our room we found a nice little basket of goodies and a card signed by Theresa Basset, the assistant front office manager, congratulating us on our anniversary.   The staff was very friendly and helpful. A young lady named Brenda was at the front desk to check us in with a smile and a welcome that made us feel at
Manager Response: Dear Charlie S,  So happy to receive your review and even more that you are a return guest with us! It is wonderful that you have been with us through our growth. And thanks for the shout-outs for Theresa and Brenda - they are awesome and love our guests.  Thank you again and Happy Anniversary!

Summary Heading: Across the street from Disney entrace and short walk to gates.
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay and the front desk was able to get us an early check in which was much appreciated.  The room and furnishings were a bit dated but it was clean and the excellent location paired with the friendly staff will bring us back again.  Maybe we'll get a remodeled room next time?
Manager Response: Dear roadiegirlz,  Thank you for your review! Happy we were able to get an early check in for you. Whenever that is available, we are more than happy to accommodate! And yes, while we are in the process of remodeling, not all rooms have been done. They are scheduled though so for your next trip it'll be all ready for you! Thanks again!!

Summary Heading: Location was great. Rooms adequate. Did not match website description
Summary: Location made walk to Disneyland very easy - even to return during day for a break. Close to many good restaurants.  Only problem was expecting room furnishings to be nicer based on pictures they show on website. Bathroom sink was cracked and stained.  Would probably stay there again but with lower expectations. Price was a little high for room but guess you pay for location.
Manager Response: Dear annm185,  We appreciate your review... Please know we are in the process of remodeling our rooms. Not all are completed yet, but we do show each room type on our website as they are now. The Accommodations tab will show what we have available. Please call one of our Guest Service Agents and they will be more than happy to explain each room type and find the best fit for you and your party. We want all our guests to feel comfortable and enjoy their time in the Anaheim Resort! Thank You!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel within walking distance to Disneyland.
Summary: Nice hotel, walking distance to Disneyland, lots of restaurants near by and pool area was large and very kid friendly. Staff was friendly.  Self parking was limited and you had to pay for parking whether you used self or valet parking ($15 per night parking fee).  No real restaurant on-site (the 5th is an outdoor club at night), but plenty of restaurants nearby.  Also, the 5th no longer serves a Sunday brunch or it is only offered at limited times.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great rooms, awesome staff, perfect Disney experience!
Summary: The location is great, about 5 minutes from the Disneyland entrance.  The staff is always super helpful and friendly.  The rooms are all updated and renovated, and the bed was really comfortable.  They also have these little snack packs (ours had cheese & crackers, a granola bar, an apple, and a bottle of water) in the morning in lieu of a continental breakfast that is perfect to take into Disneyland with you!
Manager Response: Dear stephaniecroft1015,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and that the Snack Bags came in handy for your days at the Parks. We look forward to your next stay with us. Thanks again!

Summary: This is a nice hotel to stay at when visiting the Disney Parks. The room was tiny, hardly enough room for us and our luggage, but you‚Äôre only really in the room to sleep. It was very clean and nicely appointed. Would stay here again if I get the chance to go back to Disneyland!!
Manager Response: Dear Helen D,  Happy to have hosted you for your Disney Adventure! Sounds like you were in one of our Classic rooms - please know we do have many room types with room to stretch. We would be delighted to assist you in finding the perfect room for your next stay. Thank you for the review!

Summary Heading: Just returned from our trip to Disney
Summary: Would highly recommend this hotel! Not only is it super close to Disney, but great location for other restaurants as well! The rooms are perfect and the kids enjoyed the pool. Also the snack packs are great!
Manager Response: Dear Tegan T,  Thank you for your review!  We are so happy your family enjoyed our property. Hope to see you all again soon - thanks again!

Summary: Room looked like it was just recently redone but there is already the start of black mold in the bathroom. Cracks in wall and bathtub. Pitting in sink, vanity, and bathtub. Lack of outlets in room and the ones there were already being used by the lighting. We had to unplug the alarm clock and bedside light to charge our devices. The Fifth was closed 3 of the 4 nights we we're there after hearing so much about it. BUGS in the sink and vanity area each day of our stay. The location of the hotel is great, right across the street from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Barry C  We apologize that you did not have a great experience. I was able to locate your information and see that you did stay in one of our room that is due to be remodeled. During the remodel, we do address the outlet situation and add more for current needs.  As for the bathroom issues, I will be alerting our Housekeeping and Maintenance departments to remedy. Lastly, please know that we have a pest control program in place and there should never be a problem. Thank you for letting us know so we may call on it right away. Please be on the look out for an email from us in the near future regarding your stay.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Super close to entrance, clean comfortable and classy
Summary: Good location, very short walk to the park, many dining options nearby. Clean and classy without being over-the-top expensive: an affordable alternative to something like a Motel 6 or what we refer to as the Creepy Bear Motel. I wish I had feather pillows, but that is about it- nice stay. Refrigerator, microwave, coffee all included which was a bonus
Manager Response: Dear poohbearlives,  Thank you for your review! Happy that are enjoyed our amenities. Hope that you had a fabulous time at the Disneyland Resort and we look forward to your next visit... Thanks again!

Summary: This was our third time staying at Grand Legacy at The Park. We had a great stay. My only suggestion would be to update the older rooms a little. We usually stay in the Premier Rooms but since we had my mom with us, we booked the classic accessible room and it was a little run down. It surely didn't ruined our stay, we don't spend much time in the room anyway. I really hope that at some point you bring back the offered breakfast. I can say the arrival experience was excellent. Our room was ready before check-in and they even gave our two girls Minnie ears and a bag of candy! That was a unexpected surprise and our girls LOVED it! Thank you Grand Legacy at The Park for another wonderful visit!
Manager Response: Dear JennM0417,  Thanks for the review! So happy to have you as our loyal guest. Please know that we are in process of remodeling. Sections of rooms have been completed and there are more scheduled. We appreciate your feedback - Thanks again and looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: I have stayed at this resort before and was so pleased, only to be disappointed by our last trip booking the same room type but discovered the room was not even comparable. I calk d the front desk several times to confirm we had the same room type and was what I booked. Extremely dissapointed in our room, it was dirty musty and dark. Bed was broken upon arrival and maintenance was very quick to replace entire bed. Our room was cleaned 1x during our 5 night stay. One day all our used linens were removed but never replaced, our coffee maker was used and dirty upon arrival and stayed that way. Both me and my daughter were immediately stuffy when we came to our room each time and turning in our A/C made it worse. By the time we left we were and are still sick from obvious mold
Manager Response: Dear Mauigirl68,  We apologize for the issues you had during your stay. We strive for every guest to enjoy themselves and to feel comfortable while staying with us. I am sorry we fell short of that for your visit.  It appears you were in one of the rooms that are due for remodeling - which will be done in the near future. The other issues will be passed on to the department managers. I believe I have located your reservation and have emailed you directly. If you have not received an email from us, please contact me at Kerry@grandlegacyhotel.com. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: A great room and and a great experience. Staff was wonderful!
Summary: Nice clean room and the kids loved the pool.  The front desk staff, especially Martha, was very helpful and professional.  We loved the snacks bags each morning.  Definitely the place to stay at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Scott D,  So happy to read that you had a great experience! And thank you for the shout out for Martha - she IS awesome...  Thanks for the review and for being our guest!

Summary: I always stress when booking a hotel. It's never quite what it is described to be. I was pleasantly surprised to find a nice room that didn't have a weird smell and mildew hiding in the corners. The beds were comfy, location was ideal. We loved the pool,it was perfect for our group of kids ages 2-12 with its toddler pool that gradually went up to 4 feet and fun splash pad.The snack bags were awesome and a nice way to start the day. And the staff were friendly and helpful. I will definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends. I have found my new hotel for our Disney vacations.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa B,  So happy to have your family as our guests! We strive each day to enhance the Disney experience. Can't wait for your next visit with us. Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: The Air Conditioning unit was too loud and had a bright light to indicate the temperature that could be seen all night long. The music from the club on site was so loud you could hear it all night.  The swimming pool was too cold and the parking spaces are so tight that we had to unload everyone and our luggage before parking. No breakfast but it‚Äôs an awesome location so you could just walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear  Leti T,   Thank you for your feedback... We appreciate the details so we may address them and provide a more comfortable stay for our guests. We all hope you have a wonderful time at the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: Very clean & comfortable.  Great location to parks.  2 queen beds a plus and sort of rare for a hotel room.  Room was always cleaned and ready even when we came back early afternoon for a rest.  Staff friendly.  Would stay again without searching elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear JRLouthan,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate you sharing your experience with us. Happy to be a part of your Disneyland memories... See you next time!

Summary Heading: Great location and friendly, helpful staff
Summary: We were very pleased to see how close the hotel was to the Disneyland entrance, but even more pleased to find the staff to be gracious and helpful, and our room to be clean and comfortable. Check-in was a breeze! Parking worked out well, and our stay was very enjoyable, We will definitely stay there again.  This morning we realized we'd left something in the room (we checked out yesterday).  Housekeeping told us they'd look for it, but we were resolved to the fact we probably wouldn't get it back. We were so surprised and pleased to get a phone call back from Angelica in  housekeeping to tell us they had found our lost item and would be happy to send it to us. She really went above and beyond to try to locate our lost item, notify us so quickly and then be willing to send it to
Manager Response: Dear BS T,  We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us! We agree - Angelica is a great asset to our property and our guests. Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary: We got season passes for Disneyland and have been staying at Grand Legacy at the Park. I‚Äôm stage 4 cancer and can‚Äôt go up stairs and walk very far ( I get a scooter for Disneyland). It has gotten worse for me. When I made my last reservation for the hotel I put in the notes I can‚Äôt do stairs. When we checked in  a WONDERFUL lady named Celene. I hope I got her name right.  helped us and was very helpful for me. Gave us a ground floor room and close by to the reception desk.  We went in the next morning and a AWESOME lady Daisy helped us. It was great experience with theses to ladies.  I talked to the manager today. Her name is Teresa. She was so nice. I‚Äôm going back down oct 1-2 and hope to see theses ladies and meet Teresa. I will recommend Grand Legacy at the park to everyone.
Manager Response: Dear kdtincup,   We are so happy to have you and your family as our guests. We are sorry to hear of your diagnosis but happy to accommodate your needs. Always let us know should you need anything to make your stay more comfortable. We do have a great Front Desk team and they will be happy to assist. We look forward to you upcoming stay with us. Thank you for your review...

Summary: Clean and comfortable, close to Disney, and very affordable! Would definitely recommend this hotel. There are little shops and restaurants next to this hotel as well. It's a little extra if you need to park your car but valet is included. We could see the fireworks at night from our room.
Manager Response: Dear Sheryl M,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to have you and your party stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Close to the Park and really a good place to stay
Summary: First, get a Premier room. They are larger, quieter, and pretty comfortable. The check in was smooth. One small glitch in the online reservation, but it was taken care of quickly and the kindness was appreciated.   The room is pretty straight forward. Not great, but nice and recently refurbished. Microwave, (noisy) refrigerator are are a plus. Bathroom was a good size and the amenities were of good quality.   Being close to Disney is a plus. I‚Äôve stayed around the world and this hotel will serve just about anyone‚Äôs needs.
Manager Response: Dear ConVivo,  Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate you sharing your experience and happy to have had you as our guest. We look forward to your next stay during your next Disneyland adventure! Thanks again!

Summary: Good location and quick walk to disneyland main entrance  Nice pool area some staff members have bad attitude. Only one elevator to the tower rooms, shared with the public going to the roof top night club leaving drunk and holding up the elevator, quite annoying when you have children and are wanting to get to your room after a day/evening at the park currently doing renovations at the hotel, and failed to let us know at check in that we would be woken up at 8 am by pot smoking construction workers across the hall from our room.
Manager Response: Dear emvanty,  Thank you for your review... We are sorry to read that you had some issues with the elevator.  We do offer wonderful guest rooms in other areas of the hotel that are away from the FIFTH and its happenings. And please know that while we are a smoke-free hotel, unfortunately, some guests smoke in their rooms (and are charged a $250 cleaning fee). All workers on property are monitored and any activity such as that would be dealt with swiftly.   Thank you and we hope that you enjoyed your stay at the the Resort...

Summary: We stay at hotels around Disneyland a lot and this hotel has become our favorite place to stay!  The manager Theresa has always been very friendly and helpful to my family.  Theresa and the staff have always provided excellent customer service.  It is always a pleasure to stay at the Grand Legacy At The Park!
Manager Response: Dear chad433,  Thank you for the review and for being a return guest with us! Theresa and our staff are very friendly (thanks for the shout-out!) and love seeing our repeat guests. We look forward to your next Disney Adventure because then we get to see you again! Hope you had an awesome time at the Parks.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Comfortable, close to restaurants, perfect for Disney.
Summary: I wouldn't say it was "grand", but it was certainly fine. The rooms were clean. Everything worked. Friendly staff. We would stay there again. Loved how close it was to Disney. Easy to leave the park and go right back in! Also, liked the taco shop in front of the hotel. Great tacos!
Manager Response: Dear JeneneM3,  Thank you for your review - happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim Resort. Hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks!

Summary Heading: Best hotel Theresa was amazing all the staff is
Summary: I loved my room and every time I go to Disney I stay here .close to parks places to eat right there at the hotel no fee for valet parking this last vist was amazing Theresa was amazing and very helpful she made so I definitely will always choose here . To do a load of pansy is only $4 it was a life saver with 2 kids üòäüòâ
Manager Response: Dear Pamela M,  So happy that you enjoyed your stay with us...  And yes, Theresa and our staff are great! Happy to see you got to use our amenities. One doesn't necessarily want to do laundry on one's vacation, but sometimes it must be done. Happy to provide that for you.  Thank you for your review and hope to see you again for your next visit to the Disneyland Parks!

Summary: The staff were all very helpful and friendly every single time I needed something or had a question. We especially loved the travel packs that were given out each day as a snack for us to take into Disneyland for the day.
Manager Response: Dear KHollopeter,  We are glad that you enjoy our Snack Bags... Thank you for your review and happy to have you as our guests. Hope you had a great time at the Parks!

Summary Heading: Overall everything was great! Just know that the refrigerators are not very cold.
Summary: The location is awesome6, the price was unbeatable, and the staff were amazing! The room was nice and clean, we were able to make it a comfortable temperature, and it had everything we needed. My only complaint is that the refrigerator in the room, while spacious, was not very cold even when we put it on the coolest setting. My 2 year old loved the pool, it was a nice temperature, and my husband and I enjoyed the hot tub.
Manager Response: Dear mckitkat03,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed our amenities while staying at our property. The Disney Resort is awesome, but is missing a pool! Glad your 2 year old had fun splashing about and that hot tub is great for tired feet. Thanks again and we hope to see you for your next visit to Disney!

Summary: Great Hotel! Close to the park and a few shops and restraunts. Kids had fun in the pool, and parents really enjoyed roof top bar The 5th! The fire work show for the roof top bar is great! Fridge and Microwave make it easy to store snacks and drinks that you plane to take to the park with you, yes, you can take them in :)
Manager Response: Dear vgilliam86,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We are happy to read that you enjoyed our property and got to experience The FIFTH - such an awesome view up there! Hope to see you all again soon - thanks again!

Summary: When I read reviews that it was outdated I thought they would have been fussy travelers but no. It was real. The toilet ran all night. The fridge needed to be whacked to stop screaming. The rooms are far too small for two beds. The shower whilst having okay pressure wasted a lot of water still running from the bath facet. The air con units are noisy and dilapidated and blew across the beds all night but if not on it was too hot. The pool area is nice enough but there were no towels. Good location but that‚Äôs about it. And I‚Äôm not one of those travelers ... I would have preferred to Uber to the mouse than stay and be exhausted from lack of sleep due to noise
Manager Response: Dear kkoolnz,  We are sorry to read you did not have a great experience with us.... Please know that we are in the process of remodeling. Many rooms have been completed, and many more are scheduled. Thank you for sharing and know we appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Frequent Disneyland Traveler, We Always stay at Grand Legacy at the Park
Summary: We LOVE staying at the Grand Legacy at the Park.  It's a short walk to the Disney parks - which is the main reason we stay.  But, we keep coming back because of the awesome staff, the great pool, and the annual passport discount & perks.  During our most recent stay, Theresa & Daisy were more than helpful ensuring we had a great experience.  I can't remember everyone's names that have helped us in the past, but I've never had a bad experience.  We even had a very speedy handy man come to our rescue when we found a beetle in our room - whew!
Manager Response: Dear amyanholt,  Thank you for the review and we LOVE having you as a frequent guest! Thank you for the shout out for Daisy and Theresa and the whole team - they all strive to make each stay relaxing and comfortable. We look forward to your next visit with us - Thanks again!

Summary: We started staying here years ago during the remodel and continue to stay now that is it done. The staff is always helpful and the rooms are very nice. It is so close to disneyland, which is a major convenience no fees for shuttles etc. Bonus!!
Manager Response: Dear vltthompson,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review and thank you for being a loyal guest during our "growth" period! So happy you get to see all the improvements! We appreciate you - thanks again!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel One block away from the Disneyland entrance!
Summary: I‚Äôve been staying here three years in a row. This year, Daisy booked our stay. She was so lovely and so helpful and accommodating. She gave us exactly what we asked for. It‚Äôs so great to know that you can get everything you need! I have a 7 yr old son, and cleanliness is very important to our family. At the Grand Legacy, you can be rest assured that it will meet and exceed your expectations! Fresh and clean. Our room was just renovated and it overlooked the pool area.  When you get up, you can go right down to grab a complimentary snack bag, it‚Äôs great to take along with you to the park! If you want a little more, Denny‚Äôs is literally right next to the hotel!   There is a great restaurant on top of the Grand Legacy, but we still haven‚Äôt had the chance to get up there yet! It‚Äôs
Manager Response: Dear tiffanyco2018,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy to have you as our repeat guest and to be a part of your Disney memories..And thanks for the shout out for Daisy - she is a treasure for sure! We all look forward to your next stay with us - thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here over night with my mom to go to Disneyland. We didn't really spend much time at the hotel, but the distance to the parks was amaaaazing--it was just about a 5 mins walk. The selection of restaurants around was great, too, so it was okay that they didn't have breakfast. We tried to check in before noon, however the room wasn't ready yet, but they were able to store our luggage. We checked in at midnight and was able to crash on the bed right away. The place was clean and comfortable. Will definitely stay here again if we come back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole Janine B,  So happy to read that you and your Mom had a great time in the Anaheim Resort! We love being a part of your Disneyland adventure. Know we will be ready for you should you visit again - Thanks!

Summary Heading: Parking is a nightmare. I would never stay here again.
Summary: Okay, I am starting over on my review, because I have now checked out. In short, I wish you could give negative stars because I have never been treated so badly at a hotel in my LIFE!  And we are AP Disney go-ers, so obviously we come often!! DO NOT STAY HERE!   This hotel ruined my trip to be completely blunt and honest. I booked through Booking.com (I use this frequently) and I have never had a problem!  On the website they give you the room price as a whole, and then the tax room total. They also have "usual tips, extra fees, and parking fees" no where on there did it say parking fees. I have stayed at NUMEROUS hotels, all over California and I get that there is a parking fee, more often then not. And I am okay with it.  At this hotel, there is $15 fee, PLUS 17% TAX EACH
Manager Response: Dear Kelsey B,  We apologize that you had a difficult stay. That is never our intention. We strive to provide a welcome and comfortable experience for all our guests. Please contact us directly so we may assist you further. Kerry@grandlegacyhotel.com or Theresa@grandlegacyhotel.com. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great location and decent price. really wanted to like it, but terrible service turned us off.
Summary: We thought since everyone's reviews had been addressed and that they would fix problems that guests had months ago, but they were not addressed and some still happened to us. the pros did not outweigh the cons for us, so we're not sure if we'd be staying here again. PROS: really close to Disneyland and decently priced CONS: there were ALOT of hidden fees. Upon arrival, the valet did not direct us efficiently on where to park or go. when we arrived to our room we had missing towels. The next day, we left for the park from 9am-3pm and when we returned, our room still hadn't been serviced, even though we didnt leave the "do not disturb" sign out. On our last day there, check out was at 12:00(noon), we went to Disneyland from 8am-11am, and our keycard would not work, it wouldnt have
Manager Response: Dear Michelle G,  Thank you for sharing your "cons" with us. We do want to know so we may fix any issues that arise and maintain our high standards. We do listen to our guests and are continually working to enhance the guest experience. We apologize that you had issues during your stay. If you would like to discuss your stay further, you may contact me at Kerry@grandlegacyhotel.com or reach out to our Front Office management at Theresa@grandlegacyhotel.com.  Thank you...

Summary: Great room, quiet and clean and the proximity to Disneyland is awesome.  We spent all day at Disneyland, came back to the room, grabbed a meal and then headed back for the fireworks...perfect!  Didn't have a car, but there was a large carpark and valet parking and the staff were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Sonia C,  Thank you for your review! We are all so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and at the Happiest Place on Earth! We hope to see you again soon - thanks again!

Summary: When we checked in, I mentioned an email I received after I booked my room that if we were staying 3 or more nights, we would get free onsite parking. The front desk staff would not honor this email and told us that we needed to call to change the type of booking. They were also very grumpy as tried to understand the situation. That's $30 the hotel earned for some unsatisfied guests.  We asked the valet service how long it would take to get to John Wayne Airport during rush hour. He told us 2 hours! That's absolutely ridiculous. It took us about 25 minutes to get there. This shouldn't be an uncommon question, and staff should be able to have a more accurate answer.  It is very close and convenient to Disneyland. The beds were pretty comfortable. Our rooms were updated, but you
Manager Response: Dear Peggy E,  I am sorry to read of your mishaps at the hotel. We want every guest to enjoy their stay with us and we regret that we fell short for you. I will speak to the respective managers regarding your issues. Thank you for bringing them to our attention. If you should like to discuss further, please email me at Kerry@grandlegacyhotel.com.  Thank you.

Summary: Location for Disneyland is great. Not a horrible experience but not sure I‚Äôd stay again. Double suites with 2 rooms with 4 queen beds has 1 bathroom which would be ok but there were no mirrors in one room. We were 5 girls and planned on getting ready in front of a few mirrors spread over the 2 rooms and bathroom. But we ended up having to take turns over 1 mirror. Made AM starts inconvenient. Chairs are dirty, like black on the bright material. ( too gross to sit in) the pillows are very hard and they are not generous with linens and toilet paper. Coffe pot was gross and smelled like mold. Did not dare use. They have a great snack bag each day for each person in the room, which has a cheese stick, water, apple and granola bar. They will store your luggage your last day if you
Manager Response: Dear jmc2012az,  Thank you for sharing your experience so we may take immediate action. This is not our standard or our norm and it will be addressed with our Executive Housekeeper. We apologize that it was not an excellent stay. We hope that you enjoyed your time at the Parks

Summary: Our stay at Grand Legacy was great. The staff was awesome. They offered snack bags we could take with us on the way to Disney and the walk was well worth it. We were definitely close because I could hear the fireworks every night which can be loud but my TV easily drowned out the noise. The rooms could use some updating but they were clean and comfortable. We had drinks at the Fifth as well that were delicious and the view was amazing. My only complaint there was the band was almost TOO loud.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle E,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate your feedback. Please know that many rooms have been remodeled this year with more are on the schedule. We are always striving for your comfort and convenience while on your Disney adventure. Thanks again and we hope you had a fabulous time at the Parks!

Summary Heading: Great location. Amazing stay. Excellent staff.
Summary: I have been staying at this hotel for many years and have seen the transformation that's occurred with the name change. The hotel is convenient to Disneyland, restaurants and convenience stores.  The recent addition to the building has been a very welcome change to the appearance of the hotel. The rooms are spacious, clean, serviced daily and very family friendly. The pool and spa area that includes the water jets for the kids is a real winner and sets the hotel aside from other properties.  The staff are extremely friendly and courteous. The front desk staff are very accommodating. The housekeeping staff go above and beyond to truly present the guest rooms to a very high standard. Nothing is ever to hard or not doable for housekeeping.  If you truly want a relaxing and
Manager Response: Dear Traveller0968,  Thank you for such a wonderful review, and more importantly, for being our guest for so many years! Each day, each year, we strive to be better than we were. Much like Disneyland, we are continually growing and evolving. Thank you for coming along on the ride with us... Looking forward to your next stay with us and thanks again!

Summary Heading: Best price and so close to Disney
Summary: We decided on a whim to check this hotel out for Labor day night so we could spend a couple days at Disneyland. We live within driving distance of Disney. The hotel was such a steal of a price and it was so nice. The place is all new inside. From the valet attendant to the front desk staff, everyone was friendly and very helpful. The place was clean! The room had all amenities needed. It‚Äôs so close to Disney! We did have an issue with the water getting hot in the shower and they offered to send maintenance up right away. We enjoyed the pool and the spa which were both nice and clean. My kids loved the little splash pad parts and I loved the shallow entrance for my littles. All in all I would give this hotel a 10/10 and we will most definently stay here again. I highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear amypserrano,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We are so happy to have had you as our guests for your trip to the Anaheim Resort... Those can be the best trips! Hope you had a great time at the Parks and know we are here for your next Disney adventure. Thanks again!

Summary: First-time staying at the hotel... I will be back again in 2 weeks.. I will most definitely stay there again.. Perfect distance to Disneyland for my family.. Front desk was fast and friendly.. Check out was the same..the room was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Noe L,  Awesome to know you will be back in 2 weeks! The Halloween decorations will be up at Disneyland and the holiday magic will be everywhere... So happy that you will be a repeat guest with us and thank you for the review!

Summary: A surprisingly good value right across from Disneyland - it's an easy walk to the park.  Convenient to Garden Walk, restaurants & convenience stores. Lively during the day with the pool, but reasonably quiet at night.   The Fifth is fantastic, great food & drink it a bit pricey. Where else can you get a rooftop view of the Disneyland Fireworks along with the soundtrack?   Good bands and cover charge is waived for hotel guests (I'd assume for most if not all nights)  Rooms are comfortable, great service by staff.  Free snack bag each morning (apple, cheese, granola bar & water) was a nice surprise.
Manager Response: Dear OH2CA,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you got to enjoy our amenities during your Disney adventure... We look forward to hosting your family for you next adventure. Thanks again!

Summary: Took less than 15 minutes to walk from the hotel room to Cars Land in CA Adventure.  Right next to restaurants.  Valet parking was convenient and free with daily parking charge.  The snack bags were nice to grab-n-go on our way to the park each morning.  Didn't use the pool but it looked nice and big and there was a separate hot tub.  We could see the Disneyland fireworks from our window.  Beds and pillows were comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Channa P,  Thank you for your review and so happy to see that you had a good time in the Anaheim Resort! We look forward to you being our guest for your next Disney Adventure...Thanks again!

Summary: This is tbe 3rd time we have stayed here.  I am always happy with the experience. The pool is better than most in the area. There's restaurants nearby, a little gift shop for drinks and snacks.  The staff were great, all were helpful and friendly. We had a small issue in our room which required a move which was handled right away even at 630am!  I can't comment on the noise from the bar as there was nothing going on there during our stay. We had no issues finding parking and they have valet that is included in the parking fee if you are unable to find a spot. I do wish they had more of a continental breakfast rather than the snack bags. It's so close to the park too.  We had 20 minutes to get back to the park to use fastpasses for splash mountain. We were able to get to splash
Manager Response: Dear  BHHStew514,  So happy to read that you got to fully enjoy our amenities and be close enough for all the Disney fun. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon...Thanks for the review!

Summary: Great beds, convenient to restaurants and easy walk across the street to Disneyland. The room was clean,  a good size , good TV channels,  a good view of fireworks.  The staff was better than the Disneyland staff! A snack bag every morning and free valet parking.  Too bad parking isn't free. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Kelly P,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We strive each day to be part of the magic of a Disneyland vacation... We hope you had a great trip at the Parks. Thanks again!

Summary: The staff was rude/not helpful with peoples disabilities Not enough parking for guest  The lobby is too small They wont check anyone in early, not even an hour. They one is told, we were sold out last night. Come back at 3pm for check in.
Manager Response: Dear Tina F  I am sorry to read of your experience with us. Please know that we do check in guests early any and all times rooms are available. As a high occupancy hotel, our wonderful housekeeping department works hard to get rooms clean and ready for arriving guests. We do guarantee rooms by check in time of 3 PM (which is an hour earlier than most local hotels). We all apologize if the information was not given to you in a polite and professional manner. Please know that is not our norm and your comments will be shared. Thank you for your review.

Summary: Near to Disney and great parking. Overall best experience. Next time also I will select this one is first. Staff was friendly. The good thing is near to Disney. Rooms are clean. Restrooms are very good.
Manager Response: Dear hareeshwar redd... g,  Thank you for your review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to your next visit and hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Resort...

Summary: Really nice hotel to stay it was really clean and had great customer service and is always really clean the swimming pool is really clean and the jacuzzi is great way to soak up your tired feet from walking all day in the park  these is the only hotel I stay every time we go to Disney I can‚Äôt wait for next year vacation :)
Manager Response: Dear doram259,  Thanks so much for making us part of all you Disney vacations! We love being part of the magic... Thank you for the review - see you next time!

Summary: Checked in this morning at 8:45am, and Hoang from the front desk really knew how to make our day! We were expecting to have to check our bags and wait for our room until this afternoon, but to our surprise we were able to check in and get our room SUPER early! He also topped it off by giving us some complimentary Mickey ears! Thanks for making it a Magic Morning, Hoang!
Manager Response: Dear Casey H,  Thank you for the review! So happy Hoang was able to check you in early - if it is available, we make it happen!  He is a great asset to our Front Desk and glad he started the "magic" early in your trip. Thanks again!

Summary: We had a premier room on the top floor facing the park.  We decided against the newer building b/c of the noise from the bar/restaurant on the top floor.    We were traveling with a one year old, so we needed a quiet room.  Never heard any noise from other rooms at all.  At night we could see the fireworks from the general balcony in front of our room.  Brenda was so helpful at check in and made sure we had a crib in the room by early evening.  The room was spacious and the floors were clean enough that we felt comfortable letting the baby crawl around.  We really appreciated the two sinks in the bathroom to speed up getting ready in the mornings.  The pool looked really nice, but we never used it.  We were able to walk to the park in less than 5 mins.   Valet parking was very
Manager Response: Dear aggmom,  Thank you for such a nice review! We appreciate your detail and sharing it with us. Our Premier rooms are a great choice for light sleepers or those with kids. It is a quieter area of the property and you can see the fireworks from the walkway outside most of the rooms. So fun! And thank you for the shout-out for Brenda. She is a great asset to our front desk! We look forward to seeing you all for your next Disney adventure...Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Perfect location, great room and friendly staff!
Summary: My wife and I, both from Australia, stayed here for our honeymoon to go to Disneyland. It was the perfect place! It‚Äôs a very short walk to the main entrance of Disneyland (5 minutes max), the room was kept clean and had all the facilities we required, plus extras that we didn‚Äôt get time for - swimming pool, spa and rooftop bar. The staff were very friendly, professional and polite. Not to mention a convenience store and takeaway food right out front. Highly recommend this place and hopefully we will be back one day with kids.
Manager Response: Dear bjmacadam89,  Congratulations on your marriage!  Thank you for choosing our hotel for such a special occasion... So happy for you both and can't wait for your next visit with a baby or two! : )  Thanks for the review...

Summary: My husband and I are trying to book a trip to Disneyland with our daughter and the front desk staff were extremely helpful and friendly. Celine the manager was very professional and addressed all our needs. We are excited to stay here in the future!
Manager Response: Dear laurencean3214,  Thank you for this review - we believe in assisting our guests well before their arrival date. Ensuring that you book the best room for your party is an important part of your travel plans. Celine is great at this and we are excited for your arrival. See you soon! Thanks again...

Summary: My stay at the Grand Legacy was an experirnce I wont soon forget, the room was very clean, the hotel was within walking distance from Disneyland, the pool area was clean the staff were courteous and helpful. Liked the snack bag provided every morning.
Manager Response: Dear Rudy L,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy you had a wonderful time and can't wait to see you again...

Summary: Upon arrival we were met with smiling hosts who were prompt to check us in to our three reserved rooms. The rooms were very clean, spacious, and with the expected amenities: wifi; fridge; microwave; ironing board; numerous channels on the TV; etc...  After a long day of driving with 6 adults, 2 of which were newlyweds, we spent a few hours relaxing in the clean hot tub and refreshing pool.  Later, we concluded one evening watching the Disneyland Fireworks show from the observation deck of The 5ifth, Anaheim's only rooftop restaurant, conveniently located at the Grand Legacy At The Park; great fun.  The Grand Legacy At The Park staff were great to work with; even Mr. Carlos Padilla (Assistant GM), took time to ensure our stay was everything we hoped for. This is at least my 6th
Manager Response: Dear Tim D,  So very happy that you enjoyed your stay and that you are a repeat guest with us! We love being part of your Disney adventures! And we agree with you about Carlos - he is wonderful and a great leader here at Grand Legacy. Thank you for the review and we look forward to your next stay with us...

Summary: Great stay, great staff, great location, great value & venue . My son called for TP at 11 pm one night and we got it in 5 min! That's service! Been s loyal guest for about 8 years. And we do so love the new wing facing the park! Never a problem.
Manager Response: Dear Andrew H,  Wow! Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review, and more importantly, we being a long time guest with us! We are so happy to be a part of your Disney memories. Thank you again and see you for your next Disney adventure!

Summary: The staff messed up my reservations and gave my family of four a small room even though i showed them the email confirmation that i paid extra for the larger two queen room. Brenda said she could put me in the larger room for extra money. She wouldn't even let me speak to a manager. After one night in the small room i ended up paying extra to be moved into the room i order originally in the first place. Seems like the staff is trained to make as much money as possible. The price advertised is much less than what you will end up paying.
Manager Response: Dear Praew P,  I am very sorry you had this experience. Please know that is not how we do business. We assign rooms according to what the guest reserves. Can mix-ups occur - of course, but we make the situation right and do not overcharge our guests. We want happy repeat guests and service as you described will not allow that goal to be met. Please call me at the hotel so I may research and remedy this situation for you. If you were overcharged for the room you originally booked - of course we refund you. If there was any confusion, I will be able to explain what happened. I apologize that you had difficulty while at the hotel, but we can still make this right. Thank you - Kerry Patterson 714.772.0440

Summary: What a fantastic hotel! From the location (right outside of the Park) to the staff and grounds to the amenities this hotel offers it all! The staff was incredibly friendly and helped us with parking, restaurant recommendations (they have several excellent ones on sight) and our son lit up every time their employees asked how he was doing and if we needed anything. The rooms are very clean and well decorated, they have a great pool and live music at the rooftop bar. A great place for the whole family! Thank you for an amazing time!
Manager Response: Dear mindybtravels,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We love seeing kids like your son in our lobby as they bring the excitement of Disneyland with them... We hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Resort and can't wait for your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed there for our honeymoon night. We love that the location was close to the park, the room was big enough, the bed was comfy, we had enough pillows between the 2 of us and we felt safe staying there. The only thing that really put a damper on our stay was the customer service we received during check in and check out. When we got there it was our first time staying so we weren‚Äôt really sure where to park but the friendly valet employee helped guide us to the lobby. Once inside the guest services clerk never greeted us or ask how we were doing, nothing. He just stared at us until we told him we were checking in. He didn‚Äôt smile or try to spark any sort of conversation, it made us feel very awkward and uncomfortable. It was sad really because he missed an area of
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing proximity to the park, clean rooms, free wifi, super friendly staff.
Summary: Clean and spacious rooms, lots of places to store clothing. Bathroom could have been better - not enough space to put toiletries in the bath. The shower head wasn't great and the water temperature jumped rapidly from piping hot to freezing cold at random moments. Staff is super friendly though - we received a welcome call once we were settled in our room, and when we requested additional towels they were delivered promptly. We didn't notice any noise from inside our rooms and it was easy to sleep. Amazingly close to the front gates of the park, and a nice selection of food and convenience shopping on the first floor.
Manager Response: Dear Miranda E,  We are so happy to have you as our guest! Thank you for the review... Please know some of our rooms are due for remodel later this year. Appears you were in one of those rooms. We are working on getting more counter space for those bathrooms. Thanks for the feedback - we appreciate it!  Hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks!  See you next time!

Summary: The staff was friendly, the location was great and the room was clean, however, the 5th is VERY loud at night and makes sleeping nearly impossible. If you have trouble falling/staying asleep then i would suggest staying at a different hotel.
Manager Response: Dear LunaBell B,  We are sorry you had trouble sleeping! That is never what we want! We do have many great room options that are away from the happenings of the FIFTH. We would be delighted to assist you in finding accommodation that works for your party that is away from the FIFTH. We hope to see you again....Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here on a recent trip to Disneyland. We chose a suite with a king size bed. It was very roomy, modern and clean. The bathroom seemed a little small. There wasn't a lot of counter space with the 2 sinks but that wasn't a big deal. If you're looking to stay close to the park then this is a great choice. Although we didn't stay in the new tower we had a late dinner on the roof of the 5th and watched the Disneyland fireworks. The parking is very limited (to be expected) and tight. Overall we had a very good stay.
Manager Response: Dear resa321t,  Thank you for being our guests and for your review! We hope you had a fabulous time at the Parks and we can't wait for your next stay with us...

Summary Heading: Great location, older rooms need a refresh
Summary: We previously stayed in the Tower, which was awesome. This time, however, we stayed in a "deluxe" King, which was anything but. The hotel's location is perfect for going to Disneyland, literally located across the street from the entrance.  The room was a good size, but it was a bit old and tired-looking, as if it had been built in the 1970's and then forgotten. Also, the shower was dirty, with a leaking shower head.  If you're going to stay here, then pay the extra money to stay in one of the newer tower rooms.
Manager Response: Dear lotsoftravel2018,  Thanks for the review! Yes, the front building is newly built and the Deluxe rooms are in an original section. We have remodeled a large section of rooms with more on the schedule in the near future. It is a process since we cannot remodel all at once, but we appreciate your patience and look forward to next visit. Give us a call and we can ensure you get into a remodeled room type!  Thanks again!

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel numerous times and we love it. Morning snack bag, very very short walk to Disneyland (it is far closer than if you park in the Disneyland parking garage and take the tram. The  hotel staff is always very nice.
Manager Response: Dear dianaj656,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We so appreciate your loyalty and being one of the Grand Legacy family!  We hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks - see you again soon...

Summary: Just as mentioned in the title. Overall good experience. Parking was limited but valet was available. Vending machines on first floor weren‚Äôt accepting cash, but front desk was able to help. Beds were comfy - good enough for sleeping. Showers and overall facility was clean. Breakfast bags were underwhelming.
Manager Response: Dear Cyril M,  Thank you for the review and for being our guest...We all hope you had a magical time at Disneyland!  We look forward to seeing your on your next Disney Adventure.  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay, due to it's close proximity to Disneyland.
Summary: Couldn't want for anything more, but to be a 6 minute walk to Disneyland, in a quiet and comfortable place. Comfortable rooms, comfortable beds, nice pool area. It's no frills, but perfect for us as we just want somewhere to hang out and rest for a few hours in the afternoon from a busy morning at Disneyland, that's a quick walk back and forth to the park. Plenty of eating areas on the street.
Manager Response: Dear lauralynne25,  Thank you for the review! We appreciate you being our guest and that we got to be part of your Disney memories! We hope to see you for your next Disney adventure...thanks again!

Summary Heading: Best site on Harbor Blvd within walking distance to Disney
Summary: It is everything you need- quiet, comfortable and an easy walk to Disney! An extremely well kept facility-inside and out. The to go breakfast bag with fruit, cheese, water bottle and granola bar was perfect for the morning walk to the park. The pool area was clean, and towels were always stocked.  Very quiet for the amount of pedestrians coming on and off the site. Office staff was very knowledgeable and helpful. They stored bags for free since we arrived before checkin.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P,  We thank you for your review! We strive each day to ensure a relaxing and comfortable for all our guests. We hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks and look forward to seeing you for your next Disney Adventure!  Thanks again!

Summary: We always stay here for our Disney trip! Close to park, clean and friendly service! They offer a snack bag with water bottle, apple , cheese stick, and a granola bar daily. The pool is awesome and my kids love it !
Manager Response: Dear Michelle S,  Thanks so much for the 5 out of 5 review! Even more thanks for being our guests!  Hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks! See you next time...

Summary Heading: Wouldn't check me in, Called in the Police, Then still charged me for a night.
Summary: I arrived at the hotel with my 9 year old after travelling for 26hrs. I had contacted the hotel before I arrived to let them know that the room was booked on the credit card of a family member not travelling with me. They denied receiving that email & refused to check me in, Even after bookings.com phoned them to verify the credit card etc. They called a police officer in to "watch me" as I emotionally broke down in front of my son - zero compassion was shown, I was ignored, not even offered a drink of water. I had to plead for a drink for my son who was also in tears. In consultation with bookings.com they agreed to cancel to booking at no charge & I was emailed the paperwork to confirm there would be a $0 charge for the room. The Police officer was disgusted at the way the
Manager Response: none

Summary: My friend and I came here to stay for our Disneyland trip. Hoang check up in early which was super awesome since we had been driving since 2 am. I didn't think we would get to check in till 3 but he created some magic for us and we got our room early. So incredibly thankful for that. I will definitely stay here again and if you haven't been here before I highly  recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear stephanieshaw0079,  So happy that Hoang was able to accommodate an early check-in for you... We all know how tiring travel can be!
