If a room is ready and the guest is here - we check them in. Have to get that vacation started!  Thank you for the review and we all hope you enjoyed your time at the Parks!

Summary: If you‚Äôre going to go to Disneyland a majority of the time, this is the hotel for you. Location is perfect walking distance to the park, and we had a 4 month baby with us! Hotel stay overall was decent, we mainly had an issue with the shower drain. It was very slow, but since we were barely in the room, we didn‚Äôt have many problems. Beds were comfy and clean, and we had enough space to bring a pack n play for our baby.   Keep in mind this hotel doesn‚Äôt include parking within their fees, so it is slightly pricy. But we expect everything to be pricy when it comes to hotels super close to Disney. We were here for 4 nights, and had a happy experience. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Maryannneee,  So happy our property worked well for your family! We have a stellar maintenance crew so we will be able to fix any issues you may have. Please give the front desk a call and they will take care of it for you. We want our guests to feel comfortable and at home. Thank you for your review and hope you had a great time at the Resort!

Summary: We just returned from ten nights at the Grand Legacy.  It was great being able to walk 5-10 minutes to Disneyland/California Adventure across the road.  We stayed in a comfort plus room on the second floor which was clean and comfortable.  Coffee was supplied but it would have been nice to be able to make a cup of tea as well.  Small fridge and microwave supplied.  The convenience store onsite was handy for little cereal boxes and milk etc.  Also had dinner at the pizza shop one night which was very tasty.  We also purchased an ART Transport bus pass from the Tour shop.   This hotel is great value for money, the Fifth restaurant is great for watching the fireworks and listening to live music.   The only annoying thing at night is peoples car alarms going off outside late at
Manager Response: Dear KATDAV23,  Thank you for your detailed review!  We are so happy you were able to use many of our amenities... Hope you had a fabulous time at the Disneyland Resort and we'll be ready for your next visit. Thank you!

Summary: The room was clean, comfortable, and close to the park. A little pricey with all the added fees and and $15 parking per day. Nice to be able to just walk across from Disneyland and take a nap if you have little ones then return to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Stacy E,  Thank you for the review, Stacy E! Our location does make it easy for that power nap in the afternoon or a quick dip in the pool to cool off... Happy to have you as our guests and hope to see you for your next trip to the Anaheim Resort!  Thanks again!

Summary: We had stayed at the Grand Legacy previously and it was terrible. We were conviced to come back, and I am so glad we did. Theresa, the new manager has really turned the place into a gem. The location is unbeatable, the pool is clean and the staff is friendly!
Manager Response: Dear jolene h,   Thanks for staying with us!  Yes, Theresa is a great addition to the team... Can't wait to see you on your next Disney adventure...Thanks again!

Summary: Not only was this hotel adorable and clean, as well as convenienty located a block away from Disneyland, but the staff is awesome, specifically Huang!  He was amazing and super helpful, and he gave us free Minnie Mouse ears just because we‚Äôd never been to the park before!  He was fantastic, and helped make our trip the best trip ever!  Love him!
Manager Response: Dear Erin S,  Thank you for the review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us, and yes, Huang is awesome!  Thanks again...

Summary Heading: Grand Legacy At The Park Hotel in Anaheim is Magical Across the Street from the Main Gates of Disneyland!
Summary: Grand Legacy At The Park Hotel in Anaheim is just feet from the Main Gates of the disneyland resort and parks. The hotel itself is awesome with a pool that has a beach entry and splash play as well as a rooftop lounge with views of the disneyland resort and fireworks! You can dine on site or at the food options directly attached to hotel like Jimboys tacos. There are also multi room suites. We stayed with a club soccer team for team building and it was such a fun experience for the team! We've stayed many time for many different reasons! Sometimes we don't even go into the parks but enjoy staycation around the dlr. Love it!
Manager Response: Dear OnTheGoOC,  Thanks for the review! So happy to have you visit with us again.. We have THE best guests! Can't wait for your next staycation!

Summary: Enjoyed the hotel. Laundry facility was especially useful on a long trip. Would have appreciated more dining options, as only Gifth restaurant which was booked up. Outside is mostly fast food and even my kids started to say they were fed up with burgers and pizza. A coffee shop or sandwich bar would be great.
Manager Response: Dear lyn Q,  Thanks for the review! Happy that you were able to use our amenities!  Variety is a good thing - please know there are many restaurants within a 2-10 minute walk. We will be more than happy to assist in finding nearby options during your next visit. Hope you had a great time at Disneyland! Thanks again!

Summary: Loved the pool, perfect for little ones. So close to Disney, walking distance! They provided snack bags in the morning which were perfect for our day. Parking is on the small side but we never had an issue finding a spot.
Manager Response: Dear Bere M,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! So happy to hear that the little ones enjoyed the pool! We hope that your family comes to visit us for your next Disney Adventure...

Summary: When I called to book my room directly with the hotel I specifically asked for a room with elevator access or on the first floor because of disability concerns. I also asked for an adjoining room with my traveling guests and the receptionist relayed she couldn't guarantee this but would make a notation in my booking. These requests were obviously ignored. My room was in a old section of the motel with no elevator access. The front desk clerk was extremely nice and accommodating saying she would upgrade my family to a 1st floor deluxe room at no additional charge. The upgraded room was disgusting. The carpet was littered with garbage and crumbs and what looked like pet food. Housekeeping had obviously not vacuumed. We noticed a moldy, humid smell in the room and realized the wall
Manager Response: Dear Nen8189,  We are sorry you had a bad experience... please know that is NOT our norm. Much of our property has been recently remodeled and more is on the schedule.  As we have already communicated about these issues - I will say thank you for the feedback and we all hope you had a fun time at the Parks.

Summary: My husband & I stayed at the Grand Legacy for the weekend and loved it.  The room was clean and very comfortable - beds were awesome.  We really enjoyed the pool and the AC in the room since the weather was so hot.  We also had drinks on the roof top deck and watched the firework display from Disneyland across the street - they even played the music from the park.  Staff were very friendly and accommodating.  Loved that it was close to restaurants, coffee shops and the House of Blues.  Really was good value for our money.
Manager Response: Dear Connie S,  Thank you for the very nice review! We are happy you got to use so many of our amenities.  Glad you had a great time and looking forward to your next visit with us!  Thanks again

Summary Heading: Best family/leisure hotel for Disney trips
Summary: I have stayed here 4 times now and each time I am consistently impressed witht the cleanliness and amenities of this hotel. If youre all avout customer service like me then you wont find a better hotel unless you stay with Disney itself (at over 1000 a night!)  The rooms are clean, beds comfortable and the tub in the bathroom is DEEP for a nice soak after hours at the park.   The pool is shaped like an s and goes from a shallow splash depth to 5ft which naturally keeps little ones and bigger kids in different areas. They even have a splash park and hot tub.   The staff are incredible. They provide snacks in the morming for the kids [water apple string cheese] and the front desk is so pleasent and accommodating. They will hold your backs at check in/check out if you arent done at
Manager Response: Dear ronni a,  Thank you for your 5 out of 5 review!  And a big thank you for being a loyal guest with us!  We love being part of the magic of a Disneyland vacation.... We all are looking forward to your next stay with us. Thanks again!

Summary: Clean, comfortable room came with extra towels and pillows, everything you need! Parking is an additional fee, but valet is included, which is nice because finding parking was a little hectic. Conveniently close the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda H,  Thank you for the wonderful review! We appreciate you sharing your experience with us...We hope to see you for your next Disney adventure!  Thanks again

Summary: The location (literally across the street from the main entrance to the parks) is the reason to stay here. We stayed in the new "tower," which is 5 stories high. The rooms in the new tower are nice, and the sink is outside the rest of the bathroom (making it easier for two people to get ready at once). Toiletries are Tarocco, in a light blood orange scent. Service was friendly, and they offer a complimentary to-go breakfast bag with an apple, cheese stick, granola bar, and bottle of water.  Three things to be aware of: 1) The new tower is noisy until about midnight due to the club on the 5th floor. For two adults, this wasn't really a problem, but if you are traveling with kids or are a light sleeper, I would not recommend the new tower. 2) In the description of the room, the
Manager Response: Dear Christina S,  Thank you for your informative review! And it is true - the FIFTH is in our newest building at the front of the property. If guests will be at Disney until closing - the FIFTH shouldn't be an issue. But as you said, if you are a light sleeper or have kids - we have plenty of great options where the FIFTH will not be a factor. Without knowing your room type, I cannot answer your room occupancy observation. We do have suites in the front tower that can have more than the average 4 or 5 guests of our non-suite rooms. And you are correct - there is a parking fee. However, self and valet parking are the same rate so if one would like to hand off the keys and not worry about parking - we are happy to accommodate!  Thank you again for your review and for staying at the Grand Legacy - we hope you had a magical time at the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Our family of four stayed here for a recent Disneyland trip of 4 days. Great stay Grand Legacy with clean, spacious rooms that had everything we needed. Very friendly staff at  check in. Only about a five minute walk to the Disney park area. Plenty of places for breakfast or lunch nearby. There is a Denny's, an IHOP, and McDonald's as well as a Tony Roma's next door. Pool area was very clean and a great place to cool off after our park days. We will stay here again if we return to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Csb3872,  Thank you for staying with us and for the review! So happy you enjoyed the pool - especially with the heat that we've had for July! We would be delighted to your family stay with us again the next time you visit the area...Thanks again!

Summary: The Grand Legacy is my favorite hotel to stay at when we come to Anaheim. I‚Äôve been coming back to this location for years and I‚Äôm always amazed at the friendly, helpful and top notch employees. The rooms are fantastic, super clean, spacious and comfortable! The pool is great for everyone and my kids always ask to come back to this hotel for the kids water feature. Great value and great price! See you in A few months!
Manager Response: Dear melindasrodriguez,  Oh, how we love our long-time returning guests! We truly do love being part of the Disney memories your family will forever share. Thank you for bringing us along! See you again soon!

Summary Heading: 40th Year High School Reunion John F Kennedy in La Palma, Ca
Summary: I decided to attend my 40th HS Reunion kinda at the last second. I called the Legacy at the Park Hotel and was told the Hotel was sold out. I explained that our Reunion was at The 5th, the only upstairs outdoor Restaurant/Bar in Orange County. I was connected to Theresa and was told essentially the same thing. From the start, my impression was that if there ANY way possible, Theresa was going to make it happen. I didn't share the same confidence as her, even to the point of not wanting to give her my cell #, but reluctantly did. The next morning I received a call from Jennifer explaining that a room had opened up and was I interested? WOW...it's super simple to talk about customer service, BUT it's completely different when it's ACTUALLY done. Much props to Jennifer...AND
Manager Response: Dear chezyeo1,  Thanks for the review and the shout outs for Jennifer and Theresa. Both work hard to make sure our guests can relax and have a great time while in the Resort area. We all hope you had a great time at the reunion making even more memories with those high school friends!

Summary: I would like to start by saying that the afternoon staff of the hotel are lovely.  When we arrived they checked us in with smiles and Juan was very kind.  There were two women there as well who were so sweet to my daughter and even gave her Minnie ears for the day which she was thrilled to have when she met her favorite mouse.  It was a great start. Sadly the end of our days were not as magical. The week before our trip I booked a room online which was back by the pool. Later in the day I deciding to upgrade closer to the park, so I called the hotel and asked for one of the luxury rooms in the front building.   I WISH when I told her I was checking in with just myself and a 4 year old that she would have mentioned the club and the band playing above us.  Our room was SHAKING due
Manager Response: Dear 4Fstraveltime,  While we are happy you had a good check in experience and like the physical room, we are sorry to see that you did not have a good experience. It is our policy to inform of the FIFTH and the potential noise and I apologize if that was not explained to you. I am sorry if your trip was tainted in any way.  We do have many other wonderful options for families staying with us that are not near the FIFTH. I have reached out to you via email yesterday to discuss this in further detail. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: A clean, well lit place, and close to the parks. A few steps down from the main cross walk and you are in. Rooms are clean and well appointed for the price point. I found the beds to be quite comfortable and noise levels not a problem at all. I have always stayed in the exterior buildings, so not sure if the night club gets too noisy or not-but I do know it is a great place to view the fireworks. Staff always friendly and helpful, they have no problem holding luggage if you visit the parks after you check out. As is the case with most places on Harbor, parking is extra. I have stayed here 5-6 times in the last 2 years, perfect for our DL Park visits or my solo add on trips.
Manager Response: Dear ElkGroveChris,  Thanks for your review and for being a happy repeat guest! We love seeing those familiar faces enter the lobby for another Disney Adventure... Can't wait to see you for your next one. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if Disney is your destination!
Summary: Would stay here again. Nice rooms. Clean. Quiet. Easy to navigate to Disney. Wonderful staff-very friendly and accommodating. No complaints.  Had a problem with the shower which was fixed immediately after calling.
Manager Response: Dear LynnieMarieRD,  Thank you for your review, LynnieMarieRD... We appreciate your feedback and happy that you enjoyed your stay with us! Hope to see you for your next Disney Adventure...  Thanks again!

Summary Heading: clean, literally across the street from Disney, enough parking
Summary: Clean, literally across the street from Disney, enough parking, friendly staff, they let us park in the morning before afternoon check-in so we could go to the park, 2 pizza places within walking distance (choose Pizza Press across the street!). Little footsteps running above us alot, but not unbearable and not at night- but also somewhat expected in an older hotel for families. Would definitely stay again for a Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear _megameg_1,  Thank you for your review... So happy your family stayed with us for your Disney adventure! Sounds like you got to start it the minute you arrived to the area! Awesome! Happy to have you park and go start your vacation. Get in as much fun as you can! Looking forward to your next stay with us...Thanks again!

Summary: We took our son to Disneyland for his birthday and chose The Grand Legacy to stay at. It was so close to the park - literally across the street!  So convenient !! The staff was great!  Theresa - I believe a manager - was so warm and helpful. In our 3 day stay with The Grand Legacy we encountered several staff members that we would like to thank ~ Julianna, Daisy, Martha & Juan.  You made our stay so much more that we expected.  Cant wait to come back next year! !
Manager Response: Dear alyciadrury,  Thank you for celebrating such a special occasion with us! We hope your son had an awesome birthday... So happy you got to interact with our excellent front desk team! We appreciate your shout-outs...they do a great job! We can't wait for your next stay with us - Thanks again!

Summary: Celine was the hotel manager, and Juan checked us out.  We love the hotel! The room was spacious and the location was perfect! We would definitely recommend staying at this hotel. The staff was so friendly and accommodating! We will definitely return!!
Manager Response: Dear Tonya S,  Thank you for your review! We appreciate you recognizing our amazing front desk team... We hope you had a great time at Disneyland and look forward to your next visit with us . Thanks again!

Summary: We stayed for my Grandson's 4th birthday at The Grand Legacy for 3 nights~.our first time at this hotel.  The walk to Disneyland was so close!!  This will be our Go-To hotel from now on!!   The Front Desk Manager, Theresa, whom we met checking in, was so friendly and accommodating.  The staff was the friendliest I have encountered!  Eufrocina and Brenda were so welcoming and informative. Our rooms were nice, clean and comfortable ~ slept well!! I want to say Thank You to the staff at The Grand Legacy for making my Grandson (and our family) feel special and for the wonderful service provided. We will be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear mychelemybell7,  Happy Birthday! We LOVE birthday celebrations! Thanks for the shout-outs for our stellar front desk team - Theresa, Eufrocina, and Brenda are wonderful representatives of the Grand Legacy team. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and hope that your grandson had a magical birthday at the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you for your review!

Summary: Loved the hotel! We loved the location, staff, and pool!! Room was very clean and beds were so comfortable! We found our new go to hotel! The only thing I would change is providing some sort of breakfast so parents can get a faster start to Disney, the snack bags are cool (water, apple, string cheese, granola bar) but would prefer breakfast instead. Overall a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear cynthiarcortez,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We so appreciate your feedback and are honored to be your new "go-to" hotel! I will share your comments with our management team. Thanks again and can't wait for your next visit!

Summary: My new favorite hotel to stay at while visiting Disneyland Resort!  I have stayed at this property a few times and have had no issues at all.  It is very clean and the staff is very friendly.  It is conveniently located to the Disneyland Resort within walking distance so no need to hassle with parking.  There is a nightclub above the lobby, but I have not had any issues with noise while visiting.  I have a trip coming up and I was browsing around on the website comparing prices to make sure I am getting the best deal and I realized that the price had dropped for an even better room (2 queens vs 2 doubles) since the time I originally booked my room.  I called the hotel and spoke with Theresa to find out if I needed to cancel my reservation and rebook and she helped me over the
Manager Response: Dear Rachel C,  Ahhhh! We are so happy to be your new favorite hotel for your Disney Adventures! Our team strives to make each guest feel welcome and comfortable from reservation to checkout. Thanks for the shout-out about Theresa - she is a fabulous member of our Front Desk team. We all look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim Resort. Thanks again!

Summary: Our stay was great. Cloae to Disneyland entrance. The day we checkes out thwy allowed us to come back and use the pool bedore we left  even thou we had checked out. It was so bice to cool off before heading to the  airport
Manager Response: Dear Elda E,  Happy to read that you had a great stay with us! We appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon.  Thank You!

Summary: Amazing room. Friendly staff. Really made it feel like a relaxing vacation. It was crazy hot so the pool was a plus. Perfect size for the whole family. Loved that my 2 year old could enjoy the toddler side of the pool. Already stayed here in the past and I know I'll be coming back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Miguel V,  Thank you for your review! And yes...it's been crazy hot so we're glad you got to enjoy the pool! We are so exited to have your family as happy repeat guests...See you for your next Disney Adventure - Thanks again

Summary: I would have given 5 stars if after I had to wait for my room all the linens were actually in the room.  The snack bags they give out are so better than ‚Äòcontinental breakfasts‚Äô; they include granola bar, apple, cheese stick and a water bottle! Make sure you eat on the roof at the Fifth; it was SO good. The mozzarella sticks were the best I have ever had
Manager Response: Dear Firedancerlady,  Thanks for the review! We are so happy you enjoyed the snack bags, and yes, the mozzarella sticks at the FIFTH are awesome! Hope you had a magical time at the Happiest Place on Earth!

Summary Heading: Great location, customer service not great.  The rooms are not "Grand" very small and tight, no elevator.
Summary: The location was excellent, the name "Grand" not so much.  Rooms are so small, the shower and the toilet in one room, you can literally roll yourself into the bath from the toilet.  Not much room to move around, good sized refrigerator and there was a microwave.  There is no elevator or at least I was never told where it was, we had a room on the second floor a girls trip for 3 days so we had a lot of luggage.  The night clerk for some reason was so rude, he did not take a few minutes to explain where the room was or how to log into Wi-Fi.   Slightly over priced, it is truly for the location about a 5 minute walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Gloria J,  I was sorry to read of your less than great experience with our property... Please know that this is not our norm and is being addressed. I have responded more directly in an email to you from your answered survey. Please contact me directly if you have any additional concerns or questions.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Location is great near disneyland. didnt have to move my car after arriving clean rooms and friendly staff. All restautants within walking distance plus the pool is nice and warm for the kids. Nice location....
Manager Response: Dear alonzo p,   So happy we got to be a part of your family vacation... We all hope you had a wonderful time at the Parks! Thank you for your review and can't wait to have you visit us for the next family trip.

Summary: All I can say is the service and hotel was simply amazing!!! Te valet parking staff really went out of there way to make our stay less chaotic with all the traffic flow. As soon as you walk in the reception staffs great customer service is noticed! They are so kind and very helpful especially Celene she really went out of her way to accommodate us. The room was very clean and the beds very comfortable. The rooftop bar on the 5th floor has a breathtaking view of Disneyland and amaizng live music I really can‚Äôt wait to stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Citlali S,  Thank you so much for the 5 out of 5 review and your shout out to Celene! Celene and the entire Front Office staff strive each day to provide a wonderful guest experience. So happy you had time in your trip to enjoy the FIFTH and those Gorgeous views... We can't wait to have you stay with us again too!

Summary: I travelled To the grand legacy with my dance studio, which included about 23 other families. We were all staying for duration of 9 nights, so NOT a small group on a small trip!  All of our bookings were done through a travel agent which was very convenient for us due to the many types of rooms, sizes of families and different accommodations we needed.  Unfortunately there is a lot of information that you do not get when you‚Äôre booking through a group, specifically pertaining to the suites. Most of the suites are handicap accessible which they do not tell you, this means no bath tub. For families with small children that‚Äôs a problem.  Most were trying to make it work however the showers are even with the bathroom floor most often turning the bathroom into a lake.  We personally
Manager Response: Dear kristintraveller,  Thank you for your feedback and for booking your group with us. I am sorry for the breakdown in communication of you not being informed of the FIFTH and potential noise. We do our best to ensure all guests are able to make an educated choice for their party. I know that our Front Office Management is in communication with our Group Coordinator and they are discussing your stay and the issues. One or both of them will be reaching out to you very soon (if they haven‚Äôt already). I have also sent your feedback to our Executive Housekeeper & Chief Engineer. Those are rare issues and I apologize that your group experienced any inconvenience.  We enjoyed having your Group stay with us and would love to have you back. We would work closely with you to ensure a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Thank you again and we hope that you all had fun at Disneyland!

Summary: Loved our stay at the Grand Legacy Hotel! Clean rooms and friendly staff! Jonathan, front desk, was very helpful when we needed to find someone to replace our cracked phone screen! Free valet with paid parking, too! Location is perfect for a Disneyland Adventure!!
Manager Response: Dear dcarroll1959,  ...and we loved have your stay with us! Thank you for the review and so happy Jonathan was able to assist with a phone emergency! We all hope you had a great time at the Parks and come back again soon.  Thank you again!

Summary Heading: I had a very nice stay.
Summary: Nice and clean with a friendly staff. The children and myself enjoyed the pool. There is restaurants to eat right there so no need to travel. The taco and icecream was awesome. We bought keepsakes for a lower price right there.
Manager Response: Dear Kellie C,  So happy to read that you enjoyed our pools and restaurants. With the weather being so hot lately, it is great to have the Creamistry right up front! Thank you for the review...Stay cool!

Summary: We were incredibly disappointed in the quality of room and overall experience during our two-night stay. In full disclosure, we stayed in the ‚Äúclassic room,‚Äù which is the hotel‚Äôs basic room and lowest price point. However, we could not have anticipated the disappointing state of the room based on the description on Grand Legscy‚Äôs website when we booked. There were stains in the carpet, paint chipping on the doors and the bathroom sink was deteriorating/starting to detach from the wall.   We were assigned a room on the first floor in the outdoor complex, which backed up to the parking lot and contributed to a noisy environment (car doors shutting, group conversations, wheeling luggage - we heard it all). In addition, our room was an adjoining room to the space next door. That,
Manager Response: Dear Becky M,  Thank you for your review‚Ä¶they can be tough to read sometimes, but we like to know so we may improve. Please know that we have recently remodeled a large number of rooms and the room type you were in is scheduled for remodeling soon as well. I apologize that we did not have another room type available for you. This is a busy time of year and options are often limited if not unavailable. We would have been more than happy to accommodate if options were available. We would love to have you back and a Premier room sounds like the perfect room type for you and your party. Please call us directly if you would like to speak more about your stay or to book a room that would best suit your party.  Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for families.
Summary: Rooms include a refrigerator, free internet, (for your teenagers) and microwave (for the leftovers you were too tired to eat). Staff are friendly, hospitable and accommodating. Rates are reasonable. Rooms are very clean and well appointed. But most of all,  you will be less than a 7 min. walk to the main gate of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear albryta03,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We are so happy that we had what you needed for a happy Disneyland trip! Can't wait to have your family visit us again for another magical vacation...Thanks again

Summary: Stayed here for my son's 5th birthday and Diseylands 63rd. Staff was very friendly, rooms were nice and it was a short, easy walk to the park, we could even see fireworks from our room which our boys loved.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon Z,  Happy 5th Birthday! How fun to share it with Disneyland! We are honored that you spent such a special event at our property. Thank you so much for the review and we can't wait for the next special event!

Summary: Awful service, unpolite people and more than all they organized during the fair a party on the rooftop with music volume that was far away above the tolerance. It was like having a disco in the room. When called the reception i was said that the management is different so they cannot do anything.
Manager Response: Dear Paola M,  I am sorry to hear you were inconvenienced by the music. That is not want we wish for our guests. We do have rooms that are very nice and away from the rooftop happenings. If you would like to give us another try - we would be very happy to assist and show that you can have a wonderful and peaceful stay with us. Thank you for your feedback... We hope that you had a magical time at Disneyland.

Summary Heading: I absolutely love staying at this hotel. Everything about it is wonderful!
Summary: This is my 4th time staying at this hotel, and I have never had a bad experience here. The staff is extremely helpful and so friendly! Everyone clearly has the intent of ensuring that you have your best trip.  The proximity to the park cannot be beat, and makes it easy to come and go as you need to throughout the day, if you're there to visit Disneyland.  The room was lovely and comfortable, and on a VERY hot weekend like we experience this trip, we found that the cooling system worked very well.  I've already got two more trips planned to stay in this hotel, and while I've tried out several hotels and motels in the area, this has become my favorite and go-to! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
Manager Response: Dear Julie H,  Thank you for your review! All of our departments - housekeeping, maintenance and the front office - work hard each day to ensure a comfortable stay for our guests. We are honored to have you as a repeat guest with us! Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: I love this hotel ! The location is amazing right across from Disneyland. But what makes this hotel even better is the hospitality. Hoang was very welcoming and had great customer service. He made sure to make my wife feel comfortable with her corncerns . She likes to make sure the room is in tip top shape when traveling with our son.  Hoang made sure to put any questions she had at ease. He was very informative as well when I had questions about future visits. We will definitely back !
Manager Response: Dear maximus091416,  Thank you so much for your review! And thanks for the shout-out about Hoang - he is a great asset to our property.  We hope the whole family had a great time at the Parks and we can't wait for your next visit.  Thanks again!

Summary: We had a great stay at the Grand Legacy, clean modern room, free parking and only a short walk to Disneyland. The only disappointment was we stayed on a Monday night and didnt get to enjoy the roof top bar, unusual to have something like this closed when it is Summer holidays?
Manager Response: Dear Joanne A,  Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review! We are happy you got to stay with one of our comp parking specials! We don't get to do them often but love doing them when we can. Hope to see you all again soon... Thank you!!

Summary: I couldn't be happier with the Grand Legacy! It was the perfect affordable place to stay while taking my family to The Disney Parks. Location was terrific. Attached stores and creamery were so convenient. Three mom's all went together with our kids and the staff was so accommodating and booked our three rooms right next to each other. They supplied us with a roll away to accommodate enough sleeping room. The pool was the perfect place to take a rejuvenated break from the parks midday before heading back for more fun. I don't even have to think about where to book when we decide on another trip to Disneyland! Couldn't be happier!
Manager Response: Dear lizonnet,  You just made our day! We are so happy that you had a great time with us and at the Disneyland Resort! We work hard to be part of the magic of a Disney vacation...  Thank you for your review and can't wait to see you next time!

Summary: Kids just loved the place!! You just walk to Disneyland from the hotel. The restaurants around are also awesome.   Place is good, staff is good and it is good value money as well.  They gave us extra roll on bed that was very useful.
Manager Response: Dear Mohammad S,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We are happy that your family enjoyed our property and can't wait to see you next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.  Thanks again!

Summary: Okay visit for what it was worth for my fianc√© and I. Hidden charges like any other resort/hotel the price advertised wasn‚Äôt what I paid, charged parking is outrageous when paying hundreds for a room (much like checking bags on airlines), noisy hallways you can hear everyone walking past your room and no continental breakfast. Wasn‚Äôt the best place and not good for families.
Manager Response: Dear Austin B,  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize if you were surprised by the parking fee. We do try to have it posted wherever you may find hotel.  Unfortunately, in this area and with the limited space, a parking fee is necessary.  We do hope that you enjoyed your time at the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: The staff could not have been more helpful. It was my son's birthday and they ALL wished him happy birthday and made him feel extremely special. They accommodated my ever need. We wanted to park at the hotel before we could check in and they gave us our parking pass early in the morning. The room was very clean and comfortable. It is like a hidden gem across the street from Disneyland. Who knew a hotel in such close proximity could be so reasonably priced? My family had a wonderful experience and look forward to our next stay.
Manager Response: Dear  lottfusonl,  Thank you for your "gem" of a review! We LOVE when guests have something special to celebrate while staying with us. It's a party for us as well! We hope that it was an extra magical birthday for your son and that extra special memories were made at Disneyland.  We look forward to your next visit with us - Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Locked out of room due to maint issue - no assistance!
Summary: Due to faulty lock (no fault of ours) we were locked out of our room - we were told maint would be in in 10 min - an hour later (standing outside our room) they admitted maint would not report in until later.  Missed early Disney entrance!
Manager Response: Dear joditeee,  We are all sorry that you encountered this issue! While we work hard every day to maintain excellence for all - at times, problems occur. Please know this issue as been forwarded to the Chief Engineer so that this issue is fixed and no longer occurs. Thank you for informing us so we may remedy it immediately. We hope you did have a wonderful time at Disneyland...Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Over all experience was good, the 5 minute walk to Disney was awesom especially when you have 2 little ones and you can go back to hotel for their nap time on a 113 degree summer day. Room was small but ok for a family of 4. The pool was a great entertainment for the kids it‚Äôs small enough that kids can walk around on their own with parent supervision of course. Parking was good, bussie at nigh time. If you going for a Disney trip is a good hotel to stay at. I would say the only downside of the hotel is their furniture it little old side.
Manager Response: Dear schavez33g,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay - sorry we couldn't do anything about that heat though...VERY hot! Please know that we have recently completed remodeling a section of rooms and more are planned. We want to be your comfy home away from home... Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here three nights on a recent Disneyland getaway (‚ÄòNana & Me‚Äô trip 6/16) & was thrilled with the location. Bag lunch is really just a snack and the same exact thing every day, I think it would be nice to change it up a bit. Beds are not that comfortable- but we may have had old / not yet updated furnishings.  I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Karen R,  We are so excited we were a part of your special trip! Those are memories that last a lifetime... We are working on remodeling rooms - we recently finished a large section and more are planned. We hope to be a part of your next special getaway.  Thank you for staying with us and for your feedback.

Summary: Very close to Disneyland, easy walk to and from. AP discount on rooms and parking, although Early Bird Booking is a better deal. Parking is tight, but there is valet. Rooms are clean, in room coffee, microwave and refrigerator. Snack bags are great! Bags are given at the pool area from 7 to 9 am, and have a bottle of water, string cheese and apple. We like to be in the park at rope drop, so this was very helpful to have.  This is a motel, and has been refurbished. The grounds needed sweeping, the AC is a wall unit (not central air), and bring a power strip to plug in your devices. I didn't find bell service, so we carried our bags. Convenience store, pizza, tacos, ice cream all in front of the hotel. We didn't go to the rooftop restaurant.  This is good value for your money and
Manager Response: Dear Gina M,  Thank you for your detailed feedback...We appreciate your time in sharing your experience with us.  We hope you had a great time at the Parks and look forward to your next visit.  Thanks again!

Summary: Room was clean, refrigerator could have been a little colder. Staff seemed nice and helpful. The snack pack was good. I would like to have more of a breakfast at resorts but still good.   Reasonable rates. Easy walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear mmic1497,  Thank you for your review - we are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you had a wonderful time at Disneyland!

Summary Heading: poor accommodations for the money.  Very close to Disneyland
Summary: Rooms are small and air conditioning is poor.  Rates are high for the type of property.  Parking is extremely limited and is impacted by Club on site.  There is nothing Grand about this converted MOTEL.  Its close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Terri L,  We appreciate your feedback...we continually work on making parking an easier experience. We do have FIFTH guests park off site so spots can be used for hotel guests. Hotel guests are first priority! Thank you again for sharing your experience.

Summary: Walk to Disneyland easily! Wonderful pool and staff! Reasonably priced food all around. Great spot. The rooms were clean and everyone was very helpful and friendly. Check-in and out were painless and fast.
Manager Response: Dear Judy S,  Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review! So happy we were able to be part of your Disneyland experience! Hope you had a magical time...

Summary Heading: Location and room were great!  Hoang and check-in team provided great customer service!
Summary: We stayed there last week (Jun 25-28), Hoang took care of us at check-in and set us up with a great room.  We stayed in the new tower and heard that it could be noisy because of the rooftop bar/restaurant, but they close by 10 pm and we didn't back to the room until after 11 each night, so it wasn't a problem.  Great location - right across the street from main park entrance.  A nice upgrade would be to have coffee and juice in the lobby for guests. Starbucks (outside the park) didn't open until 10 am.
Manager Response: Dear V P,  Thanks for the awesome review and for the shout-out for Hoang! We appreciate your time in sharing your experience with us. Hope you had a magical time at Disneyland!

Summary: Love the location. Have visited Disneyland 7 times and this is the best priced and minutes from the park. I plan to visit many more times and will always stay here. No better deal and you are truly minutes from the park entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Charity S,  Wow! Thanks for the awesome review! It means a lot coming from a seasoned Disney visitor. We are delighted to be your home away from home... See you soon!

Summary: We arrived early morning thinking we could just park and head to the park when the front desk said they had a room for us ready and we could check in!  The rooms were clean and they even accommodated us with a roll-away bed.  The morning bag snacks are perfect.  We are not really breakfast eaters so this was a good fit for us.  The beds and pillows were comfortable which allowed for a better nights rest from a long day at the park.  The proximity to the park was awesome!  We will definitely be staying here again!!  Thank you for making our family vacation that much better!
Manager Response: Dear Marissa M,  Thank your for the great review! We love being a part of your Disneyland vacation memories. We are looking forward to your next stay with us...Thanks again!

Summary: Disneyland is literally across the street! despite The Fifth being upstairs I never heard any noise from it.  Rooms are clean and staff is friendly.  The only negative is that The Fifth, the onsite restaurant, is not as kid/family friendly as we had hoped.  The menu for kids is small and for choosy eaters they may not find any familiar choices. There are plenty of other places to eat both inside and out of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear liz s,  Thank you for the review! We are happy that your family choose our hotel for such a special occasion. We hope you all had a GREAT time at Disneyland. See you next time!

Summary: After spending one night at another hotel within walking distance we wanted to extend our stay at Disneyland for another night. Found this gem online for much cheaper and closer to the park. Stayed in a 4 queen room which was essentially 2 connecting rooms with one bathroom. Fit our party of eight very comfortably. Rooms were clean, updated and modern.
Manager Response: Dear Mom2plenty,  So happy that you found us! Glad that your party of eight had a good time...Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review. Can't wait for your next visit. Thanks again!

Summary: My daughter, grandsons & I were just at the hotel and the manager, Teresa was so amazing. She went out of her way to make sure we were taken care of. We had a problem with noise in our room the first night and she took care of the situation and continued to make sure the remaining time of our stay was comfortable. The hotel is very clean and love the feature of the roof top bar called The 5th. We loved our stay and will be staying there again in the future. I will recommend The Grand Legacy to all our family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Karalee2005,   Thank you for your review and for choosing the Grand Legacy! So happy that Teresa was able to assist in making your stay so memorable - she is "amazing!" We can't wait for your next visit and thanks for the recommendation!

Summary: Pretty nice place and very close to the park entrance! Overall a great value and the furnishings were nice. We didn‚Äôt use the pool, but the families that did looked like they were having a great time. Look forward to booking again now that we‚Äôre AP holders!
Manager Response: Dear Alexcruz85,  Congrats on your passes...How exciting! Call us for our AP discounted rates...we love our Passholders! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 rating - so happy that you stayed with us. See you soon... #HaveEarsWillTravel

Summary: This is long overdue. As Disneyland Annual Passholders from Northern CA, we visit the park several times a year and the Grand Legacy is our spot. It is very clean, the staff is sooooo friendly and it is literally across the street from the entrance to the park.  The rooftop bar is fantastic and the pool is so nice. Many of my friends and family members are Annual Passholders as well so I‚Äôve recommended the Grand Legacy to them and they loved it as well.  I have mixed emotions about writing this review because on one hand, I‚Äôd love to help others find a great place to stay but on the other hand it‚Äôs like I‚Äôm giving away my secret spot and now everyone will know!!! Ha-Ha!
Manager Response: Dear r8rstar,  Thanks for sharing your secret spot! We love our AP Guests - they share our love of all things Disney! We are honored to be a part of your Disney experience. Can't wait for your next stay with us - Thanks again!

Summary: Awesome experience, booking was easy, check in a breeze. early check in was ava, huge bonus after a long day of traveling. parking was convent, room was clean the beds were comfortable.  we had no issues with the internet, staff was friendly and accommodating to any of our requests. we had a room on the first floor and could see the fireworks from in front.  The walk to the park is less than 10 min.
Manager Response: Dear Alicia C,  Thanks, Alicia, for the great review! Your experience is what we strive for each day. We are so happy to be a part of your Disneyland memories and can't wait to have you visit again!

Summary: We've become regulars at the Grand Legacy whenever we go to Disneyland because of the exceptional service, the very friendly and professional staff, and the cleanliness of the rooms, not to mention it's within close walking distance to the parks! It's also very convenient because there is a refrigerator and a microwave in every room. We always enjoy our stay here, and we've already book our room for the next few Disneyland visits.
Manager Response: Dear TheSoeps,  How we love our repeat guests! Disneyland is such a magical place and we love it when families continue to include us in those magical experiences. We thank you for being part of the Grand Legacy Family and can't wait for your next visit...

Summary: Our family has annual passes to Disneyland, and we don‚Äôt live close. When we travel to Anaheim, we like to stay at the Gtand Legacy, due to the convenience of the location, we are literally a hop-skip-jump from the main entrances to Disneyland and California Adventure. They have recently remodeled the hotel rooms, which are very comfortable. Best hotel in the area!
Manager Response: Dear Christina B,  How we love our Annual Passholders! Thank you so much for choosing us and being loyal through our growth and improvements. Guests like you make our jobs so worthwhile - thanks for the review... See you again soon!

Summary: When I checked in at the front desk this gentleman named Hoang helped me. He was very polite and even made sure that my room was cleaned properly which it was. just glad to know that someone is still doing things to make sure the customer is happy these days. Also nice hotel so when I come back to visit California I‚Äôll stay hereüôÇ
Manager Response: Dear gbyrd321,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We appreciate your time to review your stay with us. Thank you for the shout out to Hoang - he is excellent and an asset to our team! We are happy to know that you will be back again to see us next time you are in California...Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Great value and close to the park. Very nice.
Summary: I booked the hotel based on price and proximity to the parks. I was pleasantly surprised by how nice and clean the rooms are. Theresa Bessett and all the staff were wonderful! They were all friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Elaina T,   Thanks for booking with us and for the great review!   And thanks for the shout out for Theresa and the staff -they take pride in making your stay a happy one. See you on your next visit to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Suites in the new tower.  Avoid because of the noise from the bar (The Fifth).
Summary: we have a suite on the 4th floor with the bar  (The Fifth) above us.  I was warned that they might be noise however after the music stopped they continued to move furniture  around until well after midnight.   They also moved furniture during the day which you could not rest.   I have stayed here many times and will stay there again however never in the new tower.
Manager Response: Dear mweatherill7574,  We are sorry to hear that you were disturbed by the goings on at the FIFTH. We do our best to lessen the noise, but there can be times when it is bothersome. We apologize for that! As you have stayed with us before, you know we have many options throughout the property. We will be happy to find a great room(s)  that will work for you on your next visit. Thank you for your feedback and being a repeat guest with us!

Summary: I brought my family here and got two rooms. One room had bugs in the bed, a broken air conditioner, broken phone and fridge, bad plug ins, chipped and peeling bathtub, and no rollaway when promised. Their rooftop area to watch fireworks was closed half the time to private events. The location is great and right across from Disneyland, but I would rather take an Uber from a nicer hotel than stay in this one again.
Manager Response: Dear Bedamrell,  Thank you for your feedback and I am sorry that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We do strive each day to provide a comfortable and relaxing stay for all of our guests. For your peace of mind, please know that we do weekly professional preventative pest control and our housekeeping department is excellent in handling deep cleaning for any issue that may arise. Please also know that we recently completed a remodel of a large section of rooms with another section scheduled this year. We take your comfort very seriously and are continuing to take short and long term actions to ensure all our guests have enjoyable stays. If you would like to discuss your stay in further detail, please email me at Kerry@grandlegacyhotel.com with your contact information and I contact you at your convenience. Thank you

Summary: Our visit to Grand Legacy At The Park was a wonderful experience!  Rooms, pool area, rooftop bar and parking lot were all immaculately kept.  Food and entertainment was exceptional at rooftop bar, and we enjoyed watching Disney fireworks nightly there, as well.  Entire staff is completely friendly and professional, as well as helpful.  A definitely enjoyable experience for our family of six
Manager Response: Dear Janet H,  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review!  We appreciate your feeback and for choosing us to be a part of your Disneyland vacation... We hope all 6 of you had an awesome time at the Parks!

Summary Heading: excellent resort experience for first timers
Summary: everything was perfect-location,service,valet,guest services.no complaints for first time visitor to Disneyland.helpful all the time and friendly.location is right across from park-close to eating establishments also
Manager Response: Dear tayldb6,  First time at Disneyland? How fun! We are so happy to be a part of your visit to the Disneyland Resort. Thank you for the review... See you on the 2nd visit

Summary: Keep in mind, most people stay here due to the close proximity to the park. About a 5 min walk to the main gate. The prices were good, rooms and outside pool nice and clean. They offer a snack bag to all in the morning with a bottle of water, cheese stick granola bar, and frut. A Mc Donalds is 5 min walk away and Dennys 1 min. They have a rooftop bar. The best thing was the closeness to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Gyro1954,  Thank you for the review... We appreciate your time and the details. We hope you had a wonderful time in the Anaheim Resort!

Summary: I was nervous about booking this hotel, after all the reviews saying how loud the roof-top bar was. However, we were in a back building, and it didn't bother us. The room was a bit worn: peeling paint, older carpet, could be cleaner. But the AC was cold and the shower was hot. The pool area is very nice, with areas for the little ones, and it closed at 10, so no annoying late-night loud guests. We only heard the lounge music on one night, a Friday. So perhaps it's shut down during the week? Overall, you can't beat the close walk to Disney, and the multitude of stores nearby. We will stay again... but in a back building.
Manager Response: Dear mebeka,   So happy to see you will stay with us again... We strive each day to make all guests feel at home. The roof-top restaurant is in the front of the property so the majority of the rooms are in a different area. We are happy that you had a comfortable stay. Hope you had a great time at Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Fireworks viewing and Walk across to Disneyland
Summary: Two queen beds, mini frig,  View fireworks at 9:30pm seen from 4th floor Snack bag of bottled water, apple, string cheese and granola bar provided for guests each morning Soda machines on each floor. Ticket outlet for area attractions at parking lot exit. Mimi's Cafe, Ihop and Denny's nearby
Manager Response: Dear Margaret Y,   Aren't the fireworks great? So wonderful that you can see them from the property for those nights when you are worn out! You do not need to miss any of the fun. Thank you for your review and for staying with us. We look forward to your next visit...

Summary: The tower room was very nice, bed was really comfortable. The staff were super nice and accommodating. The walk from the hotel to Disneyland gates is about 8 minutes. Great location for taking a mid-day break if you are the type that does Disneyland from open to close like we are.
Manager Response: Dear kasmith1022,  Wow! Super fans - open to close! Happy you were able to come back for power naps to keep going until closing time. We are glad that we were a comfortable place to rejuvenate for your celebration weekend. We hope to see you for your next big event. Thanks for the 5 out of 5 review!

Summary Heading: Front Desk, Housekeeping, and Valet are awesome
Summary: I visited Anaheim for 2 days and my stay at the hotel was great. It's clean and 5 mins walk to Disneyland. Andre Evans was extremely helpful in getting us a limo ride. The only downside is that I noticed the maintenance trimming the trees with wanton disregard to the parked cars down below. Overall, our experience was pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear thevoyageur92,  So happy to see that you enjoyed our property and that our staff was helpful! I am also happy to report that our annual tree-trimming project went off well and is complete for another year. Thank you for your review and for your patience. Hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: Absolutely loved my second stay at Grand Legacy At The Park! Definitely will be planning third stay soon. This time we stayed in one of the suites and it was perfect for our families stay. Loved the service of all the workers all friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Carissa J,  Thank you so mcuh! That is music to our ears! Thanks for being a repeat guest and we are looking forward to your each visit...

Summary: It is just a short walk and you are on Disney Property. Convenient enough that you could walk back to the room during the day. Staff is friendly and the property is kept clean. The only problem we experienced was parking. When it's busy, parking is hard to find and it may not be close to your room. We went back to the room from 2-4 pm the first day, and it must of screwed the maid service up because we did not get our room cleaned & new towels.  Other than that it is an excellent stay & the prices are reasonable for the area. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear hunterd0n1,  Thank you for the review! We are happy you enjoy our location and staff... Sorry about the maid service. Next time, please give the front desk a quick call and ask for your room to be cleaned by 2 PM and they will make sure it gets done for you. We want to make your stay as comfortable as possible! Thanks again and see you soon...

Summary: Great service, clean room, comfortable beds. Walking distance for Disneyland and you can purchase the park tickets at the hotel for a better price. Me and my family were very happy with our stay here and would come back if the opportunity arrives.
Manager Response: Dear Lila M,  So happy to hear your would stay with us again! Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review... We all hope you had fun at the Disney Parks!

Summary: Our trip was amazing. The best customer service was provided by Andre Evans in the valet. He was supe friendly and prompt. Only issue was the cable tv in the room. Many Channels didn‚Äôt work or quit working while watching.
Manager Response: Dear Brad K,  Thank you for your review and for the shout-out for Andre - we appreciate your feedback!  And thanks for letting us know about the TV. We will be sure to get that fixed. Thanks again!

Summary: Love everything about this place. Great location for all your needs. The Fifth was unbelievable night time entertainment. We ate,Dance to live band and even saw the fireworks show from Disneyland. Love love my Birthday night here with all my close friends. Hotel was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Raquel p,  Happy Birthday! So happy you had a great celebration...Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review

Summary Heading: Booked a room facing the park and given something else at check in - told "too bad" unless we wanted to pay more money
Summary: We booked The Legacy two room suite facing the park but upon check-in given a different type of room than the one we booked.  We were told the only other available room was a larger suite for additional money or we could have our original room but not until the next day.  We took the room as we didn't want to move rooms after we were settled in - We were made to feel as if it was our fault because we booked through booking.com.  The only elevator was very slow and it's difficult to get into the hotel any other way than the front doors. Parking was horrible. As a business owner I don't usually write negative reviews but this hotel left a bad taste in my mouth.  We won't stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear M B,  I am sorry to read of the issue with the room location. We want our guests to feel comfortable no matter how they booked their reservation. We are sorry if we fell short of that for you. Please contact me at Carlos@grandlegacyhotel.com if you would like to discuss your situation further. I would be happy to review your situation and see what can be done.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We enjoyed a great 4 night stay at Grand Legacy. Our room was clean, the bed comfortable, water pressure good, and bath towels plentiful. We‚Äôve stayed at many of the surrounding Harbor hotels and this one ranks top 2 in our book. Was also convenient to have double sinks and large bathroom, and a good sized mini fridge. We were on the 4th floor all the way in the back and our room was very quiet. The only things the room lacked was a safe and a freezer section in the mini fridge. Otherwise, we loved everything about it and can‚Äôt wait to return.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth K,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review! Happy to receive such a high ranking in your book! We all hope you had a great time at the parks and we look forward to your next stay with us... Thanks again!

Summary Heading: great stay at the Grand Legacy
Summary: great room. great price.the staff were friendly and helpful. the pool and spa is nice. the grab and go snack/ breakfast is nice and convenient. super close to Disneyland. this was a last minute trip for my grandchildren so it was great to be able to make a quick reservation.
Manager Response: Dear Deb L,  Thank you for the 5 of 5 review! So happy you stayed with us...Hope you and the grandkids had a great time at Disneyland!

Summary: Easy walk to parks. Clean rooms. Close to restaurant,store. Pool is heated and has good amount of seating for non swimmers. We try and stay here every visit. Employees are friendly  and helpful. Can‚Äôt wait until our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear kculver10,  Thank you for the feedback and for being a repeat guest! We can't wait for your next visit either! See you soon...

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at the Grand Legacy twice now, and both times were great experiences. It is in an amazing location next to Disneyland, all of the staff members we talked to were so kind & helpful, the price per night is reasonable, and our room was a perfect fit for us. I will definitely be staying here again in the future and I would recommend this hotel to family & friends when they go to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Jenna W:  Thank you for sharing your experiences with us! We work hard so that our guests feel at home - happy to read that you will be back to stay with us in the future. Thanks again and see you next time!

Summary: We love this hotel when we went 2016. We had a family situation this year and Teresa the manager was so sweet to help us with our cancellation. We look forward to the next time we go. Thank you for your help and hospitality
Manager Response: Dear Ines R:  We look forward to your next stay with us and hope all is well with your family!

Summary: The room was comfortable and clean (even the carpet!!). The mini fridge is huge, plenty of room for bringing your own food/snacks. There's a coffee maker and microwave. The beds were comfy and we heard very little noise coming from adjacent rooms. We could hear music from the rooftop restaurant on Saturday night but it didn't bother us or keep us awake. The pool area was excellent, especially if you have little kids. Hot tub was nice and hot. They gave us little to go bags in the morning with snacks and water bottles- a nice touch. Parking was easy and the staff was friendly. You can't beat the location of this hotel relative to Disneyland and surrounding restaurants. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear LetsG0Traveling:  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review.  We are so happy that you enjoyed our hotel! We love being a part of your Disneyland memories... We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Nothing grand, no legacy, just average
Summary: The name and some reviews might make you think that this is a great place to stay. Our experience says otherwise. The structure is old which shows up in the amenities and appliances. The refrigerator was making loud noice all the time and disturbed our sleep very much. Parking is a huge problem. Rooms were not as clean as we would have liked. Their rooftop restaurant has elaborate Asian-like menu, with hardly anything suitable for vegetarians. Only advantage is that this is very close to Disneyland park, literally 5 minute walk. We will definitely find a better place next time.
Manager Response: Dear Sameer D:  Thank you for your feedback. It helps us see where to focus our attention. Please know that our property is in the process of remodeling sections of rooms this year and your issues are being addressed. We hope you had a great time at the Parks.

Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. The location was perfectly situated within walking distance of the Disneyland, which makes it convenient for mid-day naps. There are also a lot of eateries along the way. I'd recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear Shawie R:  Thank you for the review! We are a great location for family with kids that need naps. Take a nap and head back over for more fun! We hope you had a great time at the Parks and appreciate your recommendation...

Summary Heading: Grand Legacy at the Park - Perfect Stay Near Disneyland
Summary: Recently I was able to start my summer vacation in the best way possible‚Ä¶.a trip to the Disneyland Resort in California. After a long school year, it was an amazing way to relax and unwind. As Disney fanatics, we always want to stay as close to the parks as possible.  We found the ideal location in Anaheim with GRAND LEGACY AT THE PARK.    Located literally across the street from Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney shopping, GRAND LEGACY AT THE PARK is just minutes away from the fun and excitement of the parks.  At a leisurely pace, the walk may take 10 minutes.  We were so pumped to get there I believe we made it in 5!  Many area hotels boast ‚Äúminutes from Disney.‚Äù  GRAND LEGACY AT THE PARK really is that close.  When we arrived from the airport and long day of
Manager Response: Dear Scott D:  We are so happy you chose our property to celebrate the end of the school year! Disneyland is THE place for celebrations. We appreciate your great review and hope we get to see you and your family again soon... Happy Summer!

Summary: Very reasonably priced, excellent location, accommodating of early check-in, lets you leave car until 4pm on check out day. Really enjoyed the snack bag with water, apple, string cheese and granola bar, much better than breakfast for my group. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Kayt121966:  Thank you for the 5 out of 5 review! We are so happy you got to maximize your stay with us and in the Anaheim Resort. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: great location, nice staff, noisy gate by our room.
Summary: The good: - location is nearly uneatable. Less than a 5 minute walk to Disneyland. - rates are reasonable. - pool is very fun and kid friendly. - valet parking is very convenient. - Nice staff.   To be desired: - free snack bags in the morning (apple, water bottle, granola bar and cheese stick) are nice, but I'm a breakfast guy  - bring on the waffles! - room was clean, but a little dimly lit, felt like it could be updated.   Specific to our room: there was a noisy service gate on the outside wall that kept getting slammed shut in the middle of the night and would wake us up. Talked with front desk and it happened less, but seems like something could be done to help it shut more softly (rubber pads?).
Manager Response: Dear stoneboarder:  Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate you letting us know the good, not so good, and where to improve. We take feedback seriously and will take action especially in regard to the noise you experienced near your room. We hope you had a great time at the Parks and that we see you during your next visit! Thanks again!

Summary: Our stay at Grand Legacy at the Park was a fairly good one. We just had a few issues.  Housekeeping was a BIG BIG issue. We got there on a Monday at like 4:00 and was told that our room was ready to go. So we went and our room was a mess. Beds not made, dirty towels, etc. Quickly fixed though so thanks to front desk staff for dealing with that. Another day, we went to Disneyland and came back to the room at 5:00 after a early morning start. We still had dirty towels, unmade beds, trash, etc. They came about 20 minutes later and asked us to leave so they could clean the room. Why wait to clean rooms at 5:20 in the AFTERNOON!!! That‚Äôs absolutely ridiculous. Also never left the right amount of anything. One day they left they‚Äôre cleaning rag on the night stand. Now on our checkout
Manager Response: Dear Jacob G:  Thank you for your review and for letting us know the issues you had with Housekeeping. Your issues will be shared with our Executive Housekeeper so the issues can be investigated and fixed. I am happy that the Front Desk staff was able to assist you. We hope you had a great time at Disneyland!  Thank you again!

Summary: We have been to the Grand Legacy four times in the last year, and each time has been wonderful! I would first like to thank Theresa (who I think is some sort of manager) behind the front desk. When we arrived, she greeted us with a warm smile and when she learned of our frequent visits, went to the back to grab some Minnie ears and a cool Pixar fest poster for us. We felt very welcomed and were happily met with Disney Magic from the second we got there! We had to get a rollaway bed with our room and they were very accommodating. Our room was very clean and spacious and felt very comfortable. All staff we encountered were kind and friendly. We will definitely be back as this is our go-to hotel and look forward to all future visits!
Manager Response: Dear Disneylover16:  Thank you for the great review! We appreciate our guests and happy to read that you enjoyed your time with us. And thank you for the shout-out for Theresa - she IS great!  We hope you had a great time at Disneyland and look forward to your next visit with us...

Summary: My 3rd stay at the hotel and was fantastic! Rooms super clean.stafg very friendly.couldnt ask for more. New lobby and building look great. Last time we stayed the building was being built so very happy on how it turned out. Will be back on next Disneyland trip!
Manager Response: Dear heyzamman:  Thanks for growing with us! It has been an adventure and we appreciate your loyalty. We will be here and ready for your next trip...See you soon!

Summary: This hotel is in just the right place. We were walking distance to the park and also had many resturants nearby to choose from. It has clean and tidy rooms and off street parking. I would be very happy to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce D:  Thank you for the kind review! We are happy you were our guest and look forward to your next visit with us. Hope you had an excellent time at the Disneyland Parks!

Summary Heading: Meh. There are better hotels to stay at and I am willing to pay a bit more for them.
Summary: The goods. Location, ground floor room was easy to get to at the end of the day. Nice to have food and mini mart at the front.   The bads. The AC unit was loud and smelly and I have no clue where it ventilated to because it was in the closet area instead of the window. Cracked and dirty and needs replacing. The 5th nightclub was loud at night as were the cars leaving. It was nice to get free parking deal and the price was very affordable for a place to sleep, but I will not be staying here again unless it's like 60 bucks a night.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie W:  Thank you for your review. We appreciate feedback so we may see what is good and what needs fixing. Please know that we continually are working toward improving our property so our guests have the best stay possible. Thank you again and we hope you had a great time at the Disneyland Parks.

Summary Heading: Great location for a budget hotel.
Summary: The location is as good as you can get without forking out extra money to stay at the Grand Californian right in the park. The rooms however could use some TLC for a hotel that‚Äôs been renovated within the last few years. Our fridge clicked/ticked like a clock until we unplugged it and gave it a good shake and plugged it back in. The hinges on the door to the bathroom were very rusted and could easily be replaced. Peeling paint around the mirror could do for a touch up as well. Keep in mind that it also is a busy hotel and sound will travel - it‚Äôs expected, at least in my opinion. So if you‚Äôre someone who likes to sleep in be expected to hear kids outside and maids trollies rolling by your room in the morning. The pool and hottub were awesome. We weren‚Äôt expecting a hot tub since
Manager Response: Dear Kelsie G:  Thank you for your loyalty and sharing your experience with us. Please know that we have remodeled many rooms this year already and more are planned. We appreciate you being part of the Grand Legacy family and look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Be a hotel or be a bar
Summary: We have stayed here many times over the years but it had been a few years since our last stay. I noticed the reviews had declined, but ignored them since we always had good experiences.  But not anymore  The location is great.   Cleanliness was just fine.  But the parking is a nightmare.  So many spots are blocked off for their restaurant.  Parking is $15 plus taxes and fees.  Many hotels around them don't charge for parking nor are they more expensive.  The worst though is that we had a room in the new tower 3 floors beneath the restaurant/bar.  The music was so loud and late every night.   The snack bag was also not good.  The idea is good, but it was the same food every day.  Granola bar, string cheese, water bottle, red apple.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen P:  Thank you for your feedback. I am sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We have grown quite a lot in the last few years, but we strive each day to provide a wonderful guest experience. We do have room options that are away from the restaurant that are great options for families. Also, our valet parking is the same rate as self parking so if the parking lot is full, valet is happy to park for you. Parking is for hotel guests with limited, if any, for the restaurant. We hope that you allow us the opportunity to serve you and your family again. Again, thank you for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Our stay at Grand Legacy At The Park started off wonderfully, and just got better from there.
Summary: We arrived after a long, slow and tiring drive on Friday, May 25 for a two-night stay and were greeted immediately by Hoang at the outdoor check-in station.  He was friendly, upbeat and totally committed to our satisfaction.  He took total charge of our car, filled us in on the hotel basics, showed perfect empathy at our long drive through several accidents, and even provided my wife and daughter with Mickey Ears!!!  It was a perfect arrival for us...got us into the 'happiest place on earth' mood very quickly.  Otherwise, the hotel was wonderful.  Our room was on the third floor...we were a bit apprehensive about the noise from the bar two floors up and Hoang told us that it could be noisy...but we didn't hear a thing and had two great nights' sleep.  The room was beautifully
Manager Response: Dear J F:  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! And yes - Hoang is awesome! Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next stay...

Summary: The Grand Legacy is a very convenient hotel to the main entrance of the Disneyland park. We slept great but a very special shout out goes to Hoang @ Valet, because without his help caring my stroller up-and-down the second floor and helping us find a guest laundry and going way above and beyond to greet us each and every time he saw us ‚Äî this would have been just an average hotel. But because of Hoang, he made our stay most convenient, pleasant, and I will pay his kindness forward! Grand Legacy, you are very lucky to have him at your valet stand.
Manager Response: Dear hcarmich42:  Thank you for your shout-out!  Hoang is awesome - so happy he assisted you with your needs. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit...

Summary: We had a great stay here this weekend we stayed 3 nights in room 176. Because we where on the ground floor there was an awful lot of noise on Saturday evening but not to much on the other evenings. The lady who checked us in was efficient but not very friendly but that wasn‚Äôt so important. The room was clean and great for what we wanted be aware though the queen beds are quite small and no really suitable for taller people. The location is what makes this hotel perfect and I would consider staying again if I was in Anaheim again
Manager Response: Dear gemaidie:  We appreciate your feedback. This assists us in where to focus our efforts. We are happy that liked our location and we would be very happy to have you stay with us the next time you visit Anaheim. Thank you!

Summary: 4th time staying here,was best time ever.Susan checked us in w/exceptional friendly service.Room exceeded expectations.We got hooked up.Thanks Susan,Jhonathan,Ufvocina for making wife‚Äôs bday best ever
Manager Response: Dear Anthony M:  Happy birthday to your wife! So happy we got to be a part of her special day! We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your next visit with us...

Summary: We visited he grand legacy for the first time and it was perfect, since it was so close to the park. Clean and simple place to crash your head at night. Hoang was our valet and was very helpful to get our bags into the car, and wait for our driver, very welcoming and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Hailey I:  Thank you for the 5 of 5 review! So happy your enjoyed your stay and got to meet our Hoang. Looking forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again!

Summary: Quick walk to the park making it convenient to come back and relax for a bit. The customer service is excellent, particularly Hoang who is as good as it gets. We were originally only staying a few nights but ended up doubling the length of our stay and Jonathan at the front desk was very helpful to our last minute changes.
Manager Response: Dear bridgb2089:  Thank you for sharing your experience with us! So happy that you enjoyed your stay. Thanks for the shout-outs for Hoang and Jonathan - they are great! See you again soon...Thanks again!

Summary: We recently stayed with 60 kids for a band trip to Disneyland.  Service was good, people were friendly.  We also had a 16' box truck full of instruments and luggage foe the kids.  The valet were so helpful and accomdating.  Hoang was so helpful, taking the time to help load all the equipment, all while greeting other guests that passed by, and nice to each of the kids that brought their equipment.   What a great help!
